reviews:
Well done! Almost provides everything , run time ,fastest run, pauses when you stop or take a break, resume vice versa..this app can improve even more by adding a graphic display of pace at every second or a prequal of time. Thumbs-up!   Full Review   
 Settings are not synchronized Why aren't app settings synchronized. I use two devices for running plus online site. I have to update settings/profile in each place. Also each time I logout, login the application, settings are reset.   Please consider to fix it.   Three stars cause it... Will raise it to five once handled..   Full Review   
 How to end run? I am not able to end my run after my run...... It showing me "are you sure want to cancel this run?", I also did pause the run and then I end the run .... Still it's not working.... Plz help me....   Full Review   
 Nike strikes again I COMPLETELY LOVE THIS APP! I just recently began running again and was looking for an app to assist and push my goals to optimum levels! I have found that and then some in using this app! It's easy to use! If you're a pro or a beginning runner hands down this is the app for you!  Try it! 🏃🏆   Full Review   
 Great for new runner I found this app excellent. I've had knee problems in the past but have been given the go ahead to take up jogging once I keep the distances low. This app alerts me every mile I run. I aim for 2.5 miles max. I highly recommend this app.   Full Review   
 Wrong distance and speed How is it possible that I run more distance in same time and my speed goes down?  Please fix this bug or else my hunt for a good tracking app continues.  And wait,  I am in India but the store prices are in dollars.   Full Review   
 Great app, changing Facebook links I moved back to this app after season (swim) was over but I happened to make a new Facebook account. I logged back in smoothly but changing fb accounts isn't going so smooth. It will find my account, let me log in and then show the ring of death until I back out of the log in. Please fix this.   Full Review   
 Close to perfect Only complaint is that it can't access your Google music collection. Otherwise this app does everything you might want and more.   Full Review   
 Ok but... You suggest split times in some of the coach section descriptions, but don't offer any way to set up (or alert on) those split times   Full Review   
 Good but lacking for Samsungs It'd be a 5 star if I could use my own picture when posting my times, like you can on an iPhone. Instead of only being able to see my route.   Full Review   
 Adds random miles to my runs Was loving the app until today. Ran 4 miles and activity clearly shows this but home page has jumped me an additional 15 miles! Now I feel it's ruined my progress as I cant clearly see my actual milage increasing as it has these random ghost miles included... Update it has just added another 20 miles while sitting at home. My profile is now ruined and I have achievements I didn't earn Uninstalled!!!   Full Review   
 Limited functionality for Android S6 I loved this app when I first started using it because it had many functions I was looking for. However, by my 6th run, I was having issues with the mapping. Sometimes it would work ok, other times it could work for part of the run then stop even though total distance kept calculating. I didn't change any settings on my phone. Since I did a software update for my phone, the mapping function isn't working at all. I get a pace graph instead. All settings are correct but not working. Switching to a diff app.   Full Review   
 AWESOME APP!! Really motivates you .Let's you go at your own pace and let's you set your goal.I am usually not a cardio fan.But now I love it!!   Full Review   
  Pros: Easy to set up and start running. Good post-race feedback. Tracks how many km you have on your current shoes. Friend tracking. Cons: Does not show average pace during run. Does not work well with GPS on Nexus 6P. Race training plans are not customizable.   Full Review   
 No way to authenticate Tried Facebook authentication, then after connecting with support, they said they don't know why it doesn't work and suggested creating new Nike+ account, again no success.   Full Review   
 Can't edit a challenge?! 1st off, I told the setup I wanted to begin the challenge Wed March 16 & end it on March 23, which would give us a week to finish the challenge. I was already having problems setting the dates, bcuz it kept resetting itself to a different date other than I put in. I had to keep adjusting it. Finally I got it put in & I triple checked to make sure it was right bcuz of the mishaps. Now the date was correct for 3 days, then come Saturday it sent me a msg saying I had 2 DAYS left! Wth! Tried to edit, but can't.   Full Review   
  Its a nice app. Just had 3 runs so far. Apart from other details it would be great if it has a weather feature also. For example it should show the run was done under what weather current weather conditions and what was the location temperature or humidity factor etc   Full Review   
 Burning the extra energy Do the push aways, get away from the computer, Dig those running shoes out, and make it happen. You'll thank yourself for the effort.   Full Review   
 Best running app ever Only issue I have ever is the auto pause doesn't disengage when you start running again. Other than that it's a must-have for any runner.   Full Review   
 Motivating! New to the app, getting started running again and I find this app very motivating, and it pauses when you pause so no cheating!!   Full Review   
 app sucks The app used to work now it says access denied! why the f**k you developers keep updating and f**k up the apps! if it not broke leave it, no need to go version 2.3.2.1b whatever when version 2.0.0.0.0.0 works!!!   Full Review   
 Garbage I just completed a 16 mile run, and Nike+ decided to subtract it from my monthly total, and add 4x that distance to my overall total miles. It does the same things when trying to track shoe mileage. This app cant even do basic math (you know, a major part of its job for tracking run mileage). Im fed up with this garbage app.   Full Review   
 Functional It should include the IOS function to share with a photo for the android devices, only feature missing, other than that it's pretty accurate not to mention stable.   Full Review   
 Bug? Bike activity in Garmin incorrectly link into Nike+ as a run I have Garmin connect which is linked to Nike plus. All apps at latest versions.  I can see my run activities from garmin correctly in nike+. While Garmin bike activities (correctly) do not appear as activities in Nike+.  A bike activity of 20km in garmim appears in the Nike+ Challenge as distance run! Obviously this should not happen.    I am unable to edit or delete this bike 20km distance in Nike+ challenge.   Should I use this bug to "run" 42.2km in 2:03 on my bike each weekend and ace the challenge? :)   Full Review   
 Not working at all It says 'service unavailable , try again ?'.     My brother uses this app and I like it please resolve.(have a mi4i that is running android 5.0.2) have sent a complaint weeks ago no response   Full Review   
 Great app UPDATE: Same issues as this time last year.               Sometimes GPS is spotty. Would like the ability to reset some stats without starting over. Says my fastest mile is 4 min. I can't DRIVE a mile in 4 min!   Full Review   
  Great and simple app with no in app purchases! What you see is what you get, and what you see and get is great! I'd give it 5 stars but for some reason i can't send the routes i create on the route creator on the nike website :( if you guys can help me out i'd greatly appreciate it. that, and please add Spotify integration into the app like you did with iOS! :)   Full Review   
  Been using it for a while but the last month or so the splits have been way off! Time is right but the splits will be wrong. It will say when I finished it was way faster than the actual finish time.  For example did a race the other day 5 miles inn1:27 but the splits said i did 5 miles in 1:18. The overall time was correct and it was right at 5 miles so where did the extra time go???? Frustrating the splits being off since I am trying to see what my miles are and I can't with this not working.   Full Review   
 Great app. Love that they moved FB/Twitter share nonsense to appear AFTER the run, and the new "end run" button works much better in the rain than the old slider.   Full Review   
 Motivation I've always liked to run but with this app it pushes me to work even harder, everytime I hear it say "beginning workout" my body just gets in gear and takes off. Just got the app recently and would definitely recomend it to anyone who enjoys running or wants to start!!   Full Review   
 App keeps you motivated Add this app to s health on the Samsung Galaxy phones.   Scroll through the settings, add count down 30 seconds (gives you time to put the phone away), sync your music, change the interval updates to .5 miles, add your sneakers etc.... Those are settings I liked.   I gave it 4 stars because I had to uninstall a few times over the last 8 months (giving the wrong distance even after recalibrating).   Full Review   
 Love this app Love this app for running  outdoors, indoors on the treadmill not sure it gives me accurate  results otherwise its my go too app and l love it   Full Review   
 Glitch So I only have 5 runs in on the activity tab but when I look at the home tab it says I have 8 with 19 miles even though I know I only have 11 miles. Does anyone know where those mystery runs came from because they arnt logged down any where.   Full Review   
 Nike App Run slow at times can't get to my friends list and freezes a lot. Please fix. Sincerely a Galaxy Note user!   Full Review   
 SO SWEET!!!! Wasn't impressed for the first couple of years but Nike has done a great job of improving this app over time.  It's awesome now. Thanks Nike!!!   Full Review   
 Good App Can't take pictures during my runs like others can, still no option to share on instagram for Android. STILL Wish there was an easier way to search for friends. Putting in someone's full name, not having them come up, and having to scroll through all with the same first name only is tedious. Also wish there was a way to edit the shoes you add. Runs seem to be dropped for no reason right in the middle of a route.  adding mile splits would significantly improve this.   Full Review   
 #Nike+ gives incorrect data The recent updates to the app sucks. The app gives incorrect distance vs. Speed data. Even more annoying is the #Nike+ plus Twitter support. I gave them so much data to diagnose the error but such a waste of time!   Full Review   
 Doesn't track well It seems to pay more attention to phone jostling than my actually movement. I don't bounce much as a runner and it keeps telling me I've stopped running when I have not. Map my run treats me much better. Very unhappy with this app but it's just not for me.   Full Review   
 Loved it! The app is awesome. But one thing I noticed that it shows miles ran faster than the outdoor mode while it's indoor mode. Didn't get it why!   Full Review   
 Almost perfect Sadly although i loved this app will have to move on as i purchased a pair of jabra pulse headphones and there is no support for HRM's.  I really loved this app as well as it is perfect in every other way.  Simple to use and helped me get back in shape so it is with a heavy heart that I bid nike running farewell, thanks for the six pack!   Full Review
title: Nike+ Running

reviews:
Can't log in! Just got app. Says I'm already am a member. Then it says my Gmail and password  don't  match! I'm ... not a member and they do.. match. My question is HELP!...................................................   Full Review   
 It's a fraud The keep charging me  to my pre paid devit card for a.service I never got to use and they try evry month to keep charging I berly found it in my apps but ama uninstall it right away the charges better stop   Full Review   
 Works great so far I have filled out app for an hour and no problems yet   Full Review   
 Issue fixed, I love it again :-) When I ask a question I almost always get a fairly quick and professional response. I can also easily browse for whatever health condition/advice I want.   Full Review   
 No Answers I've asked questions twice now without an answer. I guess now you have to pay if you want your question answered. As recent as last fall I had my questions answered within 24 hours. Uninstalling.   Full Review   
 Don't use it is a fraud First the doctor never sent me my script.  When i called they sent me a script, but it was after I screamed and   Now I had a doctor consult and my app didn't work.  Plus now I still have thr problem I went the doctor doesn't even know what she is doing.  Finally after 3 months I am still getting billed despite me telling them to get rid of my account.  DON'T USE THIS!   Full Review   
 Useless experience First of all, i have tried other kind of online doctors before. But that one doesn't work in LA and FL. So i download this.  The doctor is kind, but what she prescribed the med for me not only extremely expensive but also doesn't work for a week.  I cancelled right away.  I wanna say it's not a really difficult illness that can't be checked online. So I left this bad review!   Full Review   
 Hats off Really nice app for humanity service.   Full Review   
 Profile Wouldn't let me add or update. I kept trying but it would not work.  Plus it kept asking me to upgrade to add money.   Full Review   
  I'm a nurse but when it comes to my own care my nursing knowledge goes out the window.  Apps like these put things in prospective.   Thank you   Full Review   
 Amazing The response time seems to have been getting mixes remarks, however I find responses are very fast, especially for a free service. The doctor's replies are always helpful, educated and thought-through. Thank you health tap.   Full Review   
 Terrible service & advice The doctor was completely unhelpful, from a medical standpoint. His medical advice amounted to try not to worry about it. When I was unsatisfied, they refused to refund my money, despite my calling to cancel in the first 24 hours. It's the worst experience I've had with an online medical service!   Full Review   
  I really liked HT, I could ask things that arrose due to a mix of mental health issues causing serious medical issues for me (I understand HT cant replace gp visits etc. However I also had a horrible dr call me dumb multiple times in an answer over a serious mental health issue, I felt like hurting myself more after reading it because I was really upset.   Full Review   
 Ease of use Easily access and very informatic rapid response to address question raised.Excellent.   Full Review   
 Beyond Helpful!!! I can have a consultation with my primary care physician, without ever having to leave my home. This site offers access to numerous Doctors and specialists, eager to help you live a fuller and healthier life. I highly recommend this site to anyone in need of sound medical advice, or an in depth and completely personalized consultation with a Dr. of your choice. This app enables healthier living, right at your fingertips!!!   Full Review   
  I love this app.! Thank you, HealthTap, for making medical advice so easy to obtain.   Full Review   
  Love it   Full Review   
 Was good, now not so much... Money hungry HealthTap used to be a fantastic service. You could ask a question too a doctor (for general knowledge, of course), and get a concise answer. Now, you get doctors who seem to be in it just for the incentive, providing useless answers. I've even had one doctor call me a liar about a diagnosis that was made by 8 separate independent medical examiners and several orthopedic doctors and surgeons. What a putz. It seems that doctors now don't care about the answers they give on there. $$$   Full Review   
 Septic g.f. ended up going to ER b/c no one from HealthTap called her back. My girlfriend found this app &liked the free version, so she tried the pay version.  She was having horrible kidney pains& back pains.  She messaged HealthTap.  She waited....And waited...And still waited. NO DOCTOR HAS YET TO EVEN ATTEMPT TO CONTACT HER IN DAYS. She ended up going to the emergency room B/C she was septic. So when she contacted "customer service," they gave her "2 weeks free" for a "service" which doesn't work!  And they refused to refund her.  A doctor STILL has not contacted her. WARNING!   Full Review   
 Keeps closing. Every time I try to check on Dr comment for other people's questions or try to read about something it closes. Really frustrating!!!   Full Review   
 AMAZING! Finally an app that brings health into the tech age Needed an urgent appointment with a specialist. Was connected to a doc for a virtual consult within 2 mins! AMAZING! Otherwise would have had to wait until mid March to see someone at local clinic.   Full Review   
  It keeps saying cannot play video cant use the app. It always says cannot play video -.-   Full Review   
 Couldn't do the free trial I signed up for the trial used my PayPal account and it still wanted me to pay money to ask a simple ?   Full Review   
 Easy way to get doctors' answers. Post your question, and a doctor will post an answer. It's fast for a question-answer app. Response times to my questions seem to range from 10 minutes to 10 hours. The site's doctors also have a premium service where you can see a real, live doctor via an eMedicine visit and get a diagnosis and a prescription (but not drugs like narcotics or anxiety drugs). The app is free for posting general medical questions. The one-on-one consultations have a fee.   Full Review   
 Comes in handy and works well Helpful, quick, and easy to use app that really helped with some pressing medical questions I had.   Full Review   
 Excellent App Better than WebMD Yes. I said it. Better than WEB MD. excellent answers specific to your situation. For everyone complaining about the app's speed. Check your phone's settings, or maybe consider upgrading the phones OS or hardware if needed. Honestly my NOTE I I is a few years old and had no issues quickly loading the app and utilizing its features smoothly with no issues. Great experts and excellent application guys. Great work!   Full Review   
 Educational and very useful information I enjoy reading the information given in each doctors response. It is very precise, also the referrals and easy to access regardless of who you area.  I find it facinating that these healthcare  professionals take the time together answer each and everyone of the questions that each individual asks. This app shows how healthcare should be across the board. It would be extremely benificial if some/ all anders could include a link to different resources that the patient can access, in order to further explore   Full Review   
 (y) best any1 cn gt thank you guys   Full Review   
 Mrs Great just what I,m looking for!   Full Review   
  I forgot password how do I login   Full Review   
 Fantastic! Saves time and money and the doctors are phenomenal!   Full Review   
  Where did the free ? Option go??   Full Review   
 MR Really good   Full Review   
 Money based... Seems like with this task to a live doctor, you are prioritizing the people that pay money, not the people with true problems. Just me! (Takes me a WHILE to get an answer.)   Full Review   
 Almost perfect Love this app! but it could use a few improvements. It's a bit tricky to find the free question option on the homepage. It's also really hard to ask a question in 150 characters! It should be extended to like 200 so you're not forced to abreviate-which doesn't let you fully explain your question, and then the doctor doesn't know the whole story. Sometimes the doctor will also give you a really short answer that isn't helpful. But overall this is a really great app.   Full Review   
  It says you can ask a doc a question for free but NOTHING is free on this app!!!  I could see a doc in person for these prices.  They are ridiculous!!   Full Review   
 Disappointed I have no idea why I had to pay $49($44 Australia) or why I couldn't see what I was paying in Australian dollars before I paid as it just took it straight out . I haven't had my question answered and you have to pay MORE money to get a faster response($44 is more than enough) If I could get a refund back that would be much appreciated.   Full Review   
 Wow a gift from health tap It's a gift love this app but won't buy docs for me   Full Review   
 Too Many Notifications This app is great & user friendly. The biggest compliant is deactivating the notifications. There should be one button to deactivate them all and then you should be able to select the ones you'd like to activate.  Very annoying.   Full Review   
 Awesome app Love that I have a top U.S. doctor at my beck and call 24/7 from anywhere in the world, from my mobile :)   Full Review
title: HealthTap

reviews:
Changed phones, can't remember password  no visible clickable link to email password go self. Guess it's time to find a different app.   Full Review   
  As of the latest raft of updates (around March 2016) the app now counts way to many steps. One test saw the app log 580 steps after walking a definite 400.   I've used this app for nearly 2 years but will now have to uninstall. When it works properly it's great. Pity it doesn't work properly.   Full Review   
 Didn't need the last update. Unlike many other users with hundreds of thousands steps per day I have an opposite problem - the updated app on my phone doesn't bother to count any steps I made. Instead of some reasonable thousands I see a couple of dozens. Useless. It's a pity, because I've been using the app for more than two years, and now have to uninstall it.   Full Review   
 Used to be more accurate As of the last update it is counting ridiculous numbers of steps I have not taken. It used to be more accurate. Would also like to see distance in km that I have walked.   Full Review   
 Last update rendered this app useless Now counts 500 steps for every 100 taken. Tried rebooting, but no change. Sad. Really liked the app.  I have used it for a long time.   Full Review   
 Great app but not working with Nexus 5X I liked this app very much on Nexus 4. But on my Nexus 5X it counts way too many steps. Walked almost nothing yesterday but got over 7000 steps.   Full Review   
  No stars. Because it no longer works. It used to be great. Now it incorporates the microphone in its 'collection' of data and your phones vibrator adds 1000's to your daily total. Developers don't listen to the crowd so I'm bailing out. Used to be good so whatever ratings you see are for previous versions. Just another reason NOT to AUTO update...  Complete rubbish.   Full Review   
 Update has wrecked this app Apparently on Monday I walked 280,000 steps!? But is that my record? Course it isn't because today....in 2 hours....I've walked....over 780,000! Wtf have you done!? It was never the best for accuracy but this is ridiculous. Update is for "bug fixes and usability enhancements" you say...I say "make sure the bloody thing works first!" Update made bigger bugs and there's NO usability! Give yer heads a wobble and sort yourselves out! PS...Apparently I've walked 1.1million steps today. RIDICULOUS #frombadtoworse   Full Review   
 Very poor I am uninstalling this app.  It works very poorly.  Short walks (like at home in the house) either do not register at all or inaccurately.   App will freeze while you are walking in which case it doesn't work at all.  Have to check it constantly to make sure it's working.   Full Review   
 Awesome I love this app! Super easy to use and has helped me to keep track of all the food I eat and realize I eat way too many foods that are bad for me!   Full Review   
 Doesn't work What else is there to say? I've had it on for the past hour, my phone is in my fanny pack on my hip and I know it moves every time I walk and it has only recorded 485 steps. I'm a nurse, I've been running all over the unit, I've done more than 485 steps. I had high hopes but was disappointed.   Full Review   
 Doesn't work I used to really love noom. Now everything isn't working like it used to. Pedometer doesn't even count steps! Galaxy note 5   Full Review   
  It used to be perfect and I used it for two years, but the latest version counts steps even when I only use the phone while sitting.   Full Review   
 Used to work, now it doesn't The app updated a few days ago.  The step count used to be very accurate and now it's counting at least 4 times too many steps per one I take.   Full Review   
 Most Accurate Step Counter App Excellent and accurate app. I've tried many others and this is the only one that counts the most accurate during my testing phases. I recommend this one hands down.   Full Review   
 Noom walk So easy and doesn't run down my phone battery too much. Like how it links to Noom Coach to give you a step target each day   Full Review   
  Hi Ive used Noom before but on this more recent download the actual date is incorrect and I cant seem to change it Also being able to change Steps after the current date would be great ..   Full Review   
 Noah Count Well yesterday it recorded steps so i stopped counting at night then started again this morning. Over the last couple of hours i think it's only missed about 5,000 of them!!! It's only showing 85. I'm sure my friends with those Fatbits will probably have theirs counted at around 10,000 so far. Uninstalled.   Full Review   
 Nice I like it, not perfect accuracy in counting steps, but still recommend it.   Full Review   
 I love this application No words say about this application because I cannot described best for my medical coche.   Full Review   
 I love this app except I wish it linked to other apps (say, Noom Coach?) and I wish that it would transfer over data when I get a new phone. It has my profile -- how much space can one day of The Most Steps take up?   Full Review   
  The latest version doesn't run in background... it's hard to remember to activate it every day! Please restore autocountig :)   Full Review   
 Not perfect but liked it The app is very reliable and give accurate step count. But I wish there be some analysis like calories burned by walking. Pace of walking . Some targets etc. Its plain pedometer.   Full Review   
 Hits the mark Works extremely well, without any extraneous junk and unnecessary features.   Full Review   
 Shows Too Many Steps Shows over 1000 steps than Pace. Used to be more accurate.   Full Review   
 Great app It's accurate. Hardly any difference between this, lifelog and run keeper combined. Worth downloading. Love the step widget.   Full Review   
 Not so much This app used to work great for me when I had it on my Samsung 3, but bow on my Samsung 6, it Samsung sucks! I can walk ariund all day with my phone in my back pocket and it will have recorded only 16 steps, then I put my phone in my car's cup holder and it records 75 steps on my drive home! No kidding. I guess i have to get a real pedometer. :(   Full Review   
 Walking matters! Nice app to keep the daily walk count. It is pleasure using it :)   Full Review   
  While sitting on the bus my steps (which I do not make) are counted, it's a nice app but flawed.   Full Review   
 Pretty accurate I carry my phone with me everywhere I go and by the end of the day, I know how many steps I have taken.   Full Review   
 It's a great app Even if you do not need to lose weight , using it you are encouraged to walk a little bit more day by day.   Full Review   
 Nook Walk Neat way to BURN CALORIES.    WITHOUT  the COUNTING. SO I KEEP MOVING MY FEET.   Full Review   
  Seems to work fine at the moment. Doesn't drain battery or count steps in the car.   Full Review   
 Great App Love it. It's so easy to get to, very accurate.   Full Review   
 Sometimes glitchy There are days that this apps says I walked 0 steps all day, but guaranteed I walked over 8K. Not sure if this is because it was in a not super tight pocket or the update, but really weird.   Full Review   
 Love the app but... After the last update, it started counting steps while I am driving. For some reason it's been very sensitive and over counting. Sorry, this was the only way I could notify someone.   Full Review   
  Easy to use however will be grate if I could sync it to my gear   Full Review   
 Loved it I think it is not working well because i have change my phone   Full Review   
  it's good application, accurate and helpful with previous days history as well. I am quite satisfied with it   Full Review   
  Doesn't count to well, takes not to much battery though, impossible to put your face on the screen though, please fix   Full Review
title: Noom Walk Pedometer

reviews:
Just what I needed I have started working out and needed a way to check my heart for calorie burn. Didn't want to spend $$$ for a fancy monitor.  I take 3 during a workout to get an estimate.  Close enough for my needs!   Full Review   
  Worked well on my Samsung mobiles.... now i'am using Lenovo K3 note, in that the flash light is on for a second and immediately turned off. plz help me in this. I'll give u 5 stars.   Full Review   
  Data not showing up in Google Fit. Checkbox ticked in settings. Google Fit has this app in the list of connected apps. But it's still keeps mum about heart rate.  Did I just give you the right to slurp up my data and copy it to your servers?   Full Review   
 B.S. Doesn't work at all. I have very high b.p. along with a high heart rate. For 6 years my heart rate has never been under 115 and higher. Well according to this app. I'm almost dead. I have a heart rate of only 40. Too funny.   Full Review   
 Helped my Dr's diagnose an arrhythmia I have been in the hospital on telemetry monitoring & my M.D. was VERY impressed with the accuracy of this app. I have a history of a-fib but suddenly developed episodes of bradycardia that caused my heart rate to drop into the 30's. EKG'S didn't catch it because they only take a "snap shot" of a 12 second window of your heart's activity. 24 hour Holter monitor didn't pick it up because it didn't happen EVERY day. With this app, the Dr was able to SEE what my monitoring hadn't picked up in the hospital!   Full Review   
  I rely on the readings daily,  being on beta-blockers with Heart Disease made it a good App to download and try. I have had no problems with it so far plus saving past readings/history is very handy   Full Review   
 Dont wanna rate..cause..it doesnt make any sense thar a laser beam can measure heart rate Fake application   Full Review   
 What happened? I used to love this app until several updates ago. It worked perfectly but then stopped detecting my pulse. While trying to detect, the numbers jump all over from extreme highs to extreme lows but never leveling out enough to even start the count down timer... The longer it takes, the hotter that light becomes. My longest wait time was just shy of 6 minutes... What happened?   Full Review   
 Fast and accurate on note3 You can feel the side of your neck and feel the same beat as your camera is measuring from your finger so anyone can check their accuracy doubts by doing the same with their device   Full Review   
  My Galaxy Note 4 got extremely hot when I tried using it, locked up my phone as well.  Uninstalling!   Full Review   
 Problems with Google Fit It would be a 5 stars app if the measures will be recorded in Google Fit, it just doesnt record the measures. It would be nice to have an option to set when you want to start the measure not just autoplay. The design could be slightly better but thats ok.   Full Review   
 LOL Cool graphics and makes you believe it works - sure it measures your heart beat, but the number you get is wrong! Have taken my results from this app and used both a brachial and carotid artery  pulse check, and both are nowhere near the number given by this app. The app works, sure, but it doesn't give you accurate results. Stick to checking your pulse using a stopwatch....since you're reading this on your phone anyways.   Full Review   
 My doctor recommended this application After a trip to the hospital with a rapid heartbeat I was afraid of a repeat performance. My doctor showed me this app on his phone and I downloaded it in his office. Now I can monitor my heartbeat and know when to be concerned.  Only gave it four stars because of the ads, although they are the least anoying of any app I have.   Full Review   
 It works, but the flash light hurts. This app is great and the idea is awesome. But there is problem. Keeping the finger so close to the flash light which is constantly on definitely hurts.   Full Review   
 Autonomic Disorder! I have Dysautonomia which causes a racing heart. The app will not correctly clock anything in the triple digits which I find aggravating because mine usually is! Kids love it though and it works for them!   Full Review   
 Really works I'm a registered  nurse and I have compared the results with my own pulse rate and rhythm  and "yes" it is accurate. I have an arrhythmia so I monitor myself  frequently.   Full Review   
 Wildly Incorrect Had my heart rate checked by a nurse 15 and 10 minutes before using app - both times it was 113. The app said I was at 68.   Full Review   
 The App Works Well and I used to use it so much that I bought the upgrade. Sadly when I did the same with my cell phone the app didn't make it. Now I'm back to the free one. A downgrade. Boo. Plus there isn't an obvious way to contact the company about it so....now you know.   Full Review   
 Okay if you are not moving. Why cant I get a HR while I am running? Does anyone else have this trouble? Great for resting heart rate but ever since I have used this app its never worked for when I am working out/moving : bicycling,  running even walking. I have to stop then it takes so long to get a reading my heart rate has lowered which misses the point. Anyone else have these issues? It happens on android and apple phones   Full Review   
 Works well Easy to use, accurate, but ads are really annoying as they pop before you can focus on actual results. Paying for ad free is worth it if plan to use for more than spot checking HR during exercise or to determine resting HR   Full Review   
 Does not work It gives random numbers. One minute my heart rate is 60 the other minute 120! And the flashing light really hurts!!   Full Review   
 It works All these skrubz bitching about how it doesnt work -_- works fine for me gave me a rate of 77 bpm I checked my pulse for 15 sec and got 19*4=76 its been pretty consistent for me.   Full Review   
 Nice app Surprisingly accurate. (Compared results with Polar heart rate monitor).        The scanner sometimes gets stuck trying to identify a reliable pattern.   Full Review   
 Works good enough It does give a very good indication of ones heart rate. I do not take it for 100% correct, but it is very close. Perfect to check heart rate for general tracking (I use it to check if my heart rate is not going out of rhythm).   Full Review   
 It really does it I wa.s skeptical using it. But when i did, it really did work. I dont know if it really is actual but yeah i can see my finger's color popping red and light red so i guess it really works   Full Review   
 It works well, but the ads are intrusive. It works great, I've compared it to a lot of other devices and it is accurate. I don't like the intrusive advertising, especially when showing the app to others.   Full Review   
 Useful Whn you're on the go this is useful i have a friend with heart problems i recommended him this and he is using it ever since   Full Review   
 I know it works because... When I relax and took my pulse five times I got around the same result ,but when I hold my breath the results changed, my heart rate begin to drop. My heart rate is a 72 when I'm relaxing and when I hold my breathe it drop to a 67. But they need to step their game, and add more stuff other than the fact that you can check your heart. Wow!   Full Review   
 Handy and Accurate App. A very useful and much needed app. I compared it to a regular wrist blood pressure / heart rate cuff and it is accurate within 1 or 2 bpm. Highly recommend!   Full Review   
 Works as advertised, droid turbo Not sure about the google sync issues I don't have that, gives consistent and accurate reading, is pretty spot on between the old fashion method with finger to wrist. I will be using this to track my morning resting HR to track workout recovery   Full Review   
 Doesnt work! How can it keep ranging from low then high! And i had it on my couch didn't it can have pulse.  The only accuracy you can is if you buy a partable bpm machine. Or doctor vist not from an phone app   Full Review   
  Sync issues - Google Fit sync only happens if you do a second heart rate check. I'll buy the app if the developer fixes Google Fit sync. The same issue has been reported with the paid version.  Advice:  Don't put your finger over the flash -- it hurts. Just put your finger over the camera lens.   Full Review   
 Seem To do what it says. Can't expect it to be as accurate as the strap but seems to be in the range as far as my heart rate goes. Was going to update to the paid version but that hasn't been updated in a very long while and this needs updating also.   Full Review   
 Accurate I compared resting heart rate and workout hear rate with my cardiology readings and they matched within 2 to 3 beats. But sometimes when I do more vigorous workouts it's useless.   Full Review   
 Disappointed :( Downloaded it to use for a science fair project.  Appeared to work first time.  After that it starts counting down the 10 seconds then jumps back to 10 seconds...I can stand/sit for a minute and it just keeps doing that: 67bpm...71bpm...then 55bpm...and up to 79 etc...same thing on three other family members (they gave up waiting).  I have tried not pressing too hard, different finger position.  Doesn't matter.  Too inconsistent for what I need it for.   Full Review   
 It's Great It might be a toy. To some? But I did a follow up with my BP machine and it hit it's mark. Plus it will help me keep track for my doctor! So yes get the download.   Full Review   
 Works great Very accurate,  i have an s5 that has a dedicated heart rate sensor and this one which uses the flash had basically the same reading so that tells me this works.   Full Review   
 Lens gets hot The lens gets really hot, don't know if that's good for us. Also it sometimes gets stuck during the measuring process and never finishes the countdown to 0s. Good app but there's room for improvement.   Full Review   
  I was in the middle of having a mini stroke and it gave me a normal heart rate. Take your finger away and it still reads. It's a fake   Full Review   
 The Best Every fitness guru needs this app. I love how quick and simple it is, with no annoying $$$ or signing up for an account. Definitely a handy device! (No pun intended).   Full Review
title: Instant Heart Rate

reviews:
Its awesome. But dont go pro. Really helpful!!!!! Keeps u motivated. Although going pro doesn't add anything new to this app. So stick to the free version. And it keeps crashing every now and then.   Full Review   
 Great app for tracking activity Great for tracking my parkruns. Helps maintain motivation. I run on an old smartphone so I don't worry too much about rain or mud! Would like it to auto start my music when I start an activity. #LittleStokePark #NoSurrender   Full Review   
 Full Featured and Easy to use I can track bicycling, running, indoor workouts, and walks.  Gives inspiring analysis of how I'm doing against my historical workouts.  Update to the UI is nice, and it has a more modern look now   Full Review   
 Great tool, simple to use Very straightforward and easy to use. Works perfectly. This definitely makes seeing your progress very easy.   Full Review   
 Sorry could not connect to RunKeeper This is all have been reading for last couple of days. Overall a great app but  these repeated error messages are getting on my nerves.   Full Review   
 Best running app! They keep getting better and better!   Full Review   
 Fantastic app and simple to use I am trying to improve the distance I can run and time I'm doing, so finding this app very helpful in tracking my training   Full Review   
 Very useful This application provides all the basic information needed to monitor results of workouts.   Full Review   
  Missing manual lap function. Would be nice to have vibration as choice instead of audio feedback.   Full Review   
  Love using this for my walks and bicycle rides. It tracks to my fitness pal too. Bonus.   Full Review   
 Thank you! Couldn't be any better free version! Thanks again :)   Full Review   
 It gives wrong data in terms of distance This has been a  problem since last 2 months, you pause an activity walk for say .50 kms , resume activity and these .50 kms will be added in your activity.. Also if you keep the phone in pocket gps doesn't track the activity and distance gets less...   Full Review   
 So far, so good Only used for 1 run so far ... seems fairly good   Full Review   
 Reliable, easy to use Had to uninstall and re-install as the latest up-date messed with my GPS. Since re- installed works perfectly.   Full Review   
  Just make some changes like strava social   Full Review   
  A very good running out the keeps track of your all your runs   Full Review   
 Works great I love using this app, it is very simple and helps me to make and keep goals weekly. There are little challenges, and you can share on social media if you'd like. Make sure to let the app run for a minute when you first turn it on so the GPS works properly.   Full Review   
 Very disappointed How can I run 5.25km,you register 0.34km   Full Review   
 Got me running!! Probably this is the app I had been waiting that was destined to get my lazy butt running.... Great job guys! Will see if I should buy one of your plans if I don't improve much...   Full Review   
 Runkeeper IS a keeper! I love this app when I'm running outdoors. It is accurate and easy to use. It also nicely tells you when you've been inactive and encourages you to get back on track.   Full Review   
 Ottimo Con un buon GPS si sa realmente la propria attività   Full Review   
 Great app I use this app every day.   Full Review   
 Pretty good Swapped from mapmyrun after it stopped syncing some runs. This has been faultless so far. Like the reporting options on the website   Full Review   
  Perfect tracking in all departments, so reliable.   Full Review   
 Awesome running app The best running app by far   Full Review   
 Great application I love this running application.  I'd like to see more integration with music library to be able to control my running music without having to switch apps mid run.  I'd like to see my pace shown on the map visually to see where my show points are instead of having to guess.  Thanks.   Full Review   
 Favorite app! Love that it tracks everything!   Full Review   
 Great app Can't live without it 😊😊😊   Full Review   
 Very useful app Just go for it...   Full Review   
 Droid turbo Not always so accurate, somewhat expected   Full Review   
 Cannot add images I run using Garmin watch. After the activity is synced from Garmin to Runkeeper, I cannot add images to the activity.   Full Review   
  Awesome! Ties in with mapmyfitness too   Full Review   
 Great Fitness App. Great for tracking multiple activities, fitness and progress.   Full Review   
 Great run tracker! The gps works great with my Samsung s6. Shows all my stats like distance and times with grafts. Easy to turn on and go.   Full Review   
 Simple and motivating Great to track outdoors stuff, easy manual entry for indoors activities too. Keeps me on track   Full Review   
  Best run app around. Very accurate I use it all the time.   Full Review   
 Great app Easy to use.  Multiple options and settings to customize the experience!   Full Review   
  I use it quite a lot   Full Review   
  Now I can spinn   Full Review   
 Great For Running Love it.....tracks my runs and gives me great feedback!   Full Review
title: Runkeeper - GPS Track Run Walk

reviews:
Marathon here I come! In the past year I have dropped 100 lbs using clean eating by calories & macro balance on MyFitnessPal and running and exercise tracking on MapMyFitness. I run my 2nd marathon in a few days and feel great!  Thanks for helping a middle-aged, obese male feel like his twenties again!   Full Review   
 Tried it The map (gps) portion did not work.  It left off 2/3 of the walk.  We walked about 3 miles and it only log 0.9 miles with a different route.  Not sure what to use it for if your figures are inaccurate.   Full Review   
  Good for mapping but you have to stop and select each activity type as you go which makes it a bit cumbersome when running then walking on the same route. Going to try this out a bit longer before deciding if I'll switch back to Fit.   Full Review   
 Awesome Great app! Any way you can update to add P90X3 & Focus T25 or Body Beast?   Full Review   
 Underarmour  is lit I've used alot of fitness apps and by far under Armour app is the top go to pick for me it's intuitive and super easy to use and it calls out your milage and pace which is genius since you don't need to stop and manually check I highly recommend this product to anyone who hikes,walks,freeruns,and runners my one and only gripe about this app is that it scares you when it calls out your data other than that it's amazing   Full Review   
 A very well-rounded app I use a Samsung Galaxy Note 4.  It tracks you very well in the way that it indicates.  The food / nutritional section is not user-friendly. You try to be pacific as possible with food descriptions/vendors and it gives you something that you didn't describe so you try again and sometimes again ... frustrating. I gave up on it. It could have some other tools that you use and don't  have to pay for.   I would hate to buy this app and have other disappointments. But overall the apps not bad.   Full Review   
  Just an update from my last review below. Walgreens will no longer link to MapMyFitness. I think the MMF app is great. You can check out your history for over a year and you get weekly, monthly, and annual updates as well as occasional "fitness flashbacks" for special achievements, all with the free app. I do think the workout types available have been reduced. Just lately I've been having difficulty with the app pausing and restarting in the middle of a walk. I'm attempting to uninstall and reinstall to see if that helps. Finally, I wish the logout was one easy step from your workout. You have to go back to a menu screen and go all the way to the bottom to find logout. Overall still terrific.  Walgreen's revamped their Balance Rewards for healthy choices and can link with devices and apps, including Map My Fitness that covers everything. I've been using it for over a year and think it's great. They've helped me out when I had problems with the Walgreens sync and I love the weekly feedback. Map just got taken over by Under Armour and I've had problems with the app forgetting my password even after it reset. I just uninstalled.and reinstalled and it was fine but an annoyance.   Full Review   
  5 stars for a great application! I use Mapmyride but it's the same thing. I had one problem with it, the GPS wouldn't map me correctly but I asked for help and got it from their service people (who did a great job.) DO NOT use any power saving settings on your phone and it will map perfectly. I love that it keeps me informed while I'm working out so I know how many calories, how far etc. I can't say enough good things and I use it for free. I have this connected to Myfitnesspal and my UP3 health band and it all works pretty seamlessly together.   Full Review   
 Great app Easy to use and very helpful app. I gave 4 stars only because it's lack of my favourite roller-blades skating.   Full Review   
 Live and breathe by it I've used several over 15 years of being a fitness enthusiast. The connectivity with other apps and services makes this indispensable.   Full Review   
 App connection is awful I've been fighting with connecting UP, MapMyFitness, and MyFitnessPal and it's awful. The app can't handle a pop-up that takes it out of focus and retain it's state on resume. So if you have multi-factor authentication enabled for FB, don't expect things to work well for you if that's the claim you like to use as your authentication method. Aside from that, it keeps telling me that my info for the other apps is incorrect. I just kept doing out over and over and eventually one worked. Maybe if I keep at it..   Full Review   
 Excellent, the only app you'll need for all your workouts This has been a great app. I like it because I do wide range of exercises and sports, and I like it that I can track all of them with one app as well as record my bike routes and running routes via the GPS feature. The auto pause feature makes tracking the actual time moving a breeze. My only request is that they add an option under Activity so one can enter in their own custom options. Sometimes I find it limiting what pre-loaded Activities are available to choose from. Otherwise I'd rate this app 5 stars.   Full Review   
 Good when it works It worked great when I first downloaded it but the nutrition side of it stopped working me which is annoying. But other than that very good for keeping track and motivated.   Full Review   
 OK but I've had some issues The app in itself is good but I've had various issues from the beginning: (1) I couldn't login via Facebook as it offered because it just kept going back to the login screen (2) It has shut down randomly a few times when I've just started working out (3) It doesn't always communicate with MyFitnessPal as to the correct kilojoule/calorie amount burnt e.g. MapMyFitness says I've burnt 200 calories, but in My Fitness Pal it days a significantly lesser amount has been burnt (this could be issue with MFP though)   Full Review   
 Inconsistent I like the app and use it a lot but if I run the same route, the distance can be (isn't always but can be...) off by a fair amount.   Full Review   
 Works for me Provides features I need to track distance, pace, and variety of workout formats. It may have ability to give me course directions on the go when I want to run or bike a predetermined route, but I haven't figured out how to do that yet.   Full Review   
 Excellent Great app easy connection to other apps & fitness trackers easy loading...no complaints as of yet.   Full Review   
 Great way to track your fitness. Great app to track and share your fitness activity. Good way to challenge and motivate friends to get active.   Full Review   
 Inaccurate I walked 4.4 miles and 56 mins and the app said I did 1.2 miles and 25 mins,linked it to Bounts to earn points,obviously they don't want to give out to many   Full Review   
 My new trainer MapMyFitness is a great way to keep up with what you are doing and help you push yourself harder.   Full Review   
  No issues with Mapping or Logging of my walk on this occasion (1st time using this app). I'll give it a month and add more comments. But 5 star for now.   Full Review   
  Used to work well but now GPS stops 5 mins into a run and doest track properly   Full Review   
 Mapping My Fitness Great Fitness App which is a good aid for gauging your fitness progression. App has been malfunctioning by not letting me see activity feed or suggested friends, Im uninstalling then reinstalling   Full Review   
 Simply awesome, This app helps me track my activities like none other I've tried before, connectivity is the key for me,  I love it!   updated version is even better! Using it over a year now and I love it still just as much!   Full Review   
 GPS no longer working Update: gps is no longer working since I upgraded to an s7. No longer accurately tracks my walks. Very disappointed use to love this app.   Full Review   
 Will not sync to misfit Claims to work but fails to connect and just sits at loading screen   Full Review   
 It works Works nicely , I just wish it wouldn't keep asking for reviews when I have already reviewed it.   Full Review   
 Perfect for keeping me in line :) A great app with a rewards incentive for keeping to workout plans and challenges. Keeps you in line with times and logs workouts, GPS system is right on the button. The best app I have in my phone 5*****   Full Review   
 Easy to use Easy to use, my favorite app for tracking hikes and walks. I even use the map on trails as a guide so I don't get lost lol. Great app!   Full Review   
 Great App Easy to use and very motivating. I love it   Full Review   
 Gps On a high school track 1600 meters is a mile but the app says 1400 meters is a mile so I dont trust the distance at all but I like the training plan and the pro version is free is you have a anytime fitness membership   Full Review   
  This is a great tool to measure and track.   I also use it to get  walking/riding/rucking routes in parts of the world that are new to me.   Syncs pretty well, although calorie burn doesn't translate well.   I have noticed that fitbit will pick up workouts from this app in real time, but fitbit won't take workouts that are logged after the fact.   Full Review   
 Perfect for me I love this app because it makes it easier to track my fitness goals. I am now able to focus on performing at my best rather than keeping times and trying to figure out my speed.   Full Review   
  Just started using this app and love it already. No more guessing how I did!   Full Review   
 Flexible Connectivity Calorie calculations for a vast array of cardiovascular activities and automatic linkage with My Fitness Pal.   Full Review   
 Great app Have been using this mainly for walking but love it. I like when it tells you how far you have fone and the calories you have used.   Full Review   
 So far so good Just used it for forst time. Seems pretty accurate   Full Review   
 Nice App Gave 4 stars because there's always room for improvement!   Full Review   
 If dont have it you gots to get it Tracks distance, time, calories burned, avg speed and elevation changes awesome app   Full Review   
 Accurate and easy to use Have used this app for a long time and think it is excellent.  Love how it syncs with my Jawbone Up 3.   Full Review
title: Map My Fitness Workout Trainer

reviews:
Lacking It is very hard to find foods served in restaurants. I always have to use another app to find the foods and value.   Full Review   
  Super easy to use. I like that I am becoming aware of the calories I eat. Even if I'm over goal, it teaches you which foods are monopolizing your calorie budget. They have an extensive database of restaurants and their menu items; So, if you eat out, it is easy to find your meal when you aren't able to scan it.   Full Review   
 Thumbs Up!!! So far I deleted all of my other weight loss apps and find this app the best. Very organized accurate and motivating.   Full Review   
 Ad placement on new update I know you guys need to make your money and I've been using your app since WAY back when you guys first came out and have enjoyed this app immensely, but your ad placement is getting out of hand. Placing an ad on the top of the log page is SO annoying and highly distracting. It also seems to re-load at a pretty constant rate which leads me to think it's using my data unnecessarily. Be creative with your ad placement and not look like you only care about us a revenue source.   Full Review   
 Ads / overpriced subscription I've been a user of this app for a long time. I understand the need to monetize, but it's starting to get a bit out of hand. Premium is too expensive, and now there are ads cluttering up the UI. Not a good move.   Full Review   
 Great app! It took a little getting used to, but once you get the hang of it this is a great app! It is easy to use & a very effective weight loss tool. I'm already down 29 lbs.   Full Review   
  My favorite health app!  It has been very useful to me and my health goals.  I love that you can make recipes that combines ingredients and divides it into servings, helping out the home-cook!  It has an extensive database, part of which is crowd-sourced.  Crowd-sourcing does have its downfalls (sometimes items are inaccurate), but this app compensates by allowing you to edit food details, for instance, after scanning a barcode.  Sometimes it lacks restaurant items, but you can enter a custom item (such as something you looked up on google) and that is good enough for me.  The custom options really make the app!  Besides those benefits, this is the one app I love updating.  The team actually writes what is being improved in the "what's new" section, making it seem like someone actually cares and is working on real problems.  The developers seem to actually listen to complaints and FIX the problems!  Keep up the good work guys!   Full Review   
 Better than MFP I definitely find the UI and UX better than MFP. Easier to use, more intuitive, better looking, less obtrusive ads and sponsored content. Only thing missing is Garmin connect communication! Definitely bump up to 5 stars with that functionality.   Full Review   
 Great App Love this app. Downloaded after reading bad reviews about weight watchers. It is easy to use and lots of great features. My favorite is the barcode scanner. It makes it easy to add the calories onto my daily log. I also love that I could link my activity tracker to the app. It adds my calories earned from exercise. So great. Download it, you won't regret it. I am thinking that I might purchase the premium app based on how great the free version is.   Full Review   
  After 3 attempts to resolve the problem...linking with Google Fit "breaks" the app.  You lose the ability to scan or manually search for foods to enter and the app locks up.  The developers are aware of this, but my last email response stated that they hadn't identified the "glitch" so they can't estimate when it will be resolved and to keep an eye on updates in the Google Play store.  As a paid subscriber that only paid for the sync ability, I'm not happy.  They extended my membership 2 months as compensation, but that was 2 months ago and the app is still not working.  If I have to use an app that won't sync with Google Fit I might as well go back to MyNetDiary since it has far superior Diabetes tracking and reporting.   Full Review   
 Good app This app kept me accountable for my 30-lb weight loss, and continues to be the best thing I have done for my health. I like the layout and ease of use, and as a result, I've never lost motivation to log my food everyday.   Full Review   
 Love it! This app really keeps you on track.. It's super easy to use and when I do follow it.. I Lose weight! I have recommended it to several friends! I think there are a few minor bugs with sending friend invites and I wish you were able to post pictures in the comment field . especially for the challenges. . All in all.... GREAT APP!   Full Review   
 Could be better for android Easy to use food tracker, but doesn't sync with samsung gear, so it doesn't recognize my steps.  Food calorie counts with Android seem off in many cases. Worked much better with my IPhone.   Full Review   
 Excellent program After I found how to work with its unfriendly interface I was amazed how powerful is it. There are complete list of foods and dishes including international. Thank you for this awesome software!!!   Full Review   
 Love the interface! I used to track calories with MyFitnessPal, but I found the interface on that app cumbersome and difficult to use. I really like the interface on Lose It!   Full Review   
 Good app, bad localization for Android. This app is rather intelligent, but fails 3/4 times to let me search up my entries on strong 50 MB WiFi. Please fix.   Full Review   
  My last diet i used my fitness pal. These are the best 2 apps for diet control and i suppose it would be personal preference between the two.   Full Review   
 Good but errors I cannot change So having to uninstall. Confused, it asked for my weight etc at the startup, once on the app it's telling me I weigh 13kg that's TWO stone so I need to eat 3000 calories a day. I entered the correct weight, it won't let me change it or I can't find an option to do so in all of the settings. If that part was cleared up then sure it seems like a great app with the pie charts and calorie search/goals etc   Full Review   
 Buggy This is extremely buggy.  Search doesn't work.  Can't pull up right foods. Repetitive foods and many have different calorie counts.   Full Review   
 Love it! I cannot say enough good things about Lose it. I recommend it (highly) to anyone who wants to safely lose weight at a healthy rate. Even the "free" app is pretty darn good if you ask me. Much better than other weight loss/activity tracking apps I have tried. Thanks Lose it!   Full Review   
 Keep track and lose as much as you want Love this, I've done well with this app. Gonna go strong again!   Full Review   
 Not quite as user friendly as other aps I've been using Noom for about a year,  and functionality of the two aps are nearly identical. I tried LoseIt as it works with the Microsoft Band 2. However, LoseIt is a far chunkier UI (compared to Noom) and it's food item search is intolerably slow,  both with on line wifi and offline. On the plus side,  it's recipes are better, and it's integration with the Microsoft health service strong.   Full Review   
 Half done I dont need to lose weight i need to gain it i like the food tracking portion of this app but unfortunately it isnt geared towards my health goals of gaining weight hopefully you guys consider not everyone is over weight some people are on the opposite side of the spectrum   Full Review   
 Works for me! But... This app has been useful to me for two years+ in logging food. However...now less user-friendly, more complicated to enter foods and barcode button located too close to other feature. Using Android on phone.   Full Review   
 Incorrect information Has nice some features. Soon as I downloaded I scanned several items in my kitchen...unfortunately it was incorrect on the calories on several items, and not by a small amount. Being several hundred calories off in a diet app makes it hard to trust.   Full Review   
 Great! I love that you can use the barcode to log calories....what I would love to tweak, would be logging excersise calories burned, because there is a differnce in your number to what I abctually burn. I would love it if you were able to change the number and allow you to type in notes like cardio trainer app. I went from a 4 star to a 3 star due to me switching from a fitbit to a Garmin Vivofit HR and lose it does not sync with Garmin products, super dissapointing.   Full Review   
 Great App but it's frustratingly slow at times I switched from Myfitnesspal app to this. I like it overall but when searching the food database, I find it to be way too slow. There should be an option to download the food database to the app and for it to update the cached database automatically. This would speed up searches greatly and I believe fix my issues.   Full Review   
 Not accurate always Sometimes when I log food it doesn't add it to my daily total and says I have eaten less calories than I have. For example yesterday it only counted my breakfast even though I logged lunch and dinner and snacks   Full Review   
 Great app!!!! I lost some weight with this but i ended up regainingit all back when i uninstalled it   Full Review   
  Easy etc.  Wish they hadn't gone with prime paid features though.   Full Review   
 Samsung Gear Will Lose It ever be able to sync with the Samsung Gear? That's is the activity tracker I use. And it would be great if I could use 1 app.   Full Review   
  Plz i want the full apps make it free i mean the options of pro the fre version is just a joke plz i give u 5star to improve it just a little bit like pro thx alot   Full Review   
 Great Best app like this out there! Really easy to use and very helpful.   Full Review   
 Won't let me upgrade I've been trying to upgrade to.premium however all it does is say loading...foreverrr. I sat there 30mins with it saying loading. Closed out restarted same thing.   Full Review   
  Love the app,  want to upgrade and it just says "loading" forever!   Full Review   
  love it, this app has helped me tremendously on how to eat in portions.   Full Review   
 Lost 45lbs so far Information is power and "Lose It" gives you power to make weight loss easier. Thousands of items are already in their database waiting for you to pull up and log in(or enter custom foods) Set a weight loss target and Lose it will give you a daily calorie budget to meet that goal. Enter your calories burned off by exercise and get credit to eat more (or not and lose faster). Buy the premium upgrade and link your favored exercise tracking device and "Lose It" will automatically update your calories burned.   Full Review   
 New update Not a fan of the new update. I've been using the app for 4 years now and found it easily accessible . You could pull it out and quickly log your meal in before anybody saw you. (I didn't like my friends knowing that I worried about my weight). Since the update, the app tends to lag and it takes longer to log in. I love the app and hope they address the issue.   Full Review   
  Too big widthwise for device, no way to add what I'm eating to log.   Full Review   
 Good Stuff Super easy to navigate with a huge database of foods to choose from. Also, whoever types the script for "What's New" in the Play Store is absolutely hilarious.   Full Review
title: Lose It!

reviews:
Awesome app! As a working mother, i have no time for workouts.. coz too busy with juggling with kids, housework and my job. So this app helps me to be able to exercise even if its 5mins.. i just switch on what i felt like doing like cardio.. and wala.. everything complete in 5 mins. Totally recommended for busy people. :)   Full Review   
 Frozen It's constantly freezing the videos either won't play or won't show while playing.  I was really looking forward to using this app but I'll have to remove it since it does not work   Full Review   
 GREAT WORKOUTS. REALLY WORKS! I LOVE THIS APP! I supplement Sworkit with jogging, walking and gym. I wake up and turn on my app. I really sweat and my muscles ache next day. I also learned new exercises. I REALLY REALLY recommend this app!   Full Review   
 The burn means it's working I have been working out on my own for some months, but this app is a nice way to break up my routine and give it some variation. I like that I can focus on different things and it helps me specifically work towards my goals.   Full Review   
 So many bugs 1 month ago, the app opened so much faster as compared to now. The current version is TERRIBLY SLOW, and it's just this app. In addition, why is it that the iOS version has the 100% music volume option but Google Play version doesn't????? This is WAY TOO MUCH   Full Review   
 Love I love the app, and I use it quite a bit. This app helps you be in shape, while being motivated. The only thing I'd change is have a few workouts for free, and then the rest cost money, because the pre-made ones that are longer, tell them I like to do but some of them I wouldn't so I'd like a few of them to be free.   Full Review   
 Great workout Able to customize your workout. Very short intervals so the time goes by fast. Easy to follow along to while, I workout while I watch my TV shows. Very easy to use, no annoying ads. 😊   Full Review   
 I wish i could rate 5 stars I love this app except when I am in the middle of a workout the screen will go black so I cannot see how to do the next exercise. If that issue gets resolved I would love to come back and redo my rating.   Full Review   
 It freezes I used it for the first time which worked perfectly fine, but then the second time I tried to use it. It won't just play the workout. Please fix this issue. Thanks.   Full Review   
  Nice customabilty and its easy to use the quick pace really makes me feel like im getting a good workout even in a short amount of time   Full Review   
 Convenient I can do a quick workout anytime of the day or a long workout when I'm at home. Best thing is it does not require any equipment. If you are looking to get bulky then this is not for you, but to stay lean and fit, then it's the way to go.   Full Review   
 Helpful app The app is very good.  I like it because it uses a variety of exercises instead of just boring you with limited exercises.  It really does make you sweat   Full Review   
 I love this While I'm watching TV I can get a work out in to feel a little less guilty about watching tv. It's great that I have to pay no attention to my ohone, just listen to the voice. Perfect for everyone!   Full Review   
 Fix your pricing model! You must be kidding me! $5 a month for this? I had the upgraded version on iOS and now I moved to Android, so I have to pay monthy? All I want is a decent workout without annoying voice to ask me to upgrade everytime. This is useless.   Full Review   
 Absolutely love it I love it it lets me know when I should work out again every day and I hated working out before this app but truly I'm in love with what my body is becoming my arms are getting stronger I'm losing weight like I wanted to and I'm getting fit personally if you're looking for an app get this one you won't regret it   Full Review   
 One of the best Amazing app so many work out for different things differently one of the best   Full Review   
 Just one problem. Otherwise best app. In India we can't download Spotify. It'd be a bless if you let us play our own playlist.😻   Full Review   
 Very good app Just a bit laggy on my xperia z3 and power hog too. customer service is top notch even for free user.   Full Review   
 The best I have never wrote a feedback on any application, but I couldn't help myself. This is the best ever; very easy to use, helps fit in a 5-minute workout, very encouraging and entertaining. I love it. If only you could add an option that enables participants to work on any specific body part they want. Thank you for such an amazing application.   Full Review   
 Love this app This is so helpful when I don't have time to go to the gym or just prefer to stay home. There are so many options and they show you exactly how to do each excersize.   Full Review   
 Works well and is fun I am lazy, but this makes it fun to work out as little as 5 minutes at a time if that's all I'm willing to do.   Full Review   
 It pretty good I would give it a 5 star but is missing some back and bicep excersices like pull-ups, etc,  I've the basic version as I just started using it and think very good and has much of the possible things you can do without a gym or equipment   Full Review   
 Needs to work in background While I find the workouts are great, this app needs to work with the screen off. It so burns the battery down and heats up the phone, that my sweat literally evaporates when it falls on my phone.   Full Review   
 Take No excuse for fitness app ! Beginning with the app, definitely a motivation...love the flexibility and simplicity in the design of the exercise regimes...absolute pro!!!   Full Review   
  Best ever!! Love the way it is set up! Love that it keeps track of my workouts and encourages me.  Love it!!!   Full Review   
 Repetitive I love the idea of this app but I HATE how redundant it is. I can do a 10 minute workout and get the same exercise 4 times! It needs some more variety. The sample size they pick exercises from is just too small.   Full Review   
 Heats my phone Good workout app but heats my phone battery right up, slows my phone right down, which is a problem when it stops Google play music (on random occasions), and then  finishes my workout (as if never started) when I leave the app to restart my music   Full Review   
 Has stopped functioning Love the app but cannot get past the workout time screen since the cynogen mod marshmallow update for the one plus one. Will change to a 5 star once this is resolved   Full Review   
 Great motivation! With this app I have no more excuses for not working out. I can do it from anywhere!   Full Review   
 Most comprehensive at home workout app With over 200 exercises, dozens of routines to choose from, and being able to custom design your own routines and times, I felt like a kid in a candy store. The reason I gave it only 4 stars is because it doesn't allow for continuous music play during the workouts.  For example, whenever the app transitions to a new exercise, background music would be paused, which is very frustrating. The upgrades to the app still hasn't addressed this. Otherwise, the app is excellent.   Full Review   
 30 second intervals only on free version The only interval you get on the free app is 30 second intervals.  This is great for cardio but not for building muscle.   Full Review   
 Easy to use Clear direction for pilates.   Assumes some level of knowledge on the free  level.  The English  woman's  accent is rather clipped and school marmish...not a massive fan but probably  in the minority.  App ux is intuitive   Full Review   
 Sworkit Brilliant app! Just started using it and so far can't fault it, Many thanks!   Full Review   
 Love it Pretty dope app because it gives you 5 minute workouts which I use in sequence at the gym.   Full Review   
 Sooo much in love ❤ I've tried out all apps of this type but trust me this is the best one. Others try to charge you for each video or some don't even have videos. This app has no bullshit. Direct workouts. No other means of wasting time.. I am so much in love with this. Highly recommended!  GREAT JOB DEVELOPERS! KEEP UPDATING NEW WORKOUTS ☺   Full Review   
 Brilliant for busy people! I'm trying to build lots of productive new habits to improve my life. I wake up every morning at 5am now and exercise with Sworkit, practice Italian then study before heading to work for the day. This app makes such a good start to your day! It's really simple and you don't need any equipment and you can customise how many minutes your session lasts, you don't need to pay for those features.. The least you can do is give it a try :)   Full Review   
 Keep your body toned... Nice versatile app with good interface!   Full Review   
 Keeps freezing Didn't have trouble with it for the first few weeks but the past week or so it's been freezing up and I have to end and restart. Might have to just uninstall bc it's pointless if it keeps freezing.   Full Review   
 Amazing I like it when I only have a few minutes of time and that 5 min workout does the trick!   Full Review   
 It keeps in stopping I really liked this app before,  but it keeps on stopping and the videos won't show most of the time....  it's really disappointing!!! ￣︿￣   Full Review
title: Sworkit Personalized Workouts

reviews:
Free my App I loved this app (note past tense) and probably got my money's worth out of it.  However, after they accepted my money they now want my personal info or I cannot use the app I paid for????  This running program is free online and I can get by without Active or Kelloggs in my life.  By the way if they had offered a voluntary sign up for people who wanted to meet other runners that would have been great.   Full Review   
 Get Moving! I'm not one for cardio exercises, especially running, but this app doesn't try to kill you. It has the right ramp up even for non-cardio people.   Full Review   
 ATTENTION: Paid App WITH ads!!!! This WAS a phenomenal app! But when people pay their hard earned money for an app, there is an expectation that they will not be bombarded with advertising. With the new update, you're advertising unhealthy, overprocessed Special K!!! Their logo annoyingly laced throughout the app's interface. So disappointed! Luckily, I'm on the last day of the last week of the program. I was planning on purchasing your 10k app, but you lost a customer by pulling this BS, so that won't be happening. Good riddance!   Full Review   
 Paid for it and Used to love it Paid for it and Used to love it as I used to be able to use it without submitting my personal details but NO MORE!!!  So angry as I paid for this app on the assumption that I didn't but now they changed it. Unacceptable in my opinion.  Shame they spoilt such a good thing.  Uninstalling it now.  :-(   Full Review   
 Crap Requires network location service to be on,  so completely useless without privacy leaks or  away from area with coverage. Crashes often, won't remember started sessions on restart. Asks for license checks all the time, even in the middle of a run, then exits. Garbage and a waste of time.   Full Review   
 Really cross Have had an automatic update and now can't access the app without registering all my personal details.  I'm halfway through but can't continue. I PAID for the app. NOT HAPPY.   Full Review   
 Works fine, see no reason I should have to have an account It's work and it's easy to use. For no particular reason 3 weeks in it forced me to create an account. Thanks, I want more pointless emails to mark as spam.   Full Review   
 Bad update. Now requires registration. Can't even access your old data without   Full Review   
 Can't login!!!! I've used this app for a week it was great.  Now it asks me to login I do and it said you've already allowed facebook to connect it then says logging in.... but never does   Full Review   
 Getting moving As someone with a desk job that also loves gaming this app has gotten me off the computer chair and moving   Full Review   
 Forced login Why are you forcing me to create a login? Please make optional or refund.  A login wasn't part of the deal when I bought the app.   Full Review   
 New Update Fail! Imagine being at the track and firing this app up, as I've done countless times before and discovering that you're now required to register with some service. Failing to register, or skipping the sign-in is not an option. The latest update has ruined this app! I guess I'll have to look elsewhere for a better, more reliable app.   Full Review   
 Good App, but bad that advertising is in a payed app Overall the app has been helpful so far, but why am I being advertised Special K cereal in a payed app?! The biggest reason I buy payed apps is so I am not advertised to.   Full Review   
 Why must I now create an account that I paid for? I have no real desire to provide my personal info. I think it stinks you are holding my previous run data hostage unless I do.   Full Review   
 Sign in required Cant even run the app now without registration. Very bad!   Full Review   
 Amazing Makes me want to get out of bed and run!   Full Review   
 Love it! I feel like I'm getting back to when I used to run all the time!   Full Review   
 Update has ruined app Was great until it requires me to register. Goodbye to a once great fitness app.   Full Review   
 Register now required I can't access my info anymore without registering   Full Review   
 Advertising in a paid app Are you kidding me?   Full Review   
 Was great... ...Until special K showed up   Full Review   
 It works! Easy to follow and has me running!  Brilliant!   Full Review
