 Great App Simple to use and keeps me going. I would buy it again. Able to play Pandora and use app at the same time.   Full Review   
 Love this app!! Love how this app keeps up with running distance and pace and walking distance and pace.  Great app!!!!!   Full Review   
  Very easy to use and log accomplishments. Fun and gradual workouts.   Full Review   
 Made a man Love it   Full Review   
  Great   Full Review   
 Love It   Full Review   
  Amazing   Full Review   
 Awesome It is  a great  motivator.   Full Review   
 Why do you need my info I never needed an account before today, now you force me to sign up when I've already paid for this app? I'll be deleting it as soon as my workout programme is complete.   Full Review   
 Previous versions had big GPS issues Current works great with one minor exception. Tracking stops once prescribed workout finishes, but no credit if you do a little extra (say, distance to home). Still, a great app.   Full Review   
 GPS not tracking I like the pace of the app, but the GPS doesn't track right and it's a little discouraging because I can't see my improvement in distance.   Full Review   
 Milage tracking wrong. Every day the app says I've only gone a distance of .23 miles and the course on the map is only half right. My fitbit confirms I've gone over 2 miles every time. Now the totals will be wrong in the app when I've completed the whole training. I have checked to make sure my location and GPS are on every time. Other than that I love the voice cues and the way the workouts are broken up.   Full Review   
 Idea Please give us the option to make custom workouts - i would like sometimes to train to a certain rythm with this app but I have to keep skipping or going back between jogging and walking.   Full Review   
 I'm way less couch potato! Just the place and encouragement I needed.  I hate running, but want to try to love it!  This app just might get me there.  So far, so good.   Full Review   
 Love it This is a great app. I've had it for almost half a year and I haven't had any problems with it. I like the personalized trainers. My favorite is the zombie :-)   Full Review   
 You can do this! Not a runner; strongly dislike it. But I play roller derby and it's good for endurance. This moves slow and is doable even if you haven't done anything active in ages.  If you get overwhelmed, you can repeat earlier weeks. It's pretty awesome.   Full Review   
  I have just started running at the age 68 working toward my first 5k and this app is making the training so easy. I love it.   Full Review   
 Really good for those who hate running I'm not going to lie, I despise running. But I'm trying to get in shape and start running more and this app has been fantastic! I love that it tells you when you're halfway through so if you need to you can turn around. All in all I've had no problems with it and it helps get my butt moving   Full Review
title: Couch to 5K®

reviews:
If I can't play it on background, what's the point?                                                                                                           Edit: I take it back. These past few months, this app has saved my sleep and my studying countless times. Also, my initial review was uncivil (I could have said "I consider background play a basic feature" or something) so, sorry about that and thanks for responding with civility. I'm impressed :p   Full Review   
 Lots of sounds to choose from Great free sound machine. I use the fan sound every night to help get to sleep. With two little kids and a baby monitor that randomly crackles, this ap helps me minimize the false alarm disturbances and wake-up through the night. Highly reccomend this sound ap.   Full Review   
 Great, just... This app is great and does wonders to help me sleep, but I wish that some of the noises were not as repetitive because sometimes it's a distraction. Ex. The train ride has a click that plays at the end and makes it clear it's on repeat   Full Review   
 Can't sleep without it I love this app. It helps me sleep no matter where I am...in a car, at a friend's house, traveling. ..the same sounds soothe me to sleep anywhere. My 6 year old daughter loves it too.   Full Review   
 My Sanity! This app is literally my sanity... I especially love creating my own mixes, and it is the only thing I have found that combats my snoring partner. Also great sleep timer and alarm features. 10 out of 10!!   Full Review   
 Can't leave the app The noises are great but the fact that I can't leave the app without it pausing defeats the purpose for me. I use white noise to limit distractions and increase my productivity. I can't do that if I'm not able to use my phone for anything besides the white noise. There's not reason for this, today's smart phones are fully capable of multi tasking. I'll find a different app.   Full Review   
 Excellent I use this for white noise on a regular basis but there is a large selection of background noises to pick from. All of them have good quality sound. I've never had any faults associated with this app, runs like a champ.   Full Review   
 Love it! Slept with fan for over 20yrs and one night it died friend told me about app and I never thought I'd be so happy to not have my fan(white noise) I have Amazon jungle and ocean waves together its soooooooooo amazing how awesome it is to listen to even if I'm not going to sleep! I also love the different colors for the clock, love the purple one! Thank you for helping me to relax and sleep like a baby!   Full Review   
 Great for napping in the car I am a big believer in not driving while I'm drowsy. Because I commute about 25 minutes to work, I often consider napping before I go home. It helps me to have the background noise when there's a lot of traffic. It works great. ***Update: I also use it when flying to drown out talking and flight noise. A big advantage is that you can use it on airplane mode, so you don't use any data.   Full Review   
 What? Hair dryer? Clothes dryer?? Who finds those noises "relaxing"! Lol... Most of the other sounds are cool though.   Full Review   
 Perfect for its purpose This does exactly what I need it to do and nothing too much or too little. It comes with pre made mixes so you can get started right away before figuring out all out. Only takes a little time playing with it to get more used to adjusting and mixing the sounds. I love the options and how much you can change them. Great for meditation, teaching (when you need background noise for kids to work), sleeping, or other noise breaks. I use it every night and often in my classroom. Solid product.   Full Review   
 Sleep with it every night I am a very light sleeper and this app drowns out irritating noises and helps me get a peaceful night's rest. Love it!!! Been using it for more than 2 years.   Full Review   
 Versatile I originally downloaded this app for the white noise, but I discovered how much I like the other sounds, too. The night clock feature is also a huge plus, as my wife does not like a bright alarm clock. It would be nice if the loops were a little bit longer. My favorite noise is "boar swaying in water", but it repeats about every 10 seconds. On the whole, it's good, but there is room for improvement.   Full Review   
 Fab Why haven't I found this b4 now....soooo relaxing. Has so helped with my angry, annoying, debilitating tinnitus....thank you😉😉   Full Review   
 Love it I've used this on 4 upgraded phones and it's still my go-to! I love the different options, but my favorite is brown noise.   Full Review   
 Great Basically a nice, functional app that does what it says on the box. It really helps (for me) when there's distant intermittent noise at night. Putting on a sound loop that's regular and louder than the background masks it well. Good core sounds for users of the free app, interesting bells and whistles for those who'd like to pay for more.   Full Review   
 disappointing unhappy with notifications/calls stopping the app even with my "do not disturb" on the phone and "prevent interruptions" on the app. I also used to have an app that could play in the background while I used our apps but this one just stops. if the old app didn't mess up their sound bytes I would have never kept this one... frustrated but will have to make do until I find something better.   Full Review   
 Great sound quality I can't believe it does all this for free! Try "Create  Mix", you'll get just the sound you need. It even has a section to change pitch and volume of each sound separately in your mix. Great for sleeping in loud areas, or just to get to sleep. Has timers for sound to go on and/or off. Can play much  longer than 8 hours.   Full Review   
 HTC One M8 Absolutely love this app! I use my phone as my morning alarm, so it's nice to be able to use this as background noise while I sleep, and also set the alarm within the app to wake me up! Also, it's nice to be able to turn off ALL notifications/distractions if I want to, so napping mid-day is more convenient...   Full Review   
 A good 'go to' for sleep Really like that I can combine sounds (make a mix).  Definitely helps with deep sleep.  Occasionally cuts out for a quick moment, which can be interruptive; but overall it really is a great app!   Full Review   
 Helps me sleep! I won't fall asleep with any repetitive noise like a clock ticking. White noise machines & some apps had very short recordings and I could hear the loop. This app allows me to mix my own sounds, which masks the loop. I also love the timer feature which automatically shuts it off after a certain length of time, and the ability to fade out. I've used it everywhere. Love that my white noise is now mobile. App does "hiccup" (sound stops & starts again) especially when other apps update.   Full Review   
 Really helps I would have to have a fan on every night, even in the winter and my wife would always complain about it being too cold. This not only helps but gives options to what we can hear.   Full Review   
  I love this app. I can't sleep without it. A wide variety of sounds as well as timers make this app very helpful when it comes to falling asleep. And the fact that it plays when the screen is off is great for battery consumption. (It also helps drown out my husband's snoring!)   Full Review   
 The only app I use every single night This app puts me to sleep faster and sounder than anything ever. No longer kept awake by my own annoying inner monologs.  So happy I found this app.   Now I can sleep.   Full Review   
 Awesome app I use a fan at home, but when that is not convenient,  this app is perfect.  My favorite sounds are white noise, fan and extreme rain.   Full Review   
 Vastly improved my life FOR FREE I used to have trouble sleeping because any noise would wake me up.  Thanks to this app I always get great sleeps thus my life has vastly improved.  This app changed my life for the better.  Thank you so much for creating it.   Full Review   
 My Sanity I especially love the ability to create mixes to block out various noises. And the ability to record your own, download others from the web, the massive selection and the ease of use. Brilliant. The only thing I wish is that I could multitask on my phone with this app remaining open. It closes if you try to do anything else. Still give it 5 stars and highly recommend.   Full Review   
 Relaxing Love this app! There's so many different sounds even without the add on's. The timer is great. Very easy to use and with so many different sounds it's easy to find one you think is relaxing.   Full Review   
 Wonderful App Easy to use, great choices of sounds with the ability to mix and change everything to your liking FOR FREE. Love it!   Full Review   
 Use it every night! I love the customizable options. I love recording custom sounds and mixing them with other sounds. Another use idea: my wife and I are used to falling asleep to the sound of a particular fan. In the middle of winter, we don't want a fan blowing, so we play our looped recording in this app. Disclaimer: if you have a bad phone speaker you may not have good  results. My phone has a ln above average speaker so I've really enjoyed the experience.   Full Review   
 Noise noise everywhere Happy with it wish it came preloaded with a simple fan but the air conditioner noise works fine   Full Review   
 Great for Sleep Relaxing and beautiful. So easy to find the perfect sound that I want, and there is even an alarm I can use that shuts off the sound and has a pleasant alarm sound. No more morning stress attacks!   Full Review   
 Life saver Yesterday I had school and couldn't fall asleep turned on this and I fell asleep very soon   Full Review   
 Perfect!! Perfect for my week vacation at the coast.  Much easier to use on my mobile instead of packing my machine.  This is the second year I have used this app and I love the brown noise!!  5 Star App!!!   Full Review   
 I can't sleep without this app. I downloaded it when my kid was a baby but now I'm the one who can't sleep without it. I've been using it for nearly 5 years and never had a problem.   Full Review   
 Drowns out snoring! I'm a very light sleeper and am easily awoken. This app is a life-saver as it drowns out anything disruptive while I'm getting in my 8 hours of snooze-time....Something about the airplane mixed with crickets.... It works! Highly recommend!   Full Review   
 White noise Fall asleep with this every night no matter where I am. Originally  downloaded while I was out of town and love the choices of sounds.   Full Review   
 Involved The user interface takes some time to learn. It's more involved that I expected, but very customizable.   Full Review   
 Works Every Time I love the many options and timing controls. I fall asleep well every time I use this app!!   Full Review   
 Nice mellow and FREE tunes We use it almost every night at bedtime. Nice soothing sounds of many varieties.   Full Review
title: White Noise Free

reviews:
Gear S2 not supported Love my S2 and need to find a new fitness app as i read on the forums they have no plans to support samsung gear. Shame as Strava was the best imho.   Full Review   
  **UPDATE: May 2016 - Connectivity issues all sorted, some minor UI quirks, but otherwise great!! **  Bluetooth le  and Ant+ are in other free apps, much needed on this otherwise excellent app   Full Review   
  Clearly doesn't get on well with my Sony Xperia. Gives me completely bonkers readings with map lines all over the place and av speeds I wish I could run at (I run 1km and Strava says I've done 4km in 2 mins!) Sad.   Full Review   
  Was really reliable but have had a couple of issues recently when it straight lined me and didn't register some segments I gave my all on.   Full Review   
 Data now hard to read The newest version obscures data on the speed and HR data making it useless. Please go back asap.   Full Review   
 Strava number 1 Everyone will use strava to keep a record of their activities, a great all round app 👍👍   Full Review   
 Great app with on flaw... I love the Strava app all around. There is only one thing that I wish to be added: Cadence stats   Full Review   
 Issues creeping in Used to work great, but off late,  the app keeps crashing and I m not able to record starts for any of my rides properly   Full Review   
 Does the job well Countdown timer to start would be a good addition. Unreliable audio feedback. More activities needed   Full Review   
 Please fix issue with android wear. Problems with LG Urbane watch. Crashes all the time. Tries to record 2 rides at one.   Full Review   
 Ant+ yay Finally listened to your users, goof work guys. Great app, upgraded 2 stars to 5   Full Review   
 Very helpful Not only does it keep track of my activity it really helped me alot when I crashed my mountain bike. I had total amnesia but with the satellite map and graphs I knew how fast I was going and where I stopped going fast.   Full Review   
 Lg g2 Great but sometimes it won't share my activity on facebook when i click it   Full Review   
 Yay for cadence Wahoo Tickr X now tracking cadence in Strava. Not sure if this was Strava or Wahoo. Either way -Woot.   Full Review   
  Eh.  I like that you can edit maps, but unfortunately the power button gets pressed occasionally in my pocket which ends up stopping the session. There appears to be nothing in the settings to override this.  It also has a very high emphases on "following" and connecting this to your friends to a very annoying level. It's the default screen despite the fact that I will never use that feature. Never have with any fitness app.   Full Review   
 Excellent Thanks for making Strava work with the standalone GPS in my Sony SW3.  It's nicer to use now. Changed to 5 stars.   Full Review   
 Brilliant app I don't use the GPS function these days as I use a GPS watch, so can't comment on the accuracy, but my runs and rides are sync'd perfectly via to website and can be viewed in great detail on the app.   Full Review   
 Can't open app After update android to 6.0, I cannot open strava anymore!!! So sad.   Full Review   
 Was great and stable but ...... Now records but I cannot view activities or segments. Just crashes everytime. Cannot believe I paid. Refund?  Just updated and still just dies. How can I get a refund?   Full Review   
 Simplicity Great software for whom seek quality and self development in Cycling :-). However, If you add the same features as Desktop version it will be perfect. Thank you   Full Review   
 Cock eyed photos Uploading photos from my S6 some photos are boss eyed.   Full Review   
 Awesome App Helps allot to see how you are improving and in which areas you need to concentrate on to improve   Full Review   
 Love Strava Works perfect on HTC One, there's a lot of trackers, but according to me STRAVA is the best for cycling.   Full Review   
  Great new look love it but not very accurate on climbing so I use garmin to get more accurate reading   Full Review   
  The new version (4.6) have a nice graphic   Full Review   
 The Best Tracking and social network combined   Full Review   
 Fantasic Super easy to use. An amazing app to keep track of routes and calories.   Full Review   
 Love it Been using Stracathro for a couple of years. Tried map my ride but doesn't looks as good   Full Review   
 recommend to my whole tri team love the auto pause and the segments feature   Full Review   
 Jorevs Great app does everything   Full Review   
 Easy Encouragement My wife has been using this app for a week now, and it's so fun and simple that I'm downloading it myself now.   Full Review   
 The new look is awesome! The new looks are really good :-)   Full Review   
  Good update ! The look of the speed details have improved very well !   Full Review   
 Wonderful Wonderful apps and easy to use.   Full Review   
 Awesome It always has been and always will be the best gps activity tracker for cyclists   Full Review   
 Doesn't work The stupid app completely shortcuts my runs and doesn't calculate accurately   Full Review   
  Now working again.   Full Review   
 Fantastic app Nothing negative to say. Excellent   Full Review   
  Great app.   Full Review   
  Great app   Full Review
title: Strava Running and Cycling GPS

reviews:
Please... 😢 I lost my fit bit while taking a walk around Portland. 2 hours later i realized it was gone. It must have fallen off when i was taking off my backpack... PLEASE make a feature where you are able to track where your fitbit is. I can't afford to lose an $80 fitbit.   Full Review   
 Excellent app, takes long to sync It's an excellent app, but the food section is incredibly underdeveloped. I have to sync it with myfitnesspal to really get my money's worth. Ever since the latest update, it takes an eternity to sync to my Fitbit Blaze!   Full Review   
 Doesn't track step log or sleep anymore Just got the new update on 3 May and it worked great... For about ONE DAY, SO FURSTRATED now it's doing the exact same thing it was explained here: About a month ago the app stopped logging my sleep and the step log has nowhere near the correct steps logged in it. Also the new hourly step tracker does not work at all!   Full Review   
 Food nutrients content database This app is worth getting but is limited when it comes food nutrients. It would be great 5 stars if the developers had a section where the food database showed a breakdown of food nutrients such as protein and carbs % like the Noom app does   Full Review   
 Blaze Calculates my travel on car or bike as steps walked, and recording of the no.of floors is worse. No INDIAN diet in the app. Not satisfied with the tracking at all.   Full Review   
 New update removes steps! Ever since updating/syncing my charge HR steps is now gone from my watch, restarting watch or phone does not work nor the app its data. Fitbit hasn't fixed this KNOWN issue in the year-and-a-half I've owned my charge HR. Stats display has never worked on this app. It used to be broken where it just wouldn't do anything when you changed the order, but now if you try to change anything what you changed will disappear from your Fitbit altogether. Didn't know Dumber was a word nor that you could achieve it!   Full Review   
  My Alta is all set up but I cannot get it on!   Lining up the holes to put together is next to impossible!  Guess my hands are not strong enough to pinch the two together.  Now what?  It has all of the features I appreciate, but what good is it in a pocket???   Full Review   
  So far it works very well, although I have only had it a few days, so I am still learning what I want and can get it to do!   Full Review   
  It's the perfect compliment to your fitbit.  You can check your status in real time so you know if you need to step it up.  I especially like the calorie counting feature to make sure I'm staying within my diet, and the water intake feature so you know if you've been drinking enough.  So far, the fitbit and the app are really helping me progress toward my weight loss goal.   Full Review   
 Great motivation I never liked the thought of counting calories but when I got my Blaze watch and used the app I lost 6 pounds the first week.!!   Full Review   
  It is convenient except that it won't work with the treadmill to show the hear rate and you cannot wear when you swim which is an important part of my fitness routine,.    These are the reasons I rate it as ok. Hope Fitbit will improve and offer existing users free or lowered fee upgrade.   Full Review   
 Charge hr Works well but only thing that's not good is if I got no signal on mobile it will not sync why can't it sync to mobile now and when phone gets signal it then updates Web site ! I'm out racing and want to see my heart rate after each race if no signal can't do it   Full Review   
 Great monitor of everything! I bought this to monitor my activity and food. So far (since April 12th) I found out that I am more active than I thought I was, but need to be twice as active to get 10,000 steps/day. My biggest "ah, ha" was that I don't eat frequently enough, hence my low metabolism. Love these functions plus all the rest.😊😊😊   Full Review   
  It's good to have on the go and to sync progress. I think the food section, needs to be able to edit more in details (IE. adding decimal points in) I think it also should allow you to scan barcodes and save new ones that it doesn't recognise, to save future scanning and update the database :)   Otherwise, it's good and I really like using it ^^   Full Review   
 Needs custom heart rate settings Due to various things, I have a higher than normal average pulse, usually around 89-95 during the day when sitting. Consequently Fitbit thinks I'm in fat burn about 16 hours a day, which throws off calorie count, etc. Please fix this!   Full Review   
 Nice app... But after last update, takes 3x longer to sync Charge HR to Galaxy Note 4 SM-N910U (6.0.1) than previously, if it does sync at all. Sometimes app gives up forcing user to close/re-open app and try again. BT, location and data were on prior to running app. Fitbit notification bar widget was running also. App may need a good massage after its last marathon to rid the kinks for Marshmallow consumption. Mmm marshmallow   Full Review   
 Good app The app is great, but miss being able to navigate to challenges/friends on the top vs the slide out menu.   Full Review   
 Failure to sync S7 edge won't connect at all same as others have posted please sort. Still the same after numerous updates I basically got a £100 silent alarm and only reason that works is because I set it up when first had watch. Not impressed   Full Review   
  I cant see part of the reading when it says over calories or under. I click on it and it is cut off. I also wish it had a heart monitor on it.  Other than that I like the app and fitbit.   Full Review   
 Location? I've recently enjoyed some of the recent updates but I don't understand why it requires the location to be on in order to sync.   Full Review   
 Love the app! I love my fitbit blaze and the app! My only issue is the notification part. I have texted as my primary messaging app. But when I have it set up on my fitbit. When I receive a message it doesn't show the actual message. It just says new message now on texted. No content or message appears. So now I've had to go back to the standard message app on my Samsung note 3   Full Review   
 Fantastic You need 1 of these.  Challenge yourself, challenge your friends.  I enjoy using all the features.  Wish they had more challenges with people around you   Full Review   
 Fitbit I love my fitbit charge and this tracker. I can track so many aspects of my fitness and do daily challenges with my friends and talk with them. It has helped motivate me to do more and more fitness training. I wouldn't be without it, and am upgrading it to a blaze next week 😀   Full Review   
  Update: rubbish app. It won't update my alarm and would keep saying fitbit is down for maintenance. I think generally the app and the level of information provided is okay, however it keeps having difficulties connecting to my tracker, while it's only a few cm away.. Also, the call notification does not work and sometimes the option (that I check every time) gets unchecked.   I would love to have the option to receive other notifications too for example Skype, etc. H   Full Review   
 WTF I don't usually right reviews.... But I love having this watch and the fact that it's not syncing to this app annoys the hell out of me.... Plz fix it... I bought this watch a week ago....haven't even got to the gym to use it yet..so either I keep record of my own stuff or just let all my steps go to waste... Which is just defeating the purpose of having this app which suppose to keep record for me..... FIX IT PLZZZZ   Full Review   
 Good app but a few issues I'm an insomniac so got this for the sleep function as much as the steps. However, while it tells me when I was restless it doesn't tell me the section sleep time. I have to calculate that by working out the time between two restless periods. Shame.   Full Review   
 I enjoyed it I liked the app but my only concern is that it takes a while to search and find my FITBIT flex. I also wish that I could use that app without needed wifi because I can only see my amount of steps when I'm at home since I'm not allowed to use my phone at school. I wish I had gotten the digital one where I can see my total steps without having to wait until I get home   Full Review   
 Good app, works well But could do more with the data it has to work with. It feels like this app has missed opportunities to display meaningful data. Sync could possibly be smarter and quicker but does the job. Feature requests: disable quick view at night, view charts in landscape and pinch / zoom.   Full Review   
 Good app It's easy to follow and I love the sleep tracking and step counter but I can't have the notifications on as the bluetooth drains my battery like crazy! Still very useful and overall a good app   Full Review   
 Conflicted When it works it's great. When it doesn't, it's useless. Longest my Fitbit and App have refused to sync was 5 days. I really hope you guys can fix these persistent issues because the concept is excellent. The execution is also excellent... 40% of the time.   Full Review   
  Food logging lags a lot sometimes. Food database could be better for Canada. The app sometimes does not update the stats after syncing. Otherwise useful app but definitely needs some work to bring it on par with the Fitbit hardware.   Full Review   
 Serious Sync issues - Serious Improvement after recent updates, no more issues reported Need to restart phone before it will sync. > update : syncs when starting app (I don't keep Bluetooth on permanently)   Full Review   
 Great app Like it all but one thing. You can not set your own calorie count. Would be nice if you could set it based on your diet goals or what your Dr suggest. Not based on what this tells you that you should have daily.   Full Review   
 Won't sync Have had the Alta for 3 days. No issues until an hour ago - now it won't sync. Pretty frustrating.   Full Review   
 Latest update- now problems Since the latest update not all my 10 minute plus continuous walks are counting as active minutes. Very frustrating. It shows I've walked 12 mins, 26 mins and 11 mins but only the 2 shortest walks are showing as active mins. Used to love my fitbit, not anymore.   Full Review   
  Great app, does everything you would expect. I have the fitbit blaze and an android phone and have no problems.  The only criticism I have is that sometimes syncing does take time to complete which runs down my battery life and I have had the app freeze and had to stop the app and re start to get it to sync. But so far great app   Full Review   
 Great except for alarms I like the app, have not had any problems with it. Syncs well without me having to think about it much.  The only thing I wish it had is an option to choose the date for the alarms.  Sometimes I go to bed after midnight. If I set the alarm after midnight on Monday night it automatically sets it for the following day (wed am) and won't let me select the day I want (Tuesday).   Full Review   
  I just purchased my Fitbit, and so far I love it. The app is easy to use and gives helpful information. I have the Surge and it works great, I can connect with my son and daughter on their Fitbits. I don't know what some of the people are complaining about, but you can't please some people no matter what you do..  I would recommend the Fitbit to anyone, well maybe not Hillary, I don't like her.   Full Review   
 Great App for Fitness! I love the fit bit app. The challenges are fun and motivating. I really like the ability to track my calories and exercise too. I am having an issue syncing my device with the app. I have to click the sync button a few times before my steps update.   Full Review   
 Needs more challenges Developers, can you maybe add some challenges that revolve around calories burned or active minutes? Not just steps....... People can cheat steps, much harder to do with active minutes.   Full Review
title: Fitbit

reviews:
Detects incorrectly The app detects riding on a bus as riding a bicycle. Even when I am sitting here interacting with the app itself trying to deactivate the bicycle reading it is gradually increasing. There is no option to disable it as an activity I would do, only to hide it or to remove it from my favorite activities. This really needs to be fixed.   Full Review   
 LG G5, doesn't sync with LG health anymore Wanted Google fit since it syncs with so many apps I use. I like the health app native to my phone but it doesn't have a widget I can simply glance at to see my numbers vs. daily goals. Yet, most days I see LG updates my steps, Google fit shows I've only been active a minute or two a day. It seemed to work for the first few days after installing, but not since then.   Full Review   
 Basic bug with MI. Please fix it GFit calculates its own steps and when synced with MI band, it adds the numbers!!It should update rather than adding and showing absurdly high numbers.   Full Review   
 Location specific I do a lot of walking indoors on a treadmill due to the cold weather and snow outside during the winter months. No matter what setting I put, it only seems to record when I move location...which is not helpful when you're in one position! Otherwise, it seemed pretty accurate.   Full Review   
 Didn't move it said I took over 30 steps! I hadn't moved at all and it said that I had taken over 30 steps. Not accurate at all. Also, add an auto add activity feature for if you do an activity weekly.   Full Review   
 Doesn't track steps This used to be pretty accurate in tracking my daily steps, but I don't know since when but I've walked around all day with my phone on me and it says 0 steps!   Full Review   
 Am i missing something After each run I can see the map which shows the route that I just ran but when going back to the Google fitness homepage why can I not visualise and compare the routes of all of my previous runs? What is going on? Surely that's a key aspect   Full Review   
  Why can't google get it right. Literally walked 3000 steps today via android wear, and now it read 290. This app is garbage, take note from Samsung with S-Health   Full Review   
  It automatically recognizes my activities, so I'll give it two stars for that. But it is absolutely atrocious at estimating distance and path traveled - even with High Accuracy mode enabled. It underestimates cycling distance by over 50%!!! I hope this is fixed soon since My Tracks is being retired. Using Samsung S6 Edge.   Full Review   
 Not accurate How can you run same route and you get three different distances ranging from 1.8 miles to 2.6 miles?   Full Review   
 Not as easy as some others say Editing any activities is hard to manage. It seems to have a mind of its own.  It wouldn't let me deleted an activity that the timer went too long on and the Help section was no help at all.   Full Review   
 Not good It dosent record while biking and map shows only one place. No route is dsplyed. Dist is also not showing it only shows. Time when it started rest just on claims .. Sorry   Full Review   
  Broke my leg 4 months ago so I really like being able to keep a record of my activity and how its improving. Would give 5 stars if I was able to see my activity in km/hr instead of minutes/km.   Full Review   
  The app is awesome.  The scope of improvement is for different activities other than jogging etc.  One could place the camera at a fixed position and take a video of their exercise clearly.  Next step which is indeed clever is: when Google fit's algorithms calculate the number of reps, jumps, skips etc the person has done. Wouldn't it be cool?😍   Full Review   
 Not accurate Shows way more steps than what I took.. Im guessing about double.. Wish this worked!   Full Review   
 Battery death It kills my smart watch 3 ... 45% to 6% battery in 1 hr... With out it the watch is fine... It also makes my Z3 C warm... Turn it off, all cools down... Please sort it out...   Full Review   
 Need auto tracking and sleep tracking Should be built in instead of depending on third party app. Fitbit and Misfit both had it for a long time. Hope that feature comes for my higher rating.   Full Review   
 Smart Detects running, walking, cycling... Pity that skiing is not yet supported. I'm sure that will come soon.   Full Review   
 Absolute rubbish I used to use My Tracks to log my walks. Trying to find a replacement since Google decided to deprecate it. This isn't a replacement. It has the functionality but chewed through a fully charged Galaxy S6 battery in just over 4 hours making it utterly useless.   Full Review   
 Incorrect detection Even when I am riding my motorcycle or riding on a bus, it is detected as biking. I just want the app to calculate only walking and running.   Full Review   
 What happened??!?! I used to love this app and everything about it but lately it keeps saying that I'm running when I'm not and I woke up to see it said I ran for 10 hours and it's just super buggy now. I tried reinstalling it but it didn't work. Besides for this the app was pretty awesome but this kinda ruined it for me   Full Review   
 Updated Update : seems to be working well again. Just updated today Jan 9th 2016 will test to be sure. I don't know what happened but today I was at 5698 steps and I looked at the app and it now shows 1549 steps. Yesterday I was at 16,000 steps and then it ended at 11,685. This application is clearly broken and needs to be fixed. I'm running the latest Android version on a Nexus 5.  I noticed this issue in the past however on just a couple of occasions. Google needs to address this issue!  Worthless now!   Full Review   
 So Broken! Insane how broken this app is. Today's summary: 12 min of strength training. I manually logged a 37 min workout at the gym with this app. Where'd it go?  WTF!? This hurts my brain. I edited a 19 "bike" activity to "other" since I wasn't biking... Poof! GPS, altitude, heart rate.. all gone. No record of it now.   Full Review   
 Missing basic features make it unusable Can't delete an activity? Seriously? I just entered a 5 mile run and it tells me I burned 91 calories.  Wrong. This might work for people willing to let the app dictate how you track your fitness.   Full Review   
 Not a suitable replacement for Google my tracks This is supposed to replace mytracks but it lacks functionality and seems to focus only on material design. This is a trend from Google  to get rid of functionality in favor of the supposedly aesthetically pleasing material design   Full Review   
 Used to be great I used to love this app, but now it misses things like 4-mile bike rides. It also seems to be erasing activity...I will check that my morning bike commute was counted when I get to work, but by night it will have mysteriously disappeared.   Full Review   
  I used to be a big fan of the app till the recent update. After the update, my walking is detected as biking and it does not detect steps nor does it calculate any distance. The high accuracy mode sucks! Really inaccurate detection of distance with Location turned ON. The UI gets garbled and the animation goes on spinning incessantly.   Full Review   
 Neat but inaccurate Keeps saying I cycled but haven't been on my bike and I can't remove the activity to correct my daily activity. So glad Google is spending time on apps like this and killing My Tracks for no good reason....   Full Review   
  It's a nice idea for an app but forgets data all the time.  Edit: I've had enough. It keeps making up new weights for me that I haven;t entered. It won;t remember the weights I manually add. I can't download teh historical weight data to move to another app. The app is buggy as all hell.   Full Review   
 Can't delete entries I really like the simple interface. Gives me plenty of options... EXCEPT to delete entries! Fit automatically picks up my motorcycle and car rides as bicycle riding and I can't remove them, so it's completely worthless for tracking actual activity. I like the auto logging feature, but if I'm unable to remove false entries, it's of no use to me. Please fix that devs and it gets 5 stars hands down!   Full Review   
  How can Google to make such an impressive app for GPS driving directions, yet fail on a decent app to track walking, etc.? I tried it today, hoping to eliminate other apps since I have this linked to my workout app, but like some others, it had lines jumping all over the map. My walk info from Adidas Train & Run, the only app I've used that tracks accurately, isn't showing up even though it's "connected." When I checked, this thing was still "timing" my walk, 3 1/2 hours now, long after I'd hit save and quit it. (I don't have or want it set to track every move)   Full Review   
 Meh-Blegh Won't let me manually add activities and doesn't properly calculate when I do exercise. I hiked 1 hour 30 mins and it claimed I went 28 minutes... Also,  I wish it had the ability to delete activities because it always tells me I'm cycling when I only walk fast, as I am 6'1" and my strides are long. Not reliable, so I will be on the lookout for a new app that works well!   Full Review   
 Inaccurate According to this app, I sometimes burn fewer calories than my BMR. The calories burned sometimes jumps up and down while I'm looking at it. Apparently when I walk to work I get tired and teleport the rest of the way. The app needs some attention.   Full Review   
 looks great but you need to restart after update .. Great my phone is off but I recently had it fix that by Samsung I downloaded it and ran around the mall I thought I had everything set up and started activity Unfortunately they recorded everything set for the distance between a point and running around the mall so I guess if you have an old phone you need to restart after an update or installation of fit and make sure GPS is already on and it is allowed to use it beforeanyway I got the number of steps and calories just didn't get distance tks G pretty cool   Full Review   
 Google Fit distances are inaccurate and battery usage is high. I switched to Google Fit after using Google My Tracks for several years since Google is dropping My Tracks next month. The milage I am seeing on my activities  (primary walking and golf) are significantly higher than I was seeing with My Tracks on the same phone (Samsung Galaxy 5) and as confirmed by my Garmin GPS golf watch odometer.  I hope Google gets this fixed or extends support for My Tracks.   Full Review   
 Can't figure this out No dark theme. It says I've exercised for an hour when I haven't done anything (I did not tell the app I was exercising). Previous runs and bike rides imported from Tracks are poorly laid out, I can't see the info I want. Basically I just want to keep using My Tracks, because I was happy with it, and this is a downgrade   Full Review   
  Go to help and select "is fit draining my batt" The first suggestion is lol..  ...to improve your device’s battery life:  Turn your WiFi on   Full Review   
 Keeps failing to track activity I used to really love this app. I knew it wasn't uber accurate but it was a good base line I which to keep track of activity.  However for the last few days, whilst it still picks up my activity from Map My Run, it's failing to track any other ad hoc activity such as my lunchtime walk ....please sort this out!   Full Review   
 Not accurate There is a difference between a bike and bicycle ride. Please start differentiating   Full Review   
 Meh The step count doesn't match my SHealth app and they use the same built in pedometer.  The step to miles walked conversion is horrible.  Says that 6,500 steps equals 0.5 mile when it should be over 3 miles. 1 step=1 yard typically and 1,760 yards in 1 mile. Very surprised a Google app didn't calculate correctly.   Full Review
title: Google Fit - Fitness Tracking

reviews:
Very good.... I love this app very much... Self motivating... And maps are very accurate... All the best team...  Keep your good work going... Thanks and regards...   Full Review   
 Not impressed Why do I have to use my Internet to run this properly. The stop buttons are too fiddly and the first time I went for a run, I was running 12 seconds before I realised it hadn't even started. I know u can change this, but what a default.   Full Review   
 Who is talking to me The app is great except that at some point about 2 miles into my run it started to talk to me. It totally disrupted my zen. Everything else is cool   Full Review   
 The talking throws you off guard, but it's useful Just as the title says,  I wasn't expecting the voice feedback and it threw me off guard,  ruined my happy place lol,  but it's useful and the app is great   Full Review   
 Fix bugs! Most bugs now fixed. Hangs up constantly. Will  not stop when I press stop button, had to force stop in settings. Does not accurately track distance. Update: After uninstalling and reinstalling the app, it now locks up my phone after I start the application, forcing me to do a hard reset in order to regain access to my phone and controls. Used to work fine before the last update, now it is crap!                         04/21/2016 Update: Works much better now and they have reduced the number of pop-up ads that were so annoying.   Full Review   
 Birthday option is so complicated It starts from 2003 and there is no option for year, for example if someons birthdate is in 1990 so u have press ur touch screen 100 times   Full Review   
 Worthless piece of garbage If you grant the ridiculous amount o permissions it asks in the vague hope that it might actually track your run, tough luck: after a couple of unconvinced attempts at getting your location, it will stop trying altogether, and spend the rest of your session picking its nose, eating your battery and sending all your personal data god knows where, while proudly touting your 0km run to the world. Incessant nagging to 'go pro' and 'other apps' would be bearable if it did the ONE thing it claimed it did. Rubbish   Full Review   
 Meh I just want to run. The app just wants me to rate it and share my run ffs   Full Review   
 This is pretty refreshing Cool downloadable stories and music. Keeps track of calories burned, distance ran and speed and other aspects of your run. Pretty cool. Looking forward to distance training with this app, it's gonna be fun.   Full Review   
 Terrible. Which ever "editor" picked this app is clearly an idiot or is getting a bonus from the app makers. Its tracking is very off and it charges you to know when you finish a mile. Save your time and use map my fitness or Nike plus running.   Full Review   
 Life fitness link unreliable Don't know if it is the poor quality of the gym's brand new life fitness treadmills (3 months old & already touchscreen finger tracking failing) but 40% of saved to device runs not seen by runtastic aop   Full Review   
 Great App Turned Sour This used to be my exclusive running app, but recently they made it to where you can only have feedback up until 1.5 miles, there are ads all over the place, and it stopped recording the weather along with the post run information. This used to be such a great app, but it looks like they sold out...   Full Review   
 Not as advertised Looked great from preview here but when I tried to use any of the features they were all for the $9.99/mo or $49.99/yr premium version. Last time I checked, that is not free. Uninstalling. Will find a truly free interval training app.   Full Review   
 Great app Makes u wana run more whn the app tells you the calorie burnt...best motivator...   Full Review   
  The app kept running after my run of two miles and posted for over an hour...lol I'll rate tomorrow and see if it happens again. :-P   Full Review   
 Inaacurate GPS Signal Fix the GPS issue ,first 1 km always says (gps signal lost) then it works.   Full Review   
 No Instagram share option Would love to quote my Instagram feed but there is no option to add run stats to photo.   Full Review   
 This app works I got this app to use with my jawbone and it's great. I highly recommend it.   Full Review   
 Good customer service App is very reliable. Provides good and easy information for runners. Customer service provides excellent support   Full Review   
 App runs smoothly I've just used it for the first time and it worked very well   Full Review   
 Does a great job Tracks my runs and other activities well, even in an area with spotty reception. Some neat additional features for tracking and sharing. Plus isn't required but thinking of upgrading for the voice coach feature.   Full Review   
 Unable to install Almost 5 times downloaded after installation unable to open app rest app are working fine   Full Review   
 Great free app Gps is very accurate and great for keeping up with mileage and time. Self motivating.   Full Review   
 Great app I feel the app contributed a lot to the change of my lifestyle. PLZ add Saturday as an option for the first day of the week. Tnx.   Full Review   
 Great App Never forget  using the app while cycling & other sport activities   Full Review   
 Like it and useful one too.. One problem with it's when crash it doesn't count the number u run..??   Full Review   
 Awsone Very nice app. Nice configuration but i have some doubts as the accuracy of this app to show calories burn data.   Full Review   
 Great, motivates me to get moving! Brilliant app. Would like to change setting so she tells me if I drop pace every 1/4 or half km. Great for tracking progress. Thanks   Full Review   
 Too bloated with feature It lost it simplistic look of half year ago. In engineering they say "If it's working then it doesn't have enough features"... I couldn't bear the add of pro version in the middle of activity   Full Review   
 Sometimes activities are not recorded. Activities appear on web but not on phone.  Actvity disappears and no option to get it back.   It do not support s offline gps.   Full Review   
 Ottimo per chi inizia Che dire praticamente un ottimo strumento per tutti gli amatori che vogliono iniziare a monitorare i propri allenamenti   Full Review   
 Great for walking Really useful for tracking walks. Recommended it as it's so easy to use   Full Review   
 Healthy life... Enjoy your day with measurement by this tools. Very funtastic...   Full Review   
 Some issues I've just reinstalled this on my S7 and found 3 problems. 1) The history Google Earth view just says an internal error has occurred. 2) The auto pause option in settings keeps resetting itself. 3) Every time I start the app I get un"helpful" tips which can't be disabled.   Full Review   
 Great Tracking in this app is better than simply using google fit... Without even using a device   Full Review   
 GPS tracker lost Never restarts now and always loses gps about 100metres into my morning run.   Full Review   
  Saves all of my stuff from my old phone so I still have my history on my new phone! Love it and the free version is nice enough that I don't feel con-ed into buying it   Full Review   
 Just what I needed I like sprinting. So this is awesome for that. I can time myself and power walk for 2 minutes and sprint for 1. Very useful. Tells me how many miles I've run and calories burned. Love it.   Full Review   
 Good Perfect thing to have   Full Review   
 Running away with it! Runtastic has everything you could ever possibly need from a running app. Outstanding!   Full Review
title: Runtastic Running & Fitness

reviews:
Can't log in. Loading loop. Won't allow me to log in using Facebook or email address, just get an endless loading loop and then it kicks me back to the sign in page. Won't work at all! Uninstalled and reinstalled and the same thing happens. Please fix asap.   Full Review   
 Log in loop and endless loading Supposedly I have an account but I wsnt  presented a way to set my password. When I select to reset, the new password is never completed. Just loops back to reset page. Done, uninstall   Full Review   
 Excellent tool for fitness I've been using MapMyWalk as part of my personal fitness program for over a year (along with MyFitnessPal and my Fitbit tracker). Together, these three apps form the best and most sustainable fitness program I've ever used. I am so happy with MapMyWalk, I felt it was well worth subscribing to (along with MyFitnessPal). 5 Stars!   Full Review   
 Will not power walk without it Better than the fit bit I recently purchased accurate to the second could not have downloaded a better work out tracker   Full Review   
 Keeps pausing I used to forget to pause workout if I stopped to take a photo, since a recent update the voice in my pocket keeps saying workout paused/resumed at random intervals if I just slow down. I am no longer sure about the  time accuracy because of this. Would be good to be able to switch off the voice - I have got coaching off but she still talks to me!   Full Review   
 Loving it! The easiest app I've found for tracking my exercise routine. Simple, fun, accurate. Totally, amazing!   Full Review   
 Trying hard I like this at because it doesn't judge you but also gives you motivation to go further I'm a sucker for achievements   Full Review   
 Useless After I start the app I close all windows and put in my pocket. More than 90% of the time it stops tracking the workout that I'm doing even when doing Simple walking. This app is useless. Don't waste your time until they've made major improvements.   Full Review   
 Great app Would give 5 stars, but have a problem when taking pictures during a walk, using the icon on the app page, they don't load when completing my exercise. Other than that, good app   Full Review   
 Helps Me Reach My Goals I really like this app! It is easy to use and and it's accurate. I've had problems with other apps not being accurate in both the distance I've walked as well as how many calories I've burned during my workout. This app has really helped me keep track of how many miles I'm walking , my pace, how many calories I'm burning and records the routes I take. It makes it very easy for me to reach&surpass my goals. I definitely recommend people try this app, especially those who have had problems with other apps.   Full Review   
 It's pretty good. I use the free app. Tracks me for walks around my neighbourhood and calculates my speed, distance, elevations and calories burned. For some reason it just keeps calling out a distance of 1.6 kilometres with the detailed info even when walking 3 kilometres or so.  Please fix this annoying bug.  Thanks!   Full Review   
 Map my walk Extremely easy to use, lots of features also. There no guessing in your distance etc, easy to repeat your course or you can see streets & areas to change it up.   Full Review   
 Walking to Weigh less This app is easy to use and does exactly what it claims to do. I'm very happy with this app and highly recommend it. It even keeps me motivated along the way as I accomplish goals.   Full Review   
 Great app Great way to track and train. Helpful for weight loss as it shows calories burned. I like the fact that I can add in workout from treadmills and other fitness equipment.   Full Review   
 Inconsistent mileage App has been updated twice but still inconsistent. I liked this app until I began getting inconsistent distances  that were the same walks I had walked many times. My carrier is Verizon and I am walking in a populated area. I have done everything the troubleshooting tells me to do. I reported this to map my walk and got an auto response saying they had too many people reporting for them to give me a personal response.   Full Review   
 Very effective walk tracking Upgrade nags can be a bit intrusive, usability seems improved, overall very pleased   Full Review   
 Great for my purposes. Summarises my walks week by week, month by month etc. and is consistent, which makes me think the accuracy is good.  I find these summaries motivate me to keep walking regularly at a good pace.  Also easy to use, pause, resume etc.   Full Review   
 Lies It tells you it'll connect to other fitness apps but all it does is load then bring you back to the login screen several times   Full Review   
 Great app Had a few problems but they have been fixed. Absolutely love it. No fuss, does the job.   Full Review   
 Tracking is on point I thought I needed one of those expensive fitness watches! With this app it synchronizes with the "my fitness" app and I just put my son in his jogger stroller and put some "slacker" radio on and just go. Being it maps the course I don't have to worry about getting misguided! When finished it logs itself, when synchronized. I highly recommend!   Full Review   
 To much of a bother App keeps pausing on its own.  Then stall and timing wasn't accurate   Full Review   
 Helpful Like the app, but just wish it would sync with fitness pal like it's supposed to... Android OS   Full Review   
 Not good since update Since last update now stops working during a walk. Will try reinstalling etc.   Full Review   
 Walking app Just wanted to find an app I could use for free to track how long/far my walks are. I can buy, if I want more. But for free it does just what I need. Love it   Full Review   
 Map My Walk I have liked Map My Walk, but too often after the beginning of the recording of a walk, all stops and no record occurs at all.   Full Review   
 Map my walk Useful for a fitness plan. I love this app, simple to use, a great help, thank you   Full Review   
  It seems to get the job done tracking workouts for employee wellness incentive program.  It is also nice that you can see visual comparisons and receive email backups of information.   Full Review   
 Battery guzzler - Worse update After the recent updates this app has killed batteries of two of my Xperia phones, one a Z1 and other a Z. The update is perhaps for only the latest models.   Full Review   
 New to it . Like it so far I will give it 5 stars after I've used it longer . . I am still looking to see if it does some stuff I need   Full Review   
 Something changed... Used to work fine but now it truncates my walk route connects my start and turn around points with a straight line. What used to be logged as 2 miles now gets logged as .8 or 1.2 miles depending on its mood.   Full Review   
 Great App Loved it the ease of use a great asset   Full Review   
 Great app! The only complaint I have is that is freezes a lot. I do really like the voice that announces the kms and pace.   Full Review   
 Amazing app Works offline which is great..keeps up with my distance pretty good to..not so sure if calories are accurate but all in all..I love this app   Full Review   
 Great app! Would be better if it counted our steps while we walked too :) I'd give it 5/5 if it did!   Full Review   
 Love it Best app ive seen in years only one ive used. so many different activities built in to 1 app great to capture all your excercises now can you add a geocaching as a part of orienteering as we walk for miles just to find a container in the bush with a log to sign. It's a world wide activitie used by millions and growing daily as a family activities.   Full Review   
 Just getting started I love using the GPS tracking. I just have to use the GPS I already have in my phone, but then I have to use my data.   Full Review   
  I can't compare because I've not used other apps. I have an old android phone and this works well to record biking, walks and gym workouts. I've used this app regularly for several months flawlessly.   Full Review   
 Walking Love this app to record my walk as I'm just getting back into it after many many years!   Full Review   
 Not working post S6 software update Been using this app for months but since software update on Friday, it keeps stopping. Have uninstalled and reinstalled but no difference. Especially annoyed that even when I get it working  (have to open it 4 times) it crashes after a mile and has to be restarted; it crashes again at each complete mile. Very frustrating and makes the app useless   Full Review   
 Gets me out there This app is so easy. I have it hooked up to a couple other apps and it helps give me a complete picture of my progress.   Full Review
title: Walk with Map My Walk

reviews:
Well done! Almost provides everything , run time ,fastest run, pauses when you stop or take a break, resume vice versa..this app can improve even more by adding a graphic display of pace at every second or a prequal of time. Thumbs-up!   Full Review   
 Settings are not synchronized Why aren't app settings synchronized. I use two devices for running plus online site. I have to update settings/profile in each place. Also each time I logout, login the application, settings are reset.   Please consider to fix it.   Three stars cause it... Will raise it to five once handled..   Full Review   
 How to end run? I am not able to end my run after my run...... It showing me "are you sure want to cancel this run?", I also did pause the run and then I end the run .... Still it's not working.... Plz help me....   Full Review   
 Nike strikes again I COMPLETELY LOVE THIS APP! I just recently began running again and was looking for an app to assist and push my goals to optimum levels! I have found that and then some in using this app! It's easy to use! If you're a pro or a beginning runner hands down this is the app for you!  Try it! 🏃🏆   Full Review   
 Great for new runner I found this app excellent. I've had knee problems in the past but have been given the go ahead to take up jogging once I keep the distances low. This app alerts me every mile I run. I aim for 2.5 miles max. I highly recommend this app.   Full Review   
 Wrong distance and speed How is it possible that I run more distance in same time and my speed goes down?  Please fix this bug or else my hunt for a good tracking app continues.  And wait,  I am in India but the store prices are in dollars.   Full Review   
 Great app, changing Facebook links I moved back to this app after season (swim) was over but I happened to make a new Facebook account. I logged back in smoothly but changing fb accounts isn't going so smooth. It will find my account, let me log in and then show the ring of death until I back out of the log in. Please fix this.   Full Review   
 Close to perfect Only complaint is that it can't access your Google music collection. Otherwise this app does everything you might want and more.   Full Review   
 Ok but... You suggest split times in some of the coach section descriptions, but don't offer any way to set up (or alert on) those split times   Full Review   
 Good but lacking for Samsungs It'd be a 5 star if I could use my own picture when posting my times, like you can on an iPhone. Instead of only being able to see my route.   Full Review   
 Adds random miles to my runs Was loving the app until today. Ran 4 miles and activity clearly shows this but home page has jumped me an additional 15 miles! Now I feel it's ruined my progress as I cant clearly see my actual milage increasing as it has these random ghost miles included... Update it has just added another 20 miles while sitting at home. My profile is now ruined and I have achievements I didn't earn Uninstalled!!!   Full Review   
 Limited functionality for Android S6 I loved this app when I first started using it because it had many functions I was looking for. However, by my 6th run, I was having issues with the mapping. Sometimes it would work ok, other times it could work for part of the run then stop even though total distance kept calculating. I didn't change any settings on my phone. Since I did a software update for my phone, the mapping function isn't working at all. I get a pace graph instead. All settings are correct but not working. Switching to a diff app.   Full Review   
 AWESOME APP!! Really motivates you .Let's you go at your own pace and let's you set your goal.I am usually not a cardio fan.But now I love it!!   Full Review   
  Pros: Easy to set up and start running. Good post-race feedback. Tracks how many km you have on your current shoes. Friend tracking. Cons: Does not show average pace during run. Does not work well with GPS on Nexus 6P. Race training plans are not customizable.   Full Review   
 No way to authenticate Tried Facebook authentication, then after connecting with support, they said they don't know why it doesn't work and suggested creating new Nike+ account, again no success.   Full Review   
 Can't edit a challenge?! 1st off, I told the setup I wanted to begin the challenge Wed March 16 & end it on March 23, which would give us a week to finish the challenge. I was already having problems setting the dates, bcuz it kept resetting itself to a different date other than I put in. I had to keep adjusting it. Finally I got it put in & I triple checked to make sure it was right bcuz of the mishaps. Now the date was correct for 3 days, then come Saturday it sent me a msg saying I had 2 DAYS left! Wth! Tried to edit, but can't.   Full Review   
  Its a nice app. Just had 3 runs so far. Apart from other details it would be great if it has a weather feature also. For example it should show the run was done under what weather current weather conditions and what was the location temperature or humidity factor etc   Full Review   
 Burning the extra energy Do the push aways, get away from the computer, Dig those running shoes out, and make it happen. You'll thank yourself for the effort.   Full Review   
 Best running app ever Only issue I have ever is the auto pause doesn't disengage when you start running again. Other than that it's a must-have for any runner.   Full Review   
 Motivating! New to the app, getting started running again and I find this app very motivating, and it pauses when you pause so no cheating!!   Full Review   
 app sucks The app used to work now it says access denied! why the f**k you developers keep updating and f**k up the apps! if it not broke leave it, no need to go version 2.3.2.1b whatever when version 2.0.0.0.0.0 works!!!   Full Review   
 Garbage I just completed a 16 mile run, and Nike+ decided to subtract it from my monthly total, and add 4x that distance to my overall total miles. It does the same things when trying to track shoe mileage. This app cant even do basic math (you know, a major part of its job for tracking run mileage). Im fed up with this garbage app.   Full Review   
 Functional It should include the IOS function to share with a photo for the android devices, only feature missing, other than that it's pretty accurate not to mention stable.   Full Review   
 Bug? Bike activity in Garmin incorrectly link into Nike+ as a run I have Garmin connect which is linked to Nike plus. All apps at latest versions.  I can see my run activities from garmin correctly in nike+. While Garmin bike activities (correctly) do not appear as activities in Nike+.  A bike activity of 20km in garmim appears in the Nike+ Challenge as distance run! Obviously this should not happen.    I am unable to edit or delete this bike 20km distance in Nike+ challenge.   Should I use this bug to "run" 42.2km in 2:03 on my bike each weekend and ace the challenge? :)   Full Review   
 Not working at all It says 'service unavailable , try again ?'.     My brother uses this app and I like it please resolve.(have a mi4i that is running android 5.0.2) have sent a complaint weeks ago no response   Full Review   
 Great app UPDATE: Same issues as this time last year.               Sometimes GPS is spotty. Would like the ability to reset some stats without starting over. Says my fastest mile is 4 min. I can't DRIVE a mile in 4 min!   Full Review   
  Great and simple app with no in app purchases! What you see is what you get, and what you see and get is great! I'd give it 5 stars but for some reason i can't send the routes i create on the route creator on the nike website :( if you guys can help me out i'd greatly appreciate it. that, and please add Spotify integration into the app like you did with iOS! :)   Full Review   
  Been using it for a while but the last month or so the splits have been way off! Time is right but the splits will be wrong. It will say when I finished it was way faster than the actual finish time.  For example did a race the other day 5 miles inn1:27 but the splits said i did 5 miles in 1:18. The overall time was correct and it was right at 5 miles so where did the extra time go???? Frustrating the splits being off since I am trying to see what my miles are and I can't with this not working.   Full Review   
 Great app. Love that they moved FB/Twitter share nonsense to appear AFTER the run, and the new "end run" button works much better in the rain than the old slider.   Full Review   
 Motivation I've always liked to run but with this app it pushes me to work even harder, everytime I hear it say "beginning workout" my body just gets in gear and takes off. Just got the app recently and would definitely recomend it to anyone who enjoys running or wants to start!!   Full Review   
 App keeps you motivated Add this app to s health on the Samsung Galaxy phones.   Scroll through the settings, add count down 30 seconds (gives you time to put the phone away), sync your music, change the interval updates to .5 miles, add your sneakers etc.... Those are settings I liked.   I gave it 4 stars because I had to uninstall a few times over the last 8 months (giving the wrong distance even after recalibrating).   Full Review   
 Love this app Love this app for running  outdoors, indoors on the treadmill not sure it gives me accurate  results otherwise its my go too app and l love it   Full Review   
 Glitch So I only have 5 runs in on the activity tab but when I look at the home tab it says I have 8 with 19 miles even though I know I only have 11 miles. Does anyone know where those mystery runs came from because they arnt logged down any where.   Full Review   
 Nike App Run slow at times can't get to my friends list and freezes a lot. Please fix. Sincerely a Galaxy Note user!   Full Review   
 SO SWEET!!!! Wasn't impressed for the first couple of years but Nike has done a great job of improving this app over time.  It's awesome now. Thanks Nike!!!   Full Review   
 Good App Can't take pictures during my runs like others can, still no option to share on instagram for Android. STILL Wish there was an easier way to search for friends. Putting in someone's full name, not having them come up, and having to scroll through all with the same first name only is tedious. Also wish there was a way to edit the shoes you add. Runs seem to be dropped for no reason right in the middle of a route.  adding mile splits would significantly improve this.   Full Review   
 #Nike+ gives incorrect data The recent updates to the app sucks. The app gives incorrect distance vs. Speed data. Even more annoying is the #Nike+ plus Twitter support. I gave them so much data to diagnose the error but such a waste of time!   Full Review   
 Doesn't track well It seems to pay more attention to phone jostling than my actually movement. I don't bounce much as a runner and it keeps telling me I've stopped running when I have not. Map my run treats me much better. Very unhappy with this app but it's just not for me.   Full Review   
 Loved it! The app is awesome. But one thing I noticed that it shows miles ran faster than the outdoor mode while it's indoor mode. Didn't get it why!   Full Review   
 Almost perfect Sadly although i loved this app will have to move on as i purchased a pair of jabra pulse headphones and there is no support for HRM's.  I really loved this app as well as it is perfect in every other way.  Simple to use and helped me get back in shape so it is with a heavy heart that I bid nike running farewell, thanks for the six pack!   Full Review
title: Nike+ Running

reviews:
My MapMyRun Rating Kudos to developers all around. One improvement to make is scrolling the year in the age field. I'm old and it took me a long time to find my birth year.   Full Review   
  Good for tracking and also for people like me who dont really know the area (its easy to get lost). Not sure the calories are accurate but apart from this a good tool for any runner at any stage.   Full Review   
 Running sucks I wouldn't say this app makes exercise any better or easier, but it does help me keep on track and accountable for my goals. Works perfectly.   Full Review   
  I didn't like it that much because it doesn't get your distance correct. I was running and I looked at my phone and it said 2.6 miles and then 10 minutes later I looked again and it still said 2.6 miles. It's okay I guess for an estimate. Also it got my time wrong too.   Full Review   
 So useful! I love how I can track how far I've ran or walked and that it shows the rate at which I'm doing any activity. That function helps push me to go faster. Also I like that I can save my activities in a log and look back at my progress.   Full Review   
 GPS tracking doesn't work Just done a pretty gruelling couple of circuits of my local park, yet according to MapMyRun I've been slowly revolving in my own house for the past hour. Every other app I have with GPS knows where I am, why doesn't this one? The only reason I downloaded it was to check my route times and distances etc, if it can't do that it's pretty useless to me.   Full Review   
 Needs Widget for direct one touch access It's too good app but lacks a widget for easy access other than that it's the best in the market   Full Review   
 Great app to track your workout Just downloaded this last week. No hiccups as of yet. Knock on wood. Tracking accuracy is on point.   Full Review   
 Helpful Used it lots on Couch to 5k programme.  Useful to have record of what I had done and where I had been. Takes a little while to get used to editing records and frustrating if GPS fails - a straight line appears on map to join places where signal stopped and restarted -  but helpful all the same. And you can join up with friends using it too.   Full Review   
 What's going on? Have been using this app for several years but in the last few weeks it keeps coming up with an error message when saving my runs. I logged out and back in and uninstalled which worked initially but not anymore. It's incredibly irritating as I can initially see all the details and then it disappears.   Full Review   
 Not recording accurately Over the last couple of weeks or so, the app has had me walking over water and through houses. Giving me wrong distance and times. I fix it on the computer, but that doesn't give me the minutes per mile. I am switching over to endomundo. See how that works.   Full Review   
  I  feel this app sets itself apart from other fitness apps because you can look at other people's routes if you are out of town. I have been on some really awesome runs away from home because of other people using this app. Runs through beautiful, downtown Washington DC across the Potomac at sunrise. Chicago, Orlando, beaches along the East coast and many more places in the west. You can set up routes and compete with other runners' times. It sets you up for motivating challenges that are sponsored by companies that have a special interest in runners.I don't have to be training for an upcoming race to stay motivated to run. At the end of the week it tells me how I did that week. At the end of the month it tells me how I did that month. I have used other fitness apps and this is one I have been using for several years and that I prefer.   Full Review   
 I love it This app is wonderful for me. It couldn't be any better.   Full Review   
 Great after start up I could change units of weight during start up and it said unable to process...so just skipped it but could never change my units for height and weight so had to convert and then go back and enter etc..  but so far so good...and awesome that it can link with My Fitness Pal app!!!   Full Review   
 Great for Runners I love this app. It does a great job of tracking your run. However the best feature imo is its ability to track challenges with friends. The one negative is can be a bit gimmicky but the latest updates have helped that tremendously.   Full Review   
 Awesome! I love so many things about this. Love tracking my ups and downs. Seeing what I can accomplish and the best part is that I can track my distamce and speed outside no need to be on the treadmill! Plus this app links to my fitness pal!   Full Review   
 Love MapMyFitness! This app is great. Very accurate GPS, the challenges are motivating, and I love that it syncs with FitBit and MyFitnessPal. Amazing variety of exercises to choose from, and the timer pausing when I stop moving during a run (dog has to poop!) makes me feel like I get more accurate time for my splits than FitBit gives.   Full Review   
 Useful I use this quite a bit when I walk or jog. I find that it's easy to use in the continuous mode but can be very frustrating if you use the auto pause feature due to multiple repeated pauses if pace or direction changes. Overall, a handy tool for tracking workouts. No I would use the actual distance and calorie measurements as guidelines rather than exact data.   Full Review   
 Amazing! I've been using this for years now and I love it! It helps when u have someone in your running bracket to compete with. Example I'm in Texas and my friend is in California and we always compete with distance and time! And it guilt trips me when I don't run that day and it pops up "your friend ran this much just now".. Which is a love hate relationship... But motivates me haha. Once again great app plus I've gone years without purchase the vip. Will it help? Yeah! But am I broke? Heck yeah!   Full Review   
 Like it a lot I've used it just once but I did check out a bunch of apps. So I think this will be a winner. My only wish is that this app have a timer so I can do my splits without using another app. Let me know if I am missing something. Otherwise, it's a winner!   Full Review   
 Too many stupid features that don't work This app has way too many features that don't work. Gps is inconsistent, the auto pause just stops and doesn't resume AND the coaching feed cuts into your music with a really tiny voice that you can't hear above a mumble which screws up your whole rhythm. You can turn it off in settings but why this is auto set on is beyond me, no one wants their running rythem interrupted. EVER!  Perhaps it works better with a smart watch but that shouldn't be mandatory as it's not marketed specifically for a smart watch.   Full Review   
 Almost excellent I use most of the features and they work great, with one small but important exception.  The daily intake totals screen is buggy, and has been since I originally downloaded the app on my first phone over 3 years ago.  Currently on Galaxy S6 and these totals rarely display anything at all.  Eager for a fix.   Full Review   
  Purty durn decent app, for a free app. I do wish I could break it down into 1/4 miles or 1/2 miles. So I could work on some sprints. But alas, I only use free apps.  So... like I said, "purty durn decent, for free"   Full Review   
  Forgot my GPS on vacation so I downloaded this app to track my workouts. Excellent alternative for tracking. Kept all my data and allowed me to access it later. Just wish I could import it into my Garmin.   Full Review   
 This app is awesome And not just for running; you can document all types of indoor and outdoor exercises that you do. My only complaint- it takes a moment to load when opened, which can be frustrating when I'm trying to take off running   Full Review   
 Doesn't work 2 laps of around 2km and had it turned on and location on and nothing happened. Says I ran 0.01km? Absolutely embarrassingly useless app. DO NOT DOWNLOAD.   Full Review   
 shorted my run My run was shorted more than three miles when I went from urban run to coastal trail. Luckily I didn't trust first time use and brought my tom tom GPS watch. But it was very useful to make and map my run.   Full Review   
 This app is great A youtuber I follow on Twitter said they used this app, and so I decided; Why not try it out myself? I downloaded it and started running. I was amazed at how well this app works. It also tracks where you are and where you've been. This was amazing. And if I get lost for some reason, I can follow my path back to where I started since it tracks my location.
