I give this app 5 stars because it is simply amazing.   Full Review   
  I really love the app because I can map out my linger distances before starting them or finding other routes in the area. The only criticism I would give is when the women announces the mileage or directions for it to be louder. It pauses my music to announce it but I can barely hear her. If it's worry on people not liking it too loud have a volume button for her.   Full Review   
 Map my run is my running partner This app keeps my pace in check.  Most times I tend to go too hard too soon.  Having my running partner tell me I am going to fast is a godsend.   Full Review   
 Still a top-notch app Mail from the developers showed it's not necessary to share contact list (I had said I wasn't happy with those permissions). Good page linked from update on why various permissions are requested. As with previous versions, highly accurate, easy to use, lots of good stats. With GPS, it can record & save without needing phone network access. It would be really great to have waypoints/lap start points as a marker on a run/cycle.   Full Review   
 OK but not great As free apps go,this one is fine.  Am still searching for something that meets my needs a bit more   Full Review   
  Works great most of the time.  On occasion the GPS doesn't track and I get done with a run to find my distance was zero.  Not sure if that is an app or phone service issue though.   Full Review   
 Time management. It was pretty nice how it tells you how far you ran, without checking every minute.   Full Review   
 Map my run I've used this app for a couple years. It's never frozen or skipped on me.  Seems accurate,   Full Review   
 PERFECT when I want to keep how many miles I'm putting in running,  or biking this is the app a use. It's also motivation when I see my friends putting in more miles than me!   Full Review   
 I love it love the live tracking feature.  even though I don't require it.  I think it's amazing! ♡ great app   Full Review   
 My Workout Mom! Gives me variety of workout types and flexibility of workout integration. The gps facility has improved lately. No missed workouts.   Full Review   
 Flawless It's Simple & easy to use, and the "challenges" help inspire me to work out! Have had no issues nor bugs. I had to switch phones and signing in kept track of all my work outs seamlessly. I have the free version and haven't purchased anything (not even sure if that's an option) and everything works flawlessly.   Full Review   
 Only works half the time Works fine sometimes, but frequently (running same route) it tracks time and shows the route but misreports the kilometres.   Full Review
title: Run with Map My Run

reviews:
Its awesome. But dont go pro. Really helpful!!!!! Keeps u motivated. Although going pro doesn't add anything new to this app. So stick to the free version. And it keeps crashing every now and then.   Full Review   
 Great app for tracking activity Great for tracking my parkruns. Helps maintain motivation. I run on an old smartphone so I don't worry too much about rain or mud! Would like it to auto start my music when I start an activity. #LittleStokePark #NoSurrender   Full Review   
 Full Featured and Easy to use I can track bicycling, running, indoor workouts, and walks.  Gives inspiring analysis of how I'm doing against my historical workouts.  Update to the UI is nice, and it has a more modern look now   Full Review   
 Great tool, simple to use Very straightforward and easy to use. Works perfectly. This definitely makes seeing your progress very easy.   Full Review   
 Sorry could not connect to RunKeeper This is all have been reading for last couple of days. Overall a great app but  these repeated error messages are getting on my nerves.   Full Review   
 Best running app! They keep getting better and better!   Full Review   
 Fantastic app and simple to use I am trying to improve the distance I can run and time I'm doing, so finding this app very helpful in tracking my training   Full Review   
 Very useful This application provides all the basic information needed to monitor results of workouts.   Full Review   
  Missing manual lap function. Would be nice to have vibration as choice instead of audio feedback.   Full Review   
  Love using this for my walks and bicycle rides. It tracks to my fitness pal too. Bonus.   Full Review   
 Thank you! Couldn't be any better free version! Thanks again :)   Full Review   
 It gives wrong data in terms of distance This has been a  problem since last 2 months, you pause an activity walk for say .50 kms , resume activity and these .50 kms will be added in your activity.. Also if you keep the phone in pocket gps doesn't track the activity and distance gets less...   Full Review   
 So far, so good Only used for 1 run so far ... seems fairly good   Full Review   
 Reliable, easy to use Had to uninstall and re-install as the latest up-date messed with my GPS. Since re- installed works perfectly.   Full Review   
  Just make some changes like strava social   Full Review   
  A very good running out the keeps track of your all your runs   Full Review   
 Works great I love using this app, it is very simple and helps me to make and keep goals weekly. There are little challenges, and you can share on social media if you'd like. Make sure to let the app run for a minute when you first turn it on so the GPS works properly.   Full Review   
 Very disappointed How can I run 5.25km,you register 0.34km   Full Review   
 Got me running!! Probably this is the app I had been waiting that was destined to get my lazy butt running.... Great job guys! Will see if I should buy one of your plans if I don't improve much...   Full Review   
 Runkeeper IS a keeper! I love this app when I'm running outdoors. It is accurate and easy to use. It also nicely tells you when you've been inactive and encourages you to get back on track.   Full Review   
 Ottimo Con un buon GPS si sa realmente la propria attività   Full Review   
 Great app I use this app every day.   Full Review   
 Pretty good Swapped from mapmyrun after it stopped syncing some runs. This has been faultless so far. Like the reporting options on the website   Full Review   
  Perfect tracking in all departments, so reliable.   Full Review   
 Awesome running app The best running app by far   Full Review   
 Great application I love this running application.  I'd like to see more integration with music library to be able to control my running music without having to switch apps mid run.  I'd like to see my pace shown on the map visually to see where my show points are instead of having to guess.  Thanks.   Full Review   
 Favorite app! Love that it tracks everything!   Full Review   
 Great app Can't live without it 😊😊😊   Full Review   
 Very useful app Just go for it...   Full Review   
 Droid turbo Not always so accurate, somewhat expected   Full Review   
 Cannot add images I run using Garmin watch. After the activity is synced from Garmin to Runkeeper, I cannot add images to the activity.   Full Review   
  Awesome! Ties in with mapmyfitness too   Full Review   
 Great Fitness App. Great for tracking multiple activities, fitness and progress.   Full Review   
 Great run tracker! The gps works great with my Samsung s6. Shows all my stats like distance and times with grafts. Easy to turn on and go.   Full Review   
 Simple and motivating Great to track outdoors stuff, easy manual entry for indoors activities too. Keeps me on track   Full Review   
  Best run app around. Very accurate I use it all the time.   Full Review   
 Great app Easy to use.  Multiple options and settings to customize the experience!   Full Review   
  I use it quite a lot   Full Review   
  Now I can spinn   Full Review   
 Great For Running Love it.....tracks my runs and gives me great feedback!   Full Review
title: Runkeeper - GPS Track Run Walk

reviews:
Great Perfect for when I can't be motivated to go for a run, or to the gym. Recommended for people just starting to exercise.   Full Review   
 Just Superb Basic warm-up workouts laid out in an excellent user friendly way. Effective workouts and keeps encouraging to push the limits.   Full Review   
 Great app This app seems to do a very good job. seems working well. and encourage you to do exercise. I think the interface could be improve To make it prettier but in general is a very good app   Full Review   
 Intense but fun I only just started using this App. I don't know yet whether it's effective but it sure is fun! And I feel great after completing a session.   Full Review

title: 7 Minute Workout

reviews:
Marathon here I come! In the past year I have dropped 100 lbs using clean eating by calories & macro balance on MyFitnessPal and running and exercise tracking on MapMyFitness. I run my 2nd marathon in a few days and feel great!  Thanks for helping a middle-aged, obese male feel like his twenties again!   Full Review   
 Tried it The map (gps) portion did not work.  It left off 2/3 of the walk.  We walked about 3 miles and it only log 0.9 miles with a different route.  Not sure what to use it for if your figures are inaccurate.   Full Review   
  Good for mapping but you have to stop and select each activity type as you go which makes it a bit cumbersome when running then walking on the same route. Going to try this out a bit longer before deciding if I'll switch back to Fit.   Full Review   
 Awesome Great app! Any way you can update to add P90X3 & Focus T25 or Body Beast?   Full Review   
 Underarmour  is lit I've used alot of fitness apps and by far under Armour app is the top go to pick for me it's intuitive and super easy to use and it calls out your milage and pace which is genius since you don't need to stop and manually check I highly recommend this product to anyone who hikes,walks,freeruns,and runners my one and only gripe about this app is that it scares you when it calls out your data other than that it's amazing   Full Review   
 A very well-rounded app I use a Samsung Galaxy Note 4.  It tracks you very well in the way that it indicates.  The food / nutritional section is not user-friendly. You try to be pacific as possible with food descriptions/vendors and it gives you something that you didn't describe so you try again and sometimes again ... frustrating. I gave up on it. It could have some other tools that you use and don't  have to pay for.   I would hate to buy this app and have other disappointments. But overall the apps not bad.   Full Review   
  Just an update from my last review below. Walgreens will no longer link to MapMyFitness. I think the MMF app is great. You can check out your history for over a year and you get weekly, monthly, and annual updates as well as occasional "fitness flashbacks" for special achievements, all with the free app. I do think the workout types available have been reduced. Just lately I've been having difficulty with the app pausing and restarting in the middle of a walk. I'm attempting to uninstall and reinstall to see if that helps. Finally, I wish the logout was one easy step from your workout. You have to go back to a menu screen and go all the way to the bottom to find logout. Overall still terrific.  Walgreen's revamped their Balance Rewards for healthy choices and can link with devices and apps, including Map My Fitness that covers everything. I've been using it for over a year and think it's great. They've helped me out when I had problems with the Walgreens sync and I love the weekly feedback. Map just got taken over by Under Armour and I've had problems with the app forgetting my password even after it reset. I just uninstalled.and reinstalled and it was fine but an annoyance.   Full Review   
  5 stars for a great application! I use Mapmyride but it's the same thing. I had one problem with it, the GPS wouldn't map me correctly but I asked for help and got it from their service people (who did a great job.) DO NOT use any power saving settings on your phone and it will map perfectly. I love that it keeps me informed while I'm working out so I know how many calories, how far etc. I can't say enough good things and I use it for free. I have this connected to Myfitnesspal and my UP3 health band and it all works pretty seamlessly together.   Full Review   
 Great app Easy to use and very helpful app. I gave 4 stars only because it's lack of my favourite roller-blades skating.   Full Review   
 Live and breathe by it I've used several over 15 years of being a fitness enthusiast. The connectivity with other apps and services makes this indispensable.   Full Review   
 App connection is awful I've been fighting with connecting UP, MapMyFitness, and MyFitnessPal and it's awful. The app can't handle a pop-up that takes it out of focus and retain it's state on resume. So if you have multi-factor authentication enabled for FB, don't expect things to work well for you if that's the claim you like to use as your authentication method. Aside from that, it keeps telling me that my info for the other apps is incorrect. I just kept doing out over and over and eventually one worked. Maybe if I keep at it..   Full Review   
 Excellent, the only app you'll need for all your workouts This has been a great app. I like it because I do wide range of exercises and sports, and I like it that I can track all of them with one app as well as record my bike routes and running routes via the GPS feature. The auto pause feature makes tracking the actual time moving a breeze. My only request is that they add an option under Activity so one can enter in their own custom options. Sometimes I find it limiting what pre-loaded Activities are available to choose from. Otherwise I'd rate this app 5 stars.   Full Review   
 Good when it works It worked great when I first downloaded it but the nutrition side of it stopped working me which is annoying. But other than that very good for keeping track and motivated.   Full Review   
 OK but I've had some issues The app in itself is good but I've had various issues from the beginning: (1) I couldn't login via Facebook as it offered because it just kept going back to the login screen (2) It has shut down randomly a few times when I've just started working out (3) It doesn't always communicate with MyFitnessPal as to the correct kilojoule/calorie amount burnt e.g. MapMyFitness says I've burnt 200 calories, but in My Fitness Pal it days a significantly lesser amount has been burnt (this could be issue with MFP though)   Full Review   
 Inconsistent I like the app and use it a lot but if I run the same route, the distance can be (isn't always but can be...) off by a fair amount.   Full Review   
 Works for me Provides features I need to track distance, pace, and variety of workout formats. It may have ability to give me course directions on the go when I want to run or bike a predetermined route, but I haven't figured out how to do that yet.   Full Review   
 Excellent Great app easy connection to other apps & fitness trackers easy loading...no complaints as of yet.   Full Review   
 Great way to track your fitness. Great app to track and share your fitness activity. Good way to challenge and motivate friends to get active.   Full Review   
 Inaccurate I walked 4.4 miles and 56 mins and the app said I did 1.2 miles and 25 mins,linked it to Bounts to earn points,obviously they don't want to give out to many   Full Review   
 My new trainer MapMyFitness is a great way to keep up with what you are doing and help you push yourself harder.   Full Review   
  No issues with Mapping or Logging of my walk on this occasion (1st time using this app). I'll give it a month and add more comments. But 5 star for now.   Full Review   
  Used to work well but now GPS stops 5 mins into a run and doest track properly   Full Review   
 Mapping My Fitness Great Fitness App which is a good aid for gauging your fitness progression. App has been malfunctioning by not letting me see activity feed or suggested friends, Im uninstalling then reinstalling   Full Review   
 Simply awesome, This app helps me track my activities like none other I've tried before, connectivity is the key for me,  I love it!   updated version is even better! Using it over a year now and I love it still just as much!   Full Review   
 GPS no longer working Update: gps is no longer working since I upgraded to an s7. No longer accurately tracks my walks. Very disappointed use to love this app.   Full Review   
 Will not sync to misfit Claims to work but fails to connect and just sits at loading screen   Full Review   
 It works Works nicely , I just wish it wouldn't keep asking for reviews when I have already reviewed it.   Full Review   
 Perfect for keeping me in line :) A great app with a rewards incentive for keeping to workout plans and challenges. Keeps you in line with times and logs workouts, GPS system is right on the button. The best app I have in my phone 5*****   Full Review   
 Easy to use Easy to use, my favorite app for tracking hikes and walks. I even use the map on trails as a guide so I don't get lost lol. Great app!   Full Review   
 Great App Easy to use and very motivating. I love it   Full Review   
 Gps On a high school track 1600 meters is a mile but the app says 1400 meters is a mile so I dont trust the distance at all but I like the training plan and the pro version is free is you have a anytime fitness membership   Full Review   
  This is a great tool to measure and track.   I also use it to get  walking/riding/rucking routes in parts of the world that are new to me.   Syncs pretty well, although calorie burn doesn't translate well.   I have noticed that fitbit will pick up workouts from this app in real time, but fitbit won't take workouts that are logged after the fact.   Full Review   
 Perfect for me I love this app because it makes it easier to track my fitness goals. I am now able to focus on performing at my best rather than keeping times and trying to figure out my speed.   Full Review   
  Just started using this app and love it already. No more guessing how I did!   Full Review   
 Flexible Connectivity Calorie calculations for a vast array of cardiovascular activities and automatic linkage with My Fitness Pal.   Full Review   
 Great app Have been using this mainly for walking but love it. I like when it tells you how far you have fone and the calories you have used.   Full Review   
 So far so good Just used it for forst time. Seems pretty accurate   Full Review   
 Nice App Gave 4 stars because there's always room for improvement!   Full Review   
 If dont have it you gots to get it Tracks distance, time, calories burned, avg speed and elevation changes awesome app   Full Review   
 Accurate and easy to use Have used this app for a long time and think it is excellent.  Love how it syncs with my Jawbone Up 3.   Full Review
title: Map My Fitness Workout Trainer

reviews:
Having some trouble I lost a lot of time and effort because at least one (I'm hoping not more) recipe suddenly went back to only providing only a link to the website where I had originally gotten it.  I had made tons of changes and added notes to the recipe from the various times I had made it, and wanted my husband to be able to make it from my recipe this morning.  But I had to sit down there with him and use the website to try to jog my memory and tell him what to do.  I rely heavily on this app. What has happened?   Full Review   
 Getting better (7th May) This app is going back in the right direction again. Scaling works at last making it a breeze to do the groceries and more importantly buying only the amount you use which saves you a bundle in unwasted food. Overall aesthetic design is still garish and really could be improved but I recommend this app for anyone who wants to be in control of their larder and fridge; store and create recipies that are scalable (make batches and freeze for a home cooked weekday meal, every day) Share with your family too!   Full Review   
  Its good, the first one of three that I downloaded today to see what would work. This seems good but again...NO ABILITY TO SCAN A RECIPE! Why is this not a functionality??????????? I don't want to spend time writing up a recipe I may see in a magazine somewhere...seems so dumb that nobody does this.   Full Review   
 Pretty good It's pretty useful. I just wish there was a nutritional information section but I just put it into the notes section   Full Review   
 Very handy Sometimes difficult to adjust ingredients on the mobile version (always seem to end up with too many #'s), but overall useful and easy to use once you work out some of the quirks.   Full Review   
 Great app. Not crazy about new layout I love the app! I love the additions and upgrades, but not the new appearance. I don't like the theme, or the thick colored frames around each recipe in the list. would love to see larger thumbnails of recipes in list view. The recipe photo is too stretched out. I would enjoy it more if photos were more prominent. It would be cool if extra photos could be added for steps.  I would also love it if after importing a recipe, there was a pop-up that gives an option of going to that recipe to view and edit.   Full Review   
 Best I've found Had problems logging in . Once I ignored that found it to be a fantastic program. Very adaptable.   Full Review   
  Spent half a day looking for the perfect Meal Planner App, and thought I'd struck gold.   Um...no.  It's no better than an Excel spreadsheet since you have to do all the work yourself, AND it's glitchy. Even on the sites it allows imports from, the measurements were ALWAYS off, and I'd have to go in and manually fix all of them before saving.  Also sucks that for the Meal Planner you can only add recipes (that you've created yourself, OR imported), and not any of the items I spent hours stocking my pantry with.  The 'HELP' page leads to nothing, and I could find NO assistance anywhere and had to spend hours just figuring out stuff for myself, so have moved back to my old app.  This app has SO MUCH potential, but unfortunately it's not supported like it should be, help pages don't work, and there's no guidance; you just have to figure it out. Well, instead of spending anymore time on it (I think I put in 12 hours), my "guidance" tells me to just use something else.  If this ever works like it's supposed to, I'll be back because the idea behind it is great.   Full Review   
  Absolutely disappointed with the latest update. The buttons in grocery list are too small.  It takes at least 5 attempts to tap on any of them to work.  I use a 10" tablet and they're still so small.   Also, I've created several custom categories and they can't be sorted, so they look like they're all over the place.   Full Review   
 Very helpful! I love that I can share the grocery list w/my husband. Also adding recipes from favorite sites is super easy. It's just what I needed.   Full Review   
 Couldn't Register Tried to register by email, Facebook, and Google. Just kept getting vague error messages. It seems like you can't use this app without making an account. Too bad since this app looked like something I could use.   Full Review   
 Used to love Been.using this app a long time but I hate the new layout. Going back to out of milk app.   Full Review   
 Wasn't very user friendly to me Very hard to edit or change things.   Full Review   
 Best one out there When you save a recipe from a website it misses ingredient portions sometimes and doesn't show cooking instructions but you can always go to the actual site.  I love that the screen doesn't dim when you have the recipe open.   Full Review   
  the last update fixed the help button but still give a black screen on planned meal. I begin to regret buying the pro version   Full Review   
 Great app I love this app and use it all the time. After the last update it won't calculate a shopping list total anymore? Can this be fixed?   Full Review   
 Doesn't always work. Website won't work. I can't log in or reset my password. The app itself doesn't always work either. Sometimes it will freeze for no reason and it's super slow. I love the idea in theory, especially since I paid for it.   Full Review   
 Nothing to say How do you use it   Full Review   
 Foodplanner So convenient  when  I  grocery  shop   Full Review   
 Good It gets the job done, but it could improve visually.   Full Review   
  This app is just great!   Full Review   
 Love it Easy to use and keep track of everythi g I need for healthy meals and gathering that meal.   Full Review   
 Good app It could be really helpful having different colours for different meal plans in the monthly view   Full Review   
 Buggy and slow I add recipes on my desktop and they don't always show up on the app. The grocery list component is bizarre. Does organize in any obvious way (meat, vegetables, etc.) and I end up with things like 'garlic' on the list ten times.   Full Review   
 Pretty good Really good app. Just needs to be able to pull from Pinterest.   Full Review   
 Works well Saves time   Full Review   
 Sync errors, Sync errors everywhere! Sync errors on login and import screen.   Full Review   
  Awesome!   Full Review   
  I like it!   Full Review   
 Very good app Very good app   Full Review   
 Excellent! Love it! ☺   Full Review   
 Ui Ui is gross   Full Review   
 I have been using this for a few weeks. So far so good. Great job dev team. Keep it up 4/2016 Update: i stopped using app for awhile and came back tonit recently. Lots of changes that i cant figure out. Like how to add a weeks worth of meal plan to the grocery list. Can only do 1 day at a time. Hitting the help menu feeezes the android. Moving down to 1 star until i can figure it out   Full Review   
 Getting there The bugs are getting fixed.  Still tends to not overwrite when syncing between phones.  Some items removed from one phone don't always remove from the other.   Full Review   
 Inventory don't work as it should When moving crossed off items to inventory Why can i just add 1 quantity. I have to manually add more. You also fail to answer any support questions...   Full Review   
 This app is great It keeps me on my Diet required by my doctor   Full Review   
 Glad I got a refund on the pro version Couldn't get the app to open and very disappointed because it looks like something I would really enjoy. Every attempt I made all it would do is freeze   Full Review   
  I cant stand app that force you to turn the tablet portrait.   Full Review   
  I used to really love this app, but it no longer tells me the total cost of my grocery list. That was the main feature I used. Very sad.   Full Review   
 Pinterest update? I love this app. Just wondering if there could be a way to link my Pins to the weekly recipe planner instead of bringing recipes in from Pinterest. It just seems like double the work.   Full Review
title: Food Planner

reviews:
I've used this site for almost 5 years now.  The recipes are awesome.....I found the old style (set up) more user friendly.  The new one has deterred me from using the app as frequently due to difficulty in finding what I am looking for.   Full Review   
 Mark Knapp It's a great app. But when scrolling the recipes. When leaving a recipe to continue on. It sends you back to the very beginning. Instead of letting you continue on where you left off. Not good. But other than that. A very good app. Lots of great ideas. Cheers   Full Review   
 Nutritional Info? Why do I have to pay for nutritional info? I can get plenty of other recipe apps for free that have the nutritional info. Installing and also unsubscribing from your emails now.   Full Review   
 :( Okay I like the idea, but why can't we see the saved recipes offline? What if I want to make something, but there's no internet connection? should I just wait for the connection to come back to make lunch for my family? I hope you can consider this.   Full Review   
 What's up with all the "1 serving" recipes? I guess we're just supposed to ignore the stated serving size. It is annoying even when accurate, but often obviously wrong. Just browsing randomly, I have only come across "1 serving" and "24 serving" recipes, neither of which are useful to me (if true).  I gave this app a shot because allthecooks recently imploded.   Full Review   
  The app is a little cumbersome to navigate but still a great app.  Suggestions: 1. the ability to set your homepage like you can on the Web version so you don't have to navigate through 4 pages to get to one of your recipes.  2. Off-line access to recipes in our folders is an absolute must,  especially if we are paying for pro membership.   Full Review   
  This gets three stars because of a terrible oversight in their UI, I want to see my recipes first.  If I took the time to type it in, I want it prioritized over everything else.  But for some reason, I have to go digging every time.  It's extremely annoying.    The grocery and menu planning are great, once you can finally get to the recipes you want.  I don't even know why they have your favorite recipes when they insist on showing you everything but.    For a paid service this is unacceptable.   Full Review   
 Redesign Please The app is great in theory but not always in practice. First  a material redesign would be nice. The app as it is now is sort of ugly and feels clunky. The website and the app don't seem to communicate together very well at times. That being said I like the app for meal planning and creating shopping lists. Overall, I feel everything could be executed much better.   Full Review   
 Additional things You should add high calories to diet and be able to see how much calories in each meal   Full Review   
 Too expensive All interesting aspects of this app come at a hefty price. Want to download your own recipe? Cool but it'll cost you a dollar, per recipe...   Full Review   
 Convenient I use this app often. It is very convenient when I'm out of ideas for dinner. I do wish there was an "edit" option for the reviews.   Full Review   
  This is the best app. You can use it for quick recipe or you can get very in depth with your meal planning. I just hope they don't mess it up with future updates.   Full Review   
 Frustrated  and furious I can not add to my folder. I went to help site and watched the help video which would have been helpful if it was the same as my app. Tried to get in touch with help desk. Now it does not recognize my password and does not send me an email to reset. All went wrong when i paid for premium! It would be wonderful if it worked!!!! Hope to goodness I can get my money back!!!!!!   Full Review   
 Great for all levels of experience!! I absolutely love this app, lately been having an issue with search feature. Error pops up saying error communicating with bigoven and then crashes.  Will give five stars when fixed.   Full Review   
 Horrible app If all you want to do is drag and drop their recipes or clip from Web and use that as a menu planner and grocery list it will be good,  but if you're looking for something to build you're own recipes or build grocery list not from recipes it is cumbersome and annoying. Interface jumps from flashy recipes mode to droning "linked to big oven webserver" mode. Unable to upload pictures for your own recipes from Android phone (you have to go to computer). Stupid,  I have not owned a Windows computer in 10 years! Any cook worth their salt has recipes or modifies the ones they get and they build shopping lists a lot. This app is not for you.  Uninstalling.   Full Review   
 I depend on this app! I am in love with BigOven! It has changed the way I meal plan, shop, and cook...for the better! It makes cooking at home so much easier for me. The only reason I am not giving it 5 stars is because it occasionally is buggy and slow. And that makes it hard when I depend on it so much, and I use it every day.   Full Review   
 Great service app is laggy requires internet The service is great but the app needs more work.  Biggest complaint is that adding to or viewing the grocery list is sluggish. Also, if you have spotty internet access the app will not work well.  The app doesn't render the list and sync in the background like most To Do lists.  If you have poor connectivity and bring up the app in the grocery store it doesn't work well or sometimes even at all.   Full Review   
  I LOVE BigOven!!!!!!!!!  It makes cooking so much easier.  I use it multiple times a day.  It's hard to pick my favorite part of it because it makes so many things easier - from choosing a recipe amongst their huge collection or your own private recipes (best search features ever allowing me to use up ingredients, avoid ingredients, etc.) ... to creating a menu plan that keeps me get and stay organized for the week ... to making a grocery list that's easy to use at the store (and easy to change/edit - how often does that need to be done, right?).  It's easy to use, and the customer service has always been phenomenal whenever I've had a question or suggestion.   There are so many little features that you can use if and only when you want to, that make it amazing.   Full Review   
  Luv it and use it often but I don't have the PRO version and for some reason I used to be able to share recipes and post pictures but can't anymore, why is that? I would luv to upgrade to PRO but $20/mth is way to expensive   Full Review   
 Love Big Oven Great app. Have enjoyed several recipes. Its so easy to use.   Full Review   
 Great app I love being able to set up menus, including my own recipes, and generate a shopping list. There are also many recipes to look up and try out. My one complaint is in moving between devices my shopping cart items often get lost. I haven't found anyone else who has recipes that can be put in a meal planner then added to a shopping list.   Full Review   
 Big Oven Great app, only reason I won't rate as 5 stars is the app often refers to external source links for recipe directions. It is a bit of a hassle, but the app is still well worth the download!   Full Review   
 Best cookbook as long as you have the space for it. I can find everything from south-style greens to homemade ice cream to just plain old hamburgers in 4 different cooking styles: grilled, baked, stovetop, and forgot the other. I have An older phone so sadly it doesn't have enough space for it until I get a new one. It's a kind of big app. Also, I don't even use the premium feature as usually I can find the recipe through search. Awesome find.   Full Review   
 Always something new. This is the only recipe app. I've kept. Whenever I log on to this app there's always fresh new ideas. The editors pick its awesome and there's many different ways of doing the same old food. I'm very pleased with the amount of recipes on here. I also never see the recipes repeated and I love the to try. And the save this button. Thanks for a great app.   Full Review   
 More.. Love it because it gives lots of different ways you can make almost anything with.. love looking on here for new things to try and things I've never even seen or heard about..   Full Review   
 It has it all, even if you don't go pro It's easy to use, it has all I need to organize my week, and that was even before I went pro. It is just great. One small annoying thing though is I have to logoff and back in every time to have my pro no ads version, I wish they fixed that!   Full Review   
 Love it Love the extensive recipes, and so many different cultural recipes as well. Haven't cooked a single bad recipe yet.   Full Review   
 Thinking about Subscription I love this app. Recently discovered it, but have used it more than any. Tried several recipes and liked them all. I am disappointed that I can only do certain tasks if I subscribe ( I am a broke student). However, if I continue to enjoy the app...subscribing  is my next step.   Full Review   
  Nice app.  I found some very good recipes with this.   And the amount of recipes available is second to none. I love the user added photos also.  Only one question.   Is their a way to move recipes around to other folders after you have tried them? Or delete them from your folders if you no longer want them?   Full Review   
 Lots of Recipes Plenty of easy to follow recipes with a shopping list generator.  What could be simpler. Would have been 5 stars if dev hadn't taken the app offline the second time I tried to use it, use a backup server while running upgrades!   Full Review   
 Use it alot I find some really good recipes on this app. I use it quite a bit.   Full Review   
 Not letting me access favourite recipes I save recipes to the "to try" option but then it doesn't let me view them it states that there is a communication problem to BigOven despite a perfect connection to my internet, a very useful app with this problem being its only downfall   Full Review   
 Awesome It's a great app very exciting if you love to cook and trying new recipes   Full Review   
 Irrelevant searches I really like this app, and it's my Go To place for new recipe ideas and quick menu suggestions. However it can be frustrating at times when you search for menus containing chicken, for example, and the search engine pulls up Mac n Cheese.   Full Review   
 Doesn't work LG V10 I pay monthly for Pro version.  I just changed for HTC M8 to LG V10.  HTC worked fine.  New phone keeps telling me that I need too buy the membership but will then day I'm already subscribing   Full Review   
 Excellent recipes I've tried a lot of recipes from this app and they've all been easy and delicious.  I've added other recipe apps and eventually deleted them.  This is the ONLY one I can't live without.  It's great that you can import recipes.  Now I know where all my recipes are rather than having to look at bookmarks or other apps.  I really do love Big Oven!   Full Review   
 In love with this app Started using this app about  three years ago. I absolutely love it!!!! Such good recipes and so easy to use. :D Amazing!!!   Full Review   
 No Longer Predictable Chef Mom Love this app!  Keeps my family hopping with new recipes.  Allows me to search for recipes using the ingredients I have on hand.  Such a great tool!  Ad placement on new update I know you guys need to make your money and I've been using your app since WAY back when you guys first came out and have enjoyed this app immensely, but your ad placement is getting out of hand. Placing an ad on the top of the log page is SO annoying and highly distracting. It also seems to re-load at a pretty constant rate which leads me to think it's using my data unnecessarily. Be creative with your ad placement and not look like you only care about us a revenue source.   Full Review   
 Ads / overpriced subscription I've been a user of this app for a long time. I understand the need to monetize, but it's starting to get a bit out of hand. Premium is too expensive, and now there are ads cluttering up the UI. Not a good move.   Full Review   
 Great app! It took a little getting used to, but once you get the hang of it this is a great app! It is easy to use & a very effective weight loss tool. I'm already down 29 lbs.   Full Review   
  My favorite health app!  It has been very useful to me and my health goals.  I love that you can make recipes that combines ingredients and divides it into servings, helping out the home-cook!  It has an extensive database, part of which is crowd-sourced.  Crowd-sourcing does have its downfalls (sometimes items are inaccurate), but this app compensates by allowing you to edit food details, for instance, after scanning a barcode.  Sometimes it lacks restaurant items, but you can enter a custom item (such as something you looked up on google) and that is good enough for me.  The custom options really make the app!  Besides those benefits, this is the one app I love updating.  The team actually writes what is being improved in the "what's new" section, making it seem like someone actually cares and is working on real problems.  The developers seem to actually listen to complaints and FIX the problems!  Keep up the good work guys!   Full Review   
 Better than MFP I definitely find the UI and UX better than MFP. Easier to use, more intuitive, better looking, less obtrusive ads and sponsored content. Only thing missing is Garmin connect communication! Definitely bump up to 5 stars with that functionality.   Full Review   
 Great App Love this app. Downloaded after reading bad reviews about weight watchers. It is easy to use and lots of great features. My favorite is the barcode scanner. It makes it easy to add the calories onto my daily log. I also love that I could link my activity tracker to the app. It adds my calories earned from exercise. So great. Download it, you won't regret it. I am thinking that I might purchase the premium app based on how great the free version is.   Full Review   
  After 3 attempts to resolve the problem...linking with Google Fit "breaks" the app.  You lose the ability to scan or manually search for foods to enter and the app locks up.  The developers are aware of this, but my last email response stated that they hadn't identified the "glitch" so they can't estimate when it will be resolved and to keep an eye on updates in the Google Play store.  As a paid subscriber that only paid for the sync ability, I'm not happy.  They extended my membership 2 months as compensation, but that was 2 months ago and the app is still not working.  If I have to use an app that won't sync with Google Fit I might as well go back to MyNetDiary since it has far superior Diabetes tracking and reporting.   Full Review   
 Good app This app kept me accountable for my 30-lb weight loss, and continues to be the best thing I have done for my health. I like the layout and ease of use, and as a result, I've never lost motivation to log my food everyday.   Full Review   
 Love it! This app really keeps you on track.. It's super easy to use and when I do follow it.. I Lose weight! I have recommended it to several friends! I think there are a few minor bugs with sending friend invites and I wish you were able to post pictures in the comment field . especially for the challenges. . All in all.... GREAT APP!   Full Review   
 Could be better for android Easy to use food tracker, but doesn't sync with samsung gear, so it doesn't recognize my steps.  Food calorie counts with Android seem off in many cases. Worked much better with my IPhone.   Full Review   
 Excellent program After I found how to work with its unfriendly interface I was amazed how powerful is it. There are complete list of foods and dishes including international. Thank you for this awesome software!!!   Full Review   
 Love the interface! I used to track calories with MyFitnessPal, but I found the interface on that app cumbersome and difficult to use. I really like the interface on Lose It!   Full Review   
 Good app, bad localization for Android. This app is rather intelligent, but fails 3/4 times to let me search up my entries on strong 50 MB WiFi. Please fix.   Full Review   
  My last diet i used my fitness pal. These are the best 2 apps for diet control and i suppose it would be personal preference between the two.   Full Review   
 Good but errors I cannot change So having to uninstall. Confused, it asked for my weight etc at the startup, once on the app it's telling me I weigh 13kg that's TWO stone so I need to eat 3000 calories a day. I entered the correct weight, it won't let me change it or I can't find an option to do so in all of the settings. If that part was cleared up then sure it seems like a great app with the pie charts and calorie search/goals etc   Full Review   
 Buggy This is extremely buggy.  Search doesn't work.  Can't pull up right foods. Repetitive foods and many have different calorie counts.   Full Review   
 Love it! I cannot say enough good things about Lose it. I recommend it (highly) to anyone who wants to safely lose weight at a healthy rate. Even the "free" app is pretty darn good if you ask me. Much better than other weight loss/activity tracking apps I have tried. Thanks Lose it!   Full Review   
 Keep track and lose as much as you want Love this, I've done well with this app. Gonna go strong again!   Full Review   
 Not quite as user friendly as other aps I've been using Noom for about a year,  and functionality of the two aps are nearly identical. I tried LoseIt as it works with the Microsoft Band 2. However, LoseIt is a far chunkier UI (compared to Noom) and it's food item search is intolerably slow,  both with on line wifi and offline. On the plus side,  it's recipes are better, and it's integration with the Microsoft health service strong.   Full Review   
 Half done I dont need to lose weight i need to gain it i like the food tracking portion of this app but unfortunately it isnt geared towards my health goals of gaining weight hopefully you guys consider not everyone is over weight some people are on the opposite side of the spectrum   Full Review   
 Works for me! But... This app has been useful to me for two years+ in logging food. However...now less user-friendly, more complicated to enter foods and barcode button located too close to other feature. Using Android on phone.   Full Review   
 Incorrect information Has nice some features. Soon as I downloaded I scanned several items in my kitchen...unfortunately it was incorrect on the calories on several items, and not by a small amount. Being several hundred calories off in a diet app makes it hard to trust.   Full Review   
 Great! I love that you can use the barcode to log calories....what I would love to tweak, would be logging excersise calories burned, because there is a differnce in your number to what I abctually burn. I would love it if you were able to change the number and allow you to type in notes like cardio trainer app. I went from a 4 star to a 3 star due to me switching from a fitbit to a Garmin Vivofit HR and lose it does not sync with Garmin products, super dissapointing.   Full Review   
 Great App but it's frustratingly slow at times I switched from Myfitnesspal app to this. I like it overall but when searching the food database, I find it to be way too slow. There should be an option to download the food database to the app and for it to update the cached database automatically. This would speed up searches greatly and I believe fix my issues.   Full Review   
 Not accurate always Sometimes when I log food it doesn't add it to my daily total and says I have eaten less calories than I have. For example yesterday it only counted my breakfast even though I logged lunch and dinner and snacks   Full Review   
 Great app!!!! I lost some weight with this but i ended up regainingit all back when i uninstalled it   Full Review   
  Easy etc.  Wish they hadn't gone with prime paid features though.   Full Review   
 Samsung Gear Will Lose It ever be able to sync with the Samsung Gear? That's is the activity tracker I use. And it would be great if I could use 1 app.   Full Review   
  Plz i want the full apps make it free i mean the options of pro the fre version is just a joke plz i give u 5star to improve it just a little bit like pro thx alot   Full Review   
 Great Best app like this out there! Really easy to use and very helpful.   Full Review   
 Won't let me upgrade I've been trying to upgrade to.premium however all it does is say loading...foreverrr. I sat there 30mins with it saying loading. Closed out restarted same thing.   Full Review   
  Love the app,  want to upgrade and it just says "loading" forever!   Full Review   
  love it, this app has helped me tremendously on how to eat in portions.   Full Review   
 Lost 45lbs so far Information is power and "Lose It" gives you power to make weight loss easier. Thousands of items are already in their database waiting for you to pull up and log in(or enter custom foods) Set a weight loss target and Lose it will give you a daily calorie budget to meet that goal. Enter your calories burned off by exercise and get credit to eat more (or not and lose faster). Buy the premium upgrade and link your favored exercise tracking device and "Lose It" will automatically update your calories burned.   Full Review   
 New update Not a fan of the new update. I've been using the app for 4 years now and found it easily accessible . You could pull it out and quickly log your meal in before anybody saw you. (I didn't like my friends knowing that I worried about my weight). Since the update, the app tends to lag and it takes longer to log in. I love the app and hope they address the issue.   Full Review   
  Too big widthwise for device, no way to add what I'm eating to log.   Full Review   
 Good Stuff Super easy to navigate with a huge database of foods to choose from. Also, whoever types the script for "What's New" in the Play Store is absolutely hilarious.   Full Review
title: Lose It!

reviews:
Loved it until... Loved the app until I realized it does not do the math correctly on portions/servings.  If you only eat 1/2 a serving, it still counts the entire serving for your totals!  I cant sit here and enter every food 10 different times with different serving sizes.  Not worth the effort.   Full Review   
 Nice app! I like this app ... easy to use and personalize. The only thing I would suggest is that there should be subtotals for each meal ... for protein, carbs and fat.  Each meal should be balanced, not just the whole day.   Full Review   
 So far it looks great! I just installed this morning and the third time I opened, it asked me to rate. I haven't had enough time to give a useful review. I did start tracking my food today and it was very easy. I'm looking forward to using this app more as well as exploring the site from my desktop. Maybe a few days into using the app would be a better length of time before asking for a review. On the negative side, I haven't found a way to log out. I don't want to constantly be logged into any app.   Full Review   
 Exactly what I needed I've never given a written review on any of the many many apps I've used over the years, but this one is so perfect I had to say something. Everything I need for daily nutrition tracking.   Full Review   
 Worthless as an app. Waste of time. Buggy. Useless in most fuctionality. Socializing is impossible as you can't add or even find your friends using the app or on the site . Most of the sites working functions can be found on other apps without the the load of adds and mediocrity. Bottom line I would not recommend spark people to anyone as it is completely unsatisfactory as anything more than a calorie checker with added useless features that do not work.   Full Review   
 Best app I have ever used This app is very easy to get around. It not only helps me count calories but also let's me watch my salt and fat intake. I have tried other apps with failure. I plan on staying for a while. I am a cardiac patient and nutrition and exercise  has become a big part of my life. Thank you!   Full Review   
  I've tried a lot of calorie counting apps and sparkpeople's food directory is by far the best one out there. It's really easy to scan foods, find what you're looking for, and add a food item that's not already there. Very thorough and user friendly even if you've never used this kind of app before! Sparkpoints motivate you 👍   Full Review   
 Was working great until last update App was working well until the last update.  Now does nothing when you try to log info, for both food and exercise.  Tried Uninstaller,  then reinstall.  Same problems.  Too bad,  this was a great app,  linked with fitbit,  good tips,  etc.   Full Review   
  I have only just started using it today but it seems pretty good so far... Haven't found anything wrong yet :)   Full Review   
  It would be good if you could search something and the nutritional fact come from the company instead of having to add. Everyone facts different.   Full Review   
 Great app I love the fact that you can scan bar code of your favourite food and add to your tracker. All the info is automatically entered.  Brilliant!   Full Review   
 Spark People Helps in every way. Went from 200 to 173.7 this evening.  I am just beginning to get good at this.   Full Review   
 Love hate I love the way it counts everything, but how do I go back and view yesterdays info? Last weeks? Shoot, halfway through the day it looses everything I've put it. Its also upsetting that it has suggested daily values... but suggested off what? Im on a ketogenic diet, why is it saying I should get up to 300 carbs a day? And of course that means fat and protein are off as well.   Full Review   
 So far I dig it I wish it had a larger excercise database,but overall it's good.   Full Review   
 Everything I need It's so easy to log everything, food, exercise, weight, and everything else you might want.   Full Review   
 Great App I love it, the app is easy to use and very intuitive. I love the barcode scan, it helps me avoid having to enter my food manually.   Full Review   
 Love it Sparkpeople is an excellent community and the app is improving all the time. Easy to use and have never had a problem with it.   Full Review   
 Incredible motivation tool for losing weight This is the most useful app I have ever found to help me be accountable for what I consume.   Full Review   
 Its amazing Keeps me motivated. Makes me want to go out and exercise and even eat some new healthy foods!! The community is amazing!   Full Review   
 Has almost everything But it's a little buggy on my phone. Otherwise I love it .   Full Review   
 Good app Calculates daily intake of food and  what's required depending on weight, age, etc   Full Review   
 Love it This app has really helped me stick to a new eating habit.   Full Review   
 Total Accountability I  love how you track everything according to your goals.   Full Review   
 Interesting I think I found motivation.  This app is pretty fun with the points and chat.   Full Review   
  More choices for exercise and foods than other apps. Easy to use!   Full Review   
 Good app I'm trying not to be fat. This app helps me be less fat.   Full Review   
 Excellent I've been a Sparkpeople member for longer than I care to remember and this app makes tracking food and exercise so easy I have no excuse. I'm very happy with the way this works!   Full Review   
 Helpful app The app is pretty easy to use, like the chat and blogs.   Full Review   
 Great app for accountability Using this app alongside the Tracy Anderson dynamic eating plan and metamorphosis program is helping me get awareness of calories and activity. Great and easy way to become more health aware.   Full Review   
  Great database and I love the positive vibes it gives. Not the easiest to navigate through, but you will get it eventually. Really nice app   Full Review   
 Huge Database Love the huge database of food. I can easily search and add foods. The calculator keeps track of my calories for me. Navigation takes just a little while to get used to but otherwise an awesome app. Well worth it!!   Full Review   
 I love SparkPeople I would totally recommend this to anyone looking motivation for losing weight and getting fit.   Full Review   
 Great This is a great app to track the amount of calorie intake and the amount burned   Full Review   
 Easy to navigate and use Great reference tools and tracker for life changes   Full Review   
 Takes some figuring out Journaling and recording food and exercise is easy. But creating and figuring out recipes is not. If I make a hot dish for my family and add 1 lbs hamburger, some rice, tomato's, ect...it is not easy to figure out my portion.   Full Review   
 so far so good.. one day.. I'll update after using it for a month.   Full Review   
  Really love it just wish there was an option to share my stats and achievements with FB. If there is I havent found it yet.   Full Review   
 Great app for dieters Like this app, it's great for dieters. Set up your notifications right away or your phone will blow up from all the meal and exercise reminders.   Full Review   
 Works Looking for pay app to remove ads. I like the simplicity. Very kewll. Sold.  Now that it is installed, now comes hard part, I know, right?!!   Full Review   
  It is fantastic, I love being able to type in what I am eating into the tracker righf ad I am eating. I had tried sparkpeople before but this makes it so much easier to use. Thank you for sparking my health!   Full Review
title: Calorie Counter & Diet Tracker

reviews:
Probably my favorite app of all time. I've listened to most of the meditations, even the ones meant for children, and use them to help me sleep. I've had severe insomnia pretty much my entire life, but these meditations can usually ease me to sleep before the recording is even over! Granted, I've listened so often to some of them that I practically have them memorized now. I hope that there will be some new ones in the future, but even if there aren't, this app is a keeper for sure.   Full Review   
 Incredibly helpful! This is my go-to when nothing else is helping my anxiety. I use it several times a week and is very helpful in finding my "happy place". :)   Full Review   
 Wow This is one of the best if not the best app in its genre and I love it, but I use it everyday 😁   Full Review   
 Wow, I'm impressed! This app is really free and really helps. I have been having an unusual amount of anxiety and feeling overwhelmed lately. Then, dealing with my lower back pain is difficult because I am an active person and I can't be as active as I want to. This app helps to remind me to just breathe and every thing will be alright.   Full Review   
 Love it It's amazing it is free. Great meditations guided by a lovely voice. Thanks a lot.   Full Review   
 Great for kids We have a child who takes hours to settle down to sleep. Using these audios has cut that time down to 30 min and is often asleep by the end of the audio. Lifesaver and my kids looks forward to it every night.   Full Review   
 A five star app Easy to follow videos, effective meditation techniques and well written, informative articles to read.  I am delighted to have found this excellent app - thank you developer.   Full Review   
 Be Safe...Be Happy...Be At Peace The information in this app is priceless in value. I have a history with CBT & was never any good at achieving results. Then again, I was not aware of the need for continuous trained repetition for successful change. Awesome knowledge and great meditations. The meditations could be longer for experienced mediators though. I find that 10 to 20 minutes is quite short. Love it.   Full Review   
 Perfect. Actually literally free. Its so nice to find a free app like this. The voice is soothing, the different meditations are wonderful, and there's so many to choose from. It's really and truly the only app like this that I have found that is any good at all. Highly recommended for anyone looking for guided meditation and relaxation!   Full Review   
 Amazing Best relaxation app I've tried (and I've tried the much acclaimed Andrew Johnson ones). This app has so much in it and its so easy to use. I always find it incredibly easy to sleep after listening to one of the relaxation audios, the guided imagery is really nice. Would recommend (and I do) to anyone who wants to experience a deeper relaxation, beginner or not.   Full Review   
 Brilliant Peaceful mindful meditative relaxation.   Full Review   
 So much information at your fingertips The mindfulness audios I have used with my kids and I use the Qui Gong links almost every day.   Full Review   
 Love it! I've had this app on my old phone and when I got a new one I forgot all about it. So pleased I found this again, it really helps me switch off and the audios are so so good. I'm even happier with it now that I've realised it has Qigong videos since I've recently started going to classes.   Full Review   
 Great app! Lots of choices and live streams from web site so it doesn't use up my storage! Gets me to sleep peacefully and great for my daughter! Love love love this app. Havent been able to find another that comes close.  Would love some new  scenarios though!   Full Review   
 Useful, healing, soothing I use this app for meditation and sleep relaxation. There are also some fantastic audios for panic and anxiety. Great variety in sensory meditation. Love. This. App.   Full Review   
 No Achievemint? Love your apps! Helpful, lots of info, easy to follow for self improvement. But why no Achievemint sync for this one?   Full Review   
 Useful Great variety of audios for relaxation, mindfulness & loving kindness. Supplements my weekly meditation class as i can use it everyday for practice.   Full Review   
 Excellent Very good app. Many different audios and videos. Soothing\ relaxing.   Full Review   
 It's the best Wonderful variety, different techniques. Great for the whole family, including for labor relaxation!   Full Review   
 Amazing I do this with my dog who is very jumpy at night and at night when I started this she has been a lot less jumpy and I can tell a major difference in her sleeping patterns, it has also helped me sleep at night, me and my dogs both have anxiety so it really helps us both.   Full Review   
 Awesome I love this app.  Great info on mindfulness,  beautiful guided meditations, lots of great stuff to explore.   Full Review   
  It's looking dated now but it does not matter. The content is good and that's what matters.   Full Review   
 Fantastic Use this every single night.  Love the new audios since after awhile I could recite what she was saying! Good thing that means I can tap into the memory and use it at other time   Full Review   
 Good but... There is no way to prevent the app from continuing to run in the background when you exit or log out. Otherwise good app but deducting 1.5 stars and uninstalling for this reason.   Full Review   
 Unnecessary for me Just never bothered with it. I already do yoga and HIIT. The audios are the same as another app by this company so it was just redundant. It works fine just like the others but I really don't need it.   Full Review   
 Love it Works great with panic attacks,and so much more....   Full Review   
 Amazing Its free and it really does work. I recommend it. The app helps you meditate easier and faster plus it shows you other ways with step to step instructions. With a soothing voice and nice background music . Love love love it.   Full Review   
  This site appeals to me. Thank you to the people that have knowledge in and on this site..good for you.   Full Review   
  First time listened it played to end was helpful. Then played 6 minutes only.  So streamed played 6 minutes it stopped. Downloaded what I wanted now doesn't play at all. Hopeless. Information tells me there's 24 or so minutes but won't play. Downloaded all mindfulness.  Hopeless. Have u got suggestions   Full Review   
 Best for me I use it to fall asleep paints beautiful  pictures in my mind   Full Review   
  I use this every night to fall asleep. I just downloaded the update and I'm excited to listen to the new meditations. My only negative comment is that I don't care much for the woman's voice; to me it is harsh and the cadence of her voice can occasionally be jarring instead of relaxing (however, I've learned to skip those meditations.)   Full Review   
 The best relaxation app ever I have used this app every day for the past two years.   Full Review   
 Love this app! My daughter sleeps like a baby! Thank you!   Full Review   
  A really good app. I've been using it for quite a while.   Full Review   
  First time using meditation of any kind. So far I have yet to stay awake during the music part of the relaxation phase of this app due to the fact it relaxes me just enough to drift off to sleep. My surgical doctor asked me to try this and I love it!!!!!   Full Review   
  Helps me relax so that I sleep better at night.   Full Review   
 Really  nice I like this app very much it is really  helpful  and nicely  made.   Full Review   
 Great app Help a lot to reduce stress of life   Full Review   
 Thank you! Thank you for bringing back the children's imagery! My 9 year old will not use any other app!  Love it! Best guided imagery for kids!   Full Review   
 Simply great I recommend it to everyone. Change the world by changing yourself.   Full Review
title: Qi Gong Meditation Relaxation

reviews:
More options I wish it had more options. Different sounds and longer meditation times. I use a different app for meditation music and I normally do two 3 min sessions. But other than that, I enjoy the app. :) good for people like me who's just starting to meditate   Full Review   
 It was better earlier. The sounds stop after two bells or gongs. The app isn't working well.  The concept is good that u work up for longer minutes. Which I had achieved with my last phone.  Here its become worse.  I wish there were more options of the gongs or bells.  Sometimes its jarred.   Full Review   
 Use It Daily I've gotten into the habit of using this before bed each night, it gives my mind something to ponder as I go to sleep. I really love this app.   Full Review   
 Not helpful Simple tool, concept is fine. However the quotes repeat and are not amazing. The sounds don't work consistently, which annoyingly means the end chine doesn't always work and so you may worry about if time is up.   In the end not a great app.   One nice feature is the alternative day reminder.   Full Review   
 Simple Simple app that does what it says. I like how it eases you in and gradually increases the amount of time you meditate for. Sad you have to be reminded to take a moment for yourself but this is the world we live in.   Full Review   
 I use this everyday I like the quotes. It helps me to center myself when I go overboard on a certain part of my life. I changed because of this app   Full Review   
 Meditation App I judt started so I think its unfair to rate so soon, but so far its good.   Full Review   
 A Must Amazing program. It is a must if you are like me and work alot and do not have the ample amount of time to actually sit for extended periods of time. Namaste.   Full Review   
 Awesome! I am new to meditation & this is very helpful to me, love the inspirational quotes & the easy step by step progression. Great app!   Full Review   
 Simple but effective This meditation app is very pleasant. It also reminds you to do it which is very useful. Two minutes is perfect and it is doable, whereas a longer time might put some people off of trying at all. You can always do more than one session however.   Full Review   
 Wonderful A lovely app. Simple words of wisdom, and a gentle reminder When it's been a couple days. Really has helped me find a sense of calm in my busy life.   Full Review   
 Meditation made easy! So thankful for this specific meditation app, it gradually helps you build to stronger, deeper practice and is exciting to use. Has become a daily ritual and I love it. Happier, brighter days ahead!   Full Review   
 Awesome Meditation App Perfect for those so busy to find the time to meditate.  Really easy todo and the timer is really very helpful.  Highly recommend to those who need peace and quiet.   Full Review   
 It's okay I like the quotes and the meditation sounds. However my phone does not register the volume on this app, so I always have to remember to turn the sound up before I open the app. Also, I'm starting to wish it could be longer than three minutes!   Full Review   
 Great app! As a newbie to meditation, I find this is a wonderful way to get started at meditation. The app has great images and simple phrases to help clear the mind. I enjoy the meditation bell, too.   Full Review   
 Very pleased Have wanted to get back into meditation for a long while and this is making it easy to do so. Only complaint is the bell isn't sounding at the end, but sitting a little longer isn't a bad thing.   Full Review   
 Nice intro to meditation If your constantly on the go and find it difficult to meditate for long periods of time. This app is for you. with shorter sessions of meditation you can practice in time that works for you and still get the benefits of mindful meditation   Full Review   
 The wisdom I learned by meditating Our mind n thoughts determines our happiness or unhappiness in life. Patience is a important key in life n loving n letting go is a part of all relationships.   Full Review   
 Very nice As a parent It is a tough balance between personal happiness and family happiness. Thanks to this wonderful app I can revisit my sits in the zen temple and really feel realizing one self to the maximum. Thank you for this wonderful tool for all of us busy people. Namo Amitabha   Full Review   
 Calming This app comes with beautiful words of wisdom to help you focus and calm your mind.  I really like that it has option to turn bell on or off.    Only downside is I wish it was timed at 10 minutes instead of 3 minutes,  for me it just seems a bit short but it's a perfect amount of time for any person with a busy life.  I highly recommend this app to anyone!   Full Review   
 Good app The sound settings are a little buggy and I also wish you could change the length of meditation instead of having to move up in levels... but other than that it is a great app.   Full Review   
 Enjoying "breaking into" meditation one step at a time. Update: I got a new phone and lost all my data forcing me back to short meditation sessions. Wish there was a backup.  This is helping my new year resolution and bringing me peace in my life.   Full Review   
 Good introduction to meditation Good, basic app. Images and words a bit repetitive but it's a start. If 3 minutes isn't enough I just press restart - I don't find that too interruptive.   Full Review   
 Very cool app Keeps you at 0 stress level during day. Good time for me is morning/onwakeup & evening/beforebed   Full Review   
 Meditate Great I know meditation is simple and can be difficult too. This app really is helping me get started. I like it a lot.   Full Review   
 Anxiety relief As a teenager who adjusts the changes on becoming an adult, I recommend the helpful quotations to ease our uncalm minds   Full Review   
 Worth it I struggle with bad anxiety and depression. I use this for 3 minutes a day sometimes twice! It really helps to calm the seemingly endless train of thoughts in my head.   Full Review   
 Worth it This app is convenient and helps me refocus when I get off track. Even if you don't practice consistently, the mantras are perfect for resetting your thoughts and awareness.   Full Review   
 Tranquil Great for a moment of peace in all our busy and distracted lives. So much benefit in one little app. I listen to this every day.   Full Review   
 Not a fan of the messages The concept & design are nice, but the messages are nearly all stated in negative terms. Pay attention and you'll see... Everything is "don't" or "not". Today I'm finally installing it because the first words were "Failure is..."  A truly good meditation should be started in positive terms.   Full Review   
 Nice meditation Cool app.  Very handy when you feel a little stressed out.   Full Review   
 Calming Easy to use.   I've gotten a couple of the  same words of wisdom which is disappointing but only a little and I've switched phones so that's part of the reason.   Full Review   
 Great meditation starter I was skeptical of meditation in general but this app has really introduced a meaningful process into my habits.   Full Review   
 It's good! Good app, found the sounds a little harsh but you can turn them off so its fine.   Full Review   
 New to meditation I am just starting to learn hoe to meditate.  I like how it starts you out slow and adds time as you go.   Full Review

My psychiatrist suggested that I look into practicing Mindfulness and meditation to help me cope with the stress that comes with these illnesses. Thanks to this app, as well as some supplemental reading and research, I've been seeing some great improvements with my mental health! You don't need to live with mental illness in order to get something out of this app, though. Everyone could use some relaxation!   Full Review
