 Great way to start my Day! Most mornings I use the guided meditation. When I just want to have their lovely,  calming background noise I will use the timed session. I really am much more calm and focused throughout my day.   Full Review   
 Best guided meditation Best guided meditation I've ever used and it's totally worth the money. I use abo it every day and there are so many options!!!   Full Review   
 I use it everyday It brings a variety of meditation practices, from short to longer ones. I use to do one conducted meditation per day, but you can also set the timer and meditate all by yourself.   Full Review   
 Just what I needed Dealing with the anxiety and stress of daily life has been a challenge for me. Years ago, I used meditation and relaxation techniques, which really helped. I had not been able to get back into those practices until I found this app. Having the guided programs that this app provides gives me what I need to get back into it again. Now I look forward to each upcoming session, and the difference it has made is very noticeable.   Full Review   
  I absolutely love this app. I just wish I could turn off the screen and still have the music playing in the background.   Full Review   
 Changes everything! //UPDATE: I love the new Daily Calm meditations!!! Can we make them in 20 minute version by just adding extra unguided minutes?// I have been using Calm a few days a week for a year now. I am now up to 20 minutes a day every day and it really has helped increase my ability to respond mindfully to whatever hapens during the day. It really works!   Full Review
title: Calm - Meditate, Sleep, Relax

reviews:
Great app, but drains battery I have this on my phone and my Nook tablet. I plug in my phone on and off over the course of the day, but never had to with my Nook until I installed this app. That being said, I really like the dimmer screen when reading in the evening and before bed. Sometimes I'll turn it off to take a screenshot or see something in greater detail and the screen will be so bright I'm amazed that I used to read at that level! I highly recommend this for anybody who is on their phone or tablet before bed.   Full Review   
 What I needed. Been using for a while now, there is no doubt that it does do what it says it does. Only problem is the drain on battery.   Full Review   
 Works I'm able to fall asleep much easier now even after reading a book on my phone. Very easy to use and set up. I like the options of having it an always, to turn on when the sun goes down (this is how mine is set) or custom set time. I've been using it for about 13 months.   Full Review   
 Love it! It's awesome. I've been using it for a couple of weeks, and I pretty much can't live without it. Please make an app for my dumb iPad too please!   Full Review   
 Niiice Sleepy an extra hour. This app actually got me to sleep early without effort. And I actually planned to stay up. Nice job indeed. :-)   Full Review   
 Good app but not sure if I trust privacy The app works perfectly. However, Snapchat friends started to get texts from me saying "you should check out the Twilight app". I never sent these and only found out when people started responding asking what I was talking about. I've since removed permissions for twilight because I'm not sure if I can trust it.   Full Review   
 Would like to see option to remove the notification bar The app is great, it allows me to still fall asleep when using my phone in bed. Only improvement that I would like to see is an option to disable the notification bar. It takes up valuable space that is unnecessary.   Full Review   
 Keep your power! Saves your battery,  no more constant re- charges love it.   Full Review   
 It's pretty good Only thing I'm missing is that I have omni swipe app installed (like pie, quick gesture buttons) the filter does not apply to it. what can I do about that? Thanks for any help :)   Full Review   
 Does not work for me :( I honestly haven't noticed a difference when it comes to me falling asleep faster at night. I use my tablet a lot too. That was the big reason why I installed this app. I must be the only one because everyone is praising it. If it works for other people, great - but it doesn't work for me so I am gonna have to uninstall this.   Full Review   
 This app helped me SO MUCH ! After using this app for a while now ,my eyes  stopped hurting after reading for few hours and I love how gentle is the light at night .I don't feel like the screen's light is piercing my eyes .I strongly recommend it !   Full Review   
 Has minor problems on my Moto x Great app but has some problems on my phone. I'm running lollipop on a Moto x and the app is not applying the filter over the whole screen all the time. It doesn't dim the buttons on the bottom, notifications that pop up on the top of the screen and also the whole emoji page in my text app (textra). Please fix those issues.   Full Review   
 Awesome Have loved it since I got it, but just noticed it especially when I got a new phone and it wasn't in there yet.  My eyes just about jumped out head seeing blue screen at night.  Reinstalled and back to peaceful,  rest inducing night time reading.   Full Review   
 Give a good rest in my strained eyes! Recently my eyes feeling way more tired and blurry after reading emails or articles from my phone. Just remembered that there might be an app which can reduce blue LED and make it easy to the eyes! First came up from the app list and I have been enabling this red overlay always because the blurry sensation has reduced quite a lot !   Full Review   
 Really works I am a big time skeptic of things like this, but this app inarguably worked for me--I very noticeably start getting "heavy eyes" a good hour earlier than I did before.  Really happy I found this.  NOTE:  Due to an Android anomaly, you need to pause the app in order to update apps on Amazon.  Very easy to do, just something you need to know.   Full Review   
 Twilight I hit the play button and lower the phone brightness and the magic of the pinkish screen helps me relax after reading for a bit, and it actually tends to help me sleep better. You must try it and share this app with others!!   Full Review   
 Meh? This thing never turns off even though I've set the timer four times. I have to keep pausing it. I don't know if my phone is crap or the app is. Otherwise it's insanely helpful at night. If I knew what the problem was I would rate higher.   Full Review   
 Really helped Although I didn't actually see a difference in when I woke up or got to sleep, when I did wake up in the morning, I felt more awake and fresh than I ever had done. Really liked this app and would definitely recommend this   Full Review   
 Doesn't work as it should I have to open it and choose the option: always. Everytime I want it to work . Automatic startup is not working so it wastes my time .I will download another app that works on my phone   Full Review   
 Not just 1 but many hours increased. Being on the fine line of about to be an insomniac.. I actually could work whole night(till sunrise). The work was mainly with mobiles and PCs, I had concluded that my biological sleep cycle had been destroyed completely. But this app actually did wonders. Within few days I reverted back to normal or I would say a much better state than I ever was just because of this app.   Full Review   
  Great app but be warned: This app screws up lots of my other apps. For example, you can't use Lyft when Twilight is running. You also can't install apk files while Twilight is running. It's really strange and I spent hours trying to figure out what on earth was going on. It's sad but i'll have to uninstall this app because of it.   Full Review   
  I love this app. Sometimes I forget how great it is until I pick up my iPad in bed and it's like someone has a flashlight in my face. I literally recommend this to anyone that owns an android.   Full Review   
 Turns everything blue when off It is very easy on my eyes at night, but right when  I turned it off to let it not run continuosly, It appears blue to my eyes and I feel that it isn't supposed to do that. It's a cool app but, I'm uninstalling because it doesn't make me tired and the blue is bothering me and I don't want my eyes worsening than they already are since I have bad vision.   Full Review   
 Insomniac I have trouble drifting off and often find myself grabbing my phone as a distraction. The relaxing hues are very soothing and not harsh like normal cell illumination.   Full Review   
 Cool app I don't know if it's just a placebo, but I've been falling asleep faster since I downloaded this app.   Full Review   
 Love it! 👌 This is absolutely amazing! Set to automatic & gives my eyes a much needed break during the evening use on my phone. Less strain & better night sleeps! Even adjusts my Fossil Q smart watch display perfectly! Just wish it didn't screen shot with the filter....   Full Review   
 Not working correctly since update Used to be 5 star app but since last update, it's not working correctly. It works at night which is great but in the morning it's brighter than my phone is normally. I've had to change the custom time so it goes back to normal screen before I wake.   Full Review   
 Love it This is a great app. It has helped me considerably as I have difficulty feeling sleepy and getting to sleep, so while I dawdle on my phone, I'm not blasting my eyes with blue light. You can feel the relief instantly :)   Full Review   
 This is awesome! The app is awesome! I like the sunrise and custom time selections and that you can exclude certain apps from being filtered. The filter can be adjusted and I like that it is highly customizable.   Full Review   
 Love this! It is easy to use and really makes a difference. I feel okay to use my phone later at night without it being too stimulating. The red is so relaxing. Like cosy candlelight.   Full Review   
 Nice app! Made a huge difference. I'm bad about being on my phone at night, I've noticed a real difference with this app. It truly does what it says and keeps me relaxed. Thank you for helping me literally not stay up on my phone for hours wasting precious sleep time any more!   Full Review   
 Almost perfect I love this app, I think eye health is very important and I hate to get headaches looking at my phone late at night. I want to give this app full stars because I really think it is fantastic. I just have one problem with it: when Twilight is on and I am on the Internet on my phone, it blinks on and off periodically. It is very annoying and the long stretches of switching off makes it almost pointless to use.   Full Review   
 No difference All was well until it stopped actually dimming my screen after the last update. I barely even see a red tint and it makes my screen BRIGHTER. I'm extremely disappointed. It was once so useful. No matter how I tinker with the settings it won't change.   Full Review   
 So far, the best app I've found I tried many apps before this one and I have to say this is the best one. I'm still not a 100% happy with it because it's not exactly what I'm lookin for. I don't just want a dimmer, I want a Night Time Filter that adjust things so I can read but I don't get my eyes burnt. But like I said, this is the closest thing I've found among all other paraphernalia of apps you'll see, plus I like its friendly design, that's a nice touch. So, save yourself sometime ad try Twilight.   Full Review   
 Excellent! A great idea, well executed and improving with every update. One does wondering why 100% black goes a bit red though.   Full Review   
 Help The screen overlay on this app prevents me from using some apps and I need to disable the screen overlay to allow permission for apps then re-enable the screen overlay. It's just ridiculous, talk about jumping through hoops. Please fix this.   Full Review   
 It does exactly what I need it to do. Not much else to say. It works perfectly on my Galaxy S4. It lets me dim my phone's screen more than I usually can and gets rid of all the painful blue light. I even use it when I drive do it doesn't affect my night vision.   Full Review   
 Dreaming Again Haven't been able to dream since my brain got fried , gained way more then 1 hour , woke up this morning instantly refreshed , been using around 3 months now .   Full Review   
 Good app but interferes with other things I enjoy using this app however now and again I have experienced unusual situations with it switched on, for example my online banking app uses its own onscreen keyboard and this app stopped it from registering inputs. However after pausing the app everything went back to normal, so make sure you remember to try that before contacting support on the apps it breaks (like I did).   Full Review   
 Sight Saver I love to read e-books after sunset till 10pm and there were nights when I felt like my eyes were burning or pulsing in an uncomfortable manner, this app lifted me from worry and makes it easier to fall asleep as well, one time I accidentally fell asleep reading, but it was midnight 😂😂. I'd love to see this as a desktop app, because I do a lot of office work and some gaming on the side and even at the computers lowest brightness setting, it still has a uncomfy feeling for my eyes. Great app tho, Cheers!   Full Review
title: Twilight

reviews:
Always stops Ididnt set any time to stop but it stops after just a minute every time. Loop mode does not work. Please fix it fast. Ive given 3 becoz u have added concentration beats do not remove it in update   Full Review   
 *Updated* Resolved :~) Broke on last update *updated*.  As requested I reached out to support again and they were able to resolve the issue.  I am so glad as this is hands down the best app I have found for sounds to help me sleep.  I fill the bigest advantage with this app is that you can custom make the sound combinations &  control each sound level independently to create that perfect mix that works for you. Resolved :~) Broke on last update. I reached out to support but got no response. Guess Im out of luck. Resolved! :~)   Full Review   
  I have trouble sleeping but this app helps me relax and fall asleep much easier and quicker, I absolutely love it and never had any problems with it either, different options of sounds cater for diferente individuals 5*   Full Review   
 Pretty good Some of the musical samples start in the middle of a bar and then change suddenly in the middle of the song. Sometimes the Dynamic volume is too great between the softest instruments and the loudest instruments. If the samples could be a little longer that would be great.   Full Review   
 Wonderful Relaxation I also use it for meditation. I love the timer option and how it gently fades out. A wonderful app. Update: May 2016 and I am still using this app. I have had no problems. Love the soothing, gentle sounds and so peaceful☺   Full Review   
  I've tried many noise generating apps, deleted most, and liked a handful enough to keep and pay for premium. Out of those, this is the one that spends the most time in my quick-access app tray. The sound quality is good, and the loops are pleasant, interesting, and varied enough to create a remarkable spread of sound environments for many purposes. Most helpfully, as a worrywart, it lets me fall asleep without getting caught in stressful thought patterns, and keeps me asleep despite noisy neighbours.   Full Review   
 Worth the $ To someone who is very keen on subtle sounds in the recordings. It could use just a bit of fine tuning on some sounds but overall it's amazing. Icy rain has some strange sound in it that is not natural. And the loop of the bubbles is far to close.                                       Thanks for getting back so fast. Customer service is key in progress and feeling heard is another. Keep up the great work. Changed 4 star to 5 star review.   Full Review   
 Awesom  but it could be better if.... The best app ever for sounds .... I could mix melodies together and feel them ... so nice and collective ... LOVE IT . But I wish you can make an update in which I can go out of the app and still hear the melodies   Full Review   
 This app is lovely 💜 Purchased the full version @rs. 100 💰... It's worth paying☝. One request please improve the sound quality ( although quality isn't bad), all sounds are 80kbps .ogg, make them 320kbps and increase volume too. Thank you, now let me sleep😪💤💤💤   Full Review   
  This app has cured my insomnia and bettered my workouts and meditations. Not only is there a sleep timer to turn off the sounds but you can set it to turn the app off too, saving battery consumption. The melodies are lovely and relaxing.   Full Review   
 Fantastic I initially got this app to help put my kids to sleep & ended up putting it on my phone as well to help me sleep   Full Review   
 It's really awesome... hats off to this appmaker I usually don't give review on apps ... but I couldn't resist to review this one ... really soooo pleasant and soothing music of different categories ... takes u back to the nature ... must listen ... worth downloading ... helps my meditation a lot   Full Review   
 Use it every night My wife and I can't sleep without this. Sounds especially good on my Nexus 5x. Free version.   Full Review   
  It worked fine till I bought the full app ,now all I get is a buzzing sound,sent a letter in requesting some still ain't heard from these fools goin on 3 weeks now!DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!   Full Review   
  I really enjoy this app. It helps me relax and get to sleep every night.   Full Review   
 Was good... Sounds that were free are now locked and need to buy the app to use them... deleted   Full Review   
 Effective and efficient response They are fast replying and do their best to respond and solve issues at an amazing rate. Rarely seen today. Thank you for your patience and assistance.   Full Review   
 Works like a charm Between this and my other sleep aid app, I sleep like a baby. Love it.   Full Review   
 A lot of soothing instrumentals 20 or so and double if you pay.   Full Review   
  It's the best meditation music ever! Its excellent for trying to go to sleep   Full Review   
 Good Good relaxing, hope developer made it free i.e. all programs open for free   Full Review   
 Love it! It has so many beautiful and relaxing sounds! Really good app!   Full Review   
 Relax Melodies Sleep I love the app. It helps me calm down and fall asleep Thank you for making all the Relax Melodies.   Full Review   
  Help full...   If it is fully free users are very delicious..   Full Review   
 Love it!! Many sounds to choose from, with a timer to close app at zero   Full Review   
 Backgroun The app not work on background   Full Review   
 Mee I only give it 4 stars because the music stops if I want to look at another app.   Full Review   
  Awesome app use it every night can't sleep with out it   Full Review   
  Love it! When I feel restless I turn the app on and I am asleep before the timer shuts the app off.   Full Review   
 Great selection I upgraded and have not been disappointed! Previous review: I love how many options it has on the free version! I'll probably upgrade soon to the paid one because it is so reasonable. The music!sounds are great quality and I like all of them.   Full Review   
  Music and nature sounds are really good I use it every night   Full Review   
 Amazing for Relaxation and Sleep Aid A great free app that I use almost every night to help me get to sleep. It works like a charm. Let's you design your own combination of sounds and relaxing music and save as favorites. A must have app if you are looking for a white noise for sleep or just for relaxing background music!   Full Review   
 Excellent Checked it out for ten mins. Upgraded without hesitation. Love it. Thanks.   Full Review   
 Sleep better Love this app. I really like that you can customize the melodies you want together.   Full Review   
 Helps me get to sleep! I love it   Full Review   
  The best sleep, and relaxing app I have ever found. The only one I use on night after night   Full Review   
 Basic relaxation sounds The basic sounds are not bad to listen to. Some are a little tinny. Great background sounds for study.   Full Review   
 Can't sleep without this app!! I downloaded this so my daughter could fall asleep, and now I'm stuck. I've used this for a couple years now, and I love it. Even my mom loves it and it has improved her sleep quality. I have a later work schedule and she doesn't even hear me get home. This app is awesome!   Full Review   
 Love this!!! This app put me right to sleep during the night from when I had problems falling asleep :)   Full Review   
 Use it ALMOST every night I enjoy the app immensely. Needs more free sounds. That being said, the Devs' are actually on top of their app. Good Job   Full Review
title: Relax Meditation: Sleep Sounds

reviews:
The app is nice, but title is misleading As a student music therapist, I can see myself using this app for my relaxation sessions, but I can assure everyone this is NOT music therapy. We go to college for a continued 4 years minimum, study many of the subjects our nursing, occupational therapy, and many other health profession students study. We cannot be replaced by an app, but we constantly fight this stigma. I would enjoy this app more if it didnt have a misleading (and in some ways illegal) title, and hope that the makers consider change it.   Full Review   
 This that sucks None of the sounds are relaxing it just I don't lie I don't like it at all it just sucks I mean really put some actual relaxing music in   Full Review   
 All piano I like it for about two minutes, until the whole soothing sound turned into piano playing. Didn't find it relaxing at all!!   Full Review   
 Doesn't work on MotoX 2013 Lollipop This used to be a must have for me. After the upgrade the app seizes to function. No music. Just a frozen screen. Fix this and you have 5 stars from me.   Full Review   
  Love it! It can be used for many things... Sleep, Relax time, Nap time for children... I have even put it on while cleaning my house or driving in my car... I give it a 5... However, it could be improved. By additional sounds, shuffle, and add your own... But to be free, It's Awesome!   Full Review   
 Yes!!! I'm already an insomniac, and now I'm pregnant. Sound sleep is hard to come by. I am a chronic TV on at night sleeper and it usually just seemed to keep me up. I liked the noise, but it was distracting. Also, I live in a not so quiet neighborhood. That being said, I feel asleep in less than 20 minutes with this app. I love that you can personalize the sounds. Floating in the city with waves added was perfect. It does drain the battery a bit, but that's to be expected if you're playing it all night. Get it!   Full Review   
 Was nice until you can't turn piano off Hate sleeping to piano. You can adjust the volume to all the good sounds but not the piano music. Killed the app for me. I'll keep searching for a great non piano sleep app. What a shame.   Full Review   
 Love it Only thing that I've found that not only relaxes you but also helps you drift off into a natural sleep   Full Review   
 Great App! I loved this great app. It provides soothing & tranquil music making you feel relaxed ready for sleep.   Full Review   
 Truly Calming The app is well designed and delivers relaxing, calming sounds.   Full Review   
 Grateeeeeeeee fantastic app. ifeeling lm in my sweet village in a raining time   Full Review   
 It's good I have finally found the best app for this kind of tranquil music but it is a bit disappointing as not all of it is free for someone like myself who can't get the paid version coz I can't get an account if this could be updated so all is free then I'll give it the full 5 stars AND recommend it to everyone but other than that it's great love it   Full Review   
  Honest feedback...had tried many relaxing music apps, spa music apps etc....this one stands out..absolutely fantastic. very relaxing indeed, gave me goose pimples first time, but subsequently, made me sleep everytime.  The piano music is very good...audio quality is amazing.  see, what more you can improve on..   Full Review   
 Nice job Pretty good app comparing to others I have tried. There is still room for improvement (mainly on the design) but you did a very good job with the sounds, and with the fact we can play them independently of the songs. Excellent!   Full Review   
 I LOVE IT Omg the is cool. I have a medical condition that makes me sleep depraved. All I do is take 30 mm of zzz quill and play this and I'm out cold   Full Review   
 Awesome! I d highly recommend this app for everyone. This is really great. Just don't forget to add it to the whitelist in ur task killer application. Great app!   Full Review   
 WoW!!! There is nothing beter then having a lovely sleep ... but now that i am living in the city there is to much noise and canot sleep ..but this app is the best .it helps me to block out those noises and keeps my mind clear..😎   Full Review   
 Smart Intelligent & Beautiful Can be used while doing so many things like Yoga, Studies, Work in office, Long Drive, For Creating an Ambience  & ofcourse for sleep..   Full Review   
 Perfect Helps me like nothing else. A must have if you need to slow down your mind to get to sleep. And I love the timer so it doesn't drain my battery.   Full Review   
 Love it I have really bad insomnia for someone at my young age and my favorite on here is dance of the gossamer. I keep it on repeat for a couple hours and I just lull myself to sleep. I also keep it down low so it's just in the background.   Full Review   
 Perfect Been using it for about 2 yrs..for myself now my 7yr old...I sleep longer and she sleeps thru the night...something we both couldnt do before .... Thank you   Full Review   
 Thank you! I can't sleep without it. Suffering from insomnia for many years, this app has helped me. The song Floating in the City, is the reason why I am able to sleep. Thank you again. Buying full version to support your amazing work.   Full Review   
 I loved it Relax really...but please the two new sound tracks ...How to get them ..??I downloaded the app before you add them ...   Full Review   
 What a croc This didn't work at all, does it require weak minds to cause an effect? Is it like hypnotism?   Full Review   
 Really works to me I got it very well in my ear and my android. It functioned well and soothing my mind for real. Thanks for the creator 😊   Full Review   
  This isn't a rating.  I want to know, before I keep this app, why the app "needs access to the SMS & the device call information"?  This app seems to good to be true &  positive I would enjoy it but I can't think of a legitimate reason for needed access to anything other than WiFi!   Full Review   
 Robert Batra Such a boring game. Once when I started this app to get a sweet sleep my sleep was gone away. Horrible. Totally time waste and mood waste app.   Full Review   
 Wow I have serious insomnia.  Have gone 40 hr sretches without sleep. This app puts me to sleep within minutes and keeps me there for hours with good dreams even!   Full Review   
 Useful  in relaxing It's usefull to relax and make your mind calm. But not music therapy to sleep   Full Review   
  Great except it turns off after a few seconds if I lock my phone   Full Review   
 INSOMNIAC Hoping to sleep . Had this before dont remember if it helped me sleep or not,  had one that did  ..... hope this one is it  !!!!    NOPE  .   CAN ANY ONE RECOMMEND A GOOD SLEEP APP  ???   Full Review   
  I've started to have a peaceful sleep after listening to this music...my mind is relaxed & the music is soothing... Thank you!   Full Review   
  I use it every night to fall asleep and find this app very relaxing.   Full Review   
 Music are too short Dead air too long before the music start.. But nice overall   Full Review   
 Great! Used this app for years (the deluxe version on an older phone). It soothed me thru my good and bad days and nights.  Then a few years later, it became a bigger blessing while I was pregnant.  I will most - likely get the deluxe again.   Full Review   
 Love, but has changed I have been using this to sleep, as I work nights, for the last 2 years. But before I switched phones, the app would open on the same music choice that I always listen to. After a new phone, I have to find the song and set it to repeat every single time the app opens. THIS IS ANNOYING!   Full Review   
 relaxing relieves the mind from stress and induces sleep sadly its not all free app   Full Review   
 Dont like music. Is there a way to hear it without the music??   Full Review   
 Awesome app...!!! Tis app is lik my mom... Puts me to sleep everyday... Just one thing tat could be done to improve user experience is to let it play in the background even wen we exit the app... Otherwise, it's too gud...!!! Congrats Dev team for such a lovely app...!!! :) :) :)   Full Review   
 Good app, to the person saying the title is illegal You obviously don't know how the internet works to suggest that by putting out a free app to help someone sleep they're breaking the law in some way because they used the word "therapy". Definition of therapy: "treatment intended to relieve or heal a disorder".   Full Review
title: Music Therapy for Sound Sleep
